02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__46-Season1-.name: No. It's simply stopped moving... for now.

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__47-Season1-.name: It won't stay down for long.

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__48-Season1-.name: Then we'd better destroy it while we have a chance.

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__49-Season1-.name: You can't! Its life force is tied to the war chief's!

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__50-Season1-.name: If the Vayar falls, my father will, too!

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__51-Season1-.name: So what? We're stuck up here, fighting forever?

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__53-Season1-.name: Won't you leave this problem to me?

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__56-Season1-.name: I'm sorry if I worried you all. It seems I owe you a debt...

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__57-Season1-.name: So please. Allow me to take care of this.

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__59-Season1-.name: The $npc:11003392$ and I are sworn to protect $map:02000051$, even if it costs us our lives.

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__60-Season1-.name: I will see my duty through to the end.

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__62-Season1-.name: There has to be another way. Let's think about this...

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__63-Season1-.name: No. I will finish this with my own two hands.

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__64-Season1-.name: This is our last chance. It's now or never.

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__66-Season1-.name: I hate to ask more of you, but... please look after my people.

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__68-Season1-.name: $npc:11003387$... son. You are now the war chief of $map:02000051$.

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__69-Season1-.name: I know you will serve them better than I ever could. I leave the people of $map:02000051$ in your hands...

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__73-Season1-.name: You don't expect all of the glory, do you?

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__74-Season1-.name: You are my brother in arms. That means we stick together... to the very end.

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__75-Season1-.name: $npc:11003393$... Looks like I'm getting you into trouble again. Good luck on the other side.

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__76-Season1-.name: $npc:11003387$! I leave $npc:11003448$ in your care. I trust you will treat her with the respect she deserves.

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__77-Season1-.name: I may not like it, but she adores you. I hope you two have lots of pups and make the Murpagoth strong.

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__79-Season1-.name: The future is in our children's hands now. What do you say we face our ultimate battle together?

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__80-Season1-.name: I would consider it an honor.

02000313_BF__BOSSSPAWN__85-Season1-.name: In my final moments... I have no regrets.

02000014_AD__IA_118__0--.name: I owe you a favor! Woof!

02000065_BF__MAIN__0-CBT-.name: Minister, if I might have a moment of your time.

02000065_BF__MAIN__2-CBT-.name: It was quite a shock. I always thought he was more cautious than that.

02000065_BF__MAIN__4-CBT-.name: It was shortly before the incident. The archmage told $npc:11000033$ that he could sense something unusual from the subject.

02000065_BF__MAIN__5-CBT-.name: Well, $MyPCName$ is rather unique. $male:He,female:She$ is fast and competent. I wish my servants had half of $male:his,female:her$ talent.

02000065_BF__MAIN__6-CBT-.name: That's not what I meant by "unusual." Regardless, I disagree with how the archmage handled the situation.

02000065_BF__MAIN__7-CBT-.name: I'm sure he had some kind of plan. A man like that doesn't take risks without carefully weighing the odds.

02000065_BF__MAIN__8-CBT-.name: I think you're placing too much faith in him. Either that or you're scheming something.

02000065_BF__MAIN__9-CBT-.name: Scheme? I never scheme. The minister of $map:02000001$ is above scheming!

02000065_BF__MAIN__10-CBT-.name: I just hope he didn't make the wrong choice...

02000379_BF__FAKELAOZ01__1-ShrineOfGuida.name: We aren't too late. We can reignite it with our own animus!

02000379_BF__FAKELAOZ01__2-ShrineOfGuida.name: I think you've interfered quite enough.

02000379_BF__FAKELAOZ01__4-ShrineOfGuida.name: We did it. The Lamp... it's regained its light!

02000379_BF__FAKELAOZ01__6-ShrineOfGuida.name: Thanks! We couldn't have done this without you!

02000381_BF__1122330_FINDWAY__0-SnowKing.name: Hurry up! We need to climb. $npcName:11003074$ the Snow Queen should be in the Secret Shrine hidden high upon this mountain.

02000382_BF__01_BOSSBATTLE__1-SnowKingdo.name: I'm sorry, but I have to find her. I won't forgive anyone who stands in my way!

02000382_BF__01_BOSSBATTLE__3-SnowKingdo.name: I'm sorry, but I have to find her. I won't forgive anyone who stands in my way!

02000382_BF__01_BOSSBATTLE__5-SnowKingdo.name: I'm sorry, but I have to find her. I won't forgive anyone who stands in my way!

02000387_BF__01_PLAYPARTTIMEJOB__0-ItemP.name: Oh, you're the temps helping me with the store today, right? We're about to open, so let's get to business.

02000387_BF__01_PLAYPARTTIMEJOB__1-ItemP.name: Customers will come to pick up their orders, all you've got to do is find their items in the warehouse and ring them up at the counter. Easy, right?

02000387_BF__01_PLAYPARTTIMEJOB__2-ItemP.name: When a customer enters, whoever's at the counter should greet them and find out what they're picking up.

02000387_BF__01_PLAYPARTTIMEJOB__3-ItemP.name: The warehouse workers find the item and bring it to the cashier. Now then, one of you go to the cash register. The rest of you will work the warehouse.

02000387_BF__01_PLAYPARTTIMEJOB__4-ItemP.name: Cathy Mart is open for business! Locate and deliver the customers' orders!

02000387_BF__01_PLAYPARTTIMEJOB__8-ItemP.name: It's closing time! Good work today, everyone.

02000387_BF__01_PLAYPARTTIMEJOB__10-Item.name: You will be returned to your previous location in a moment.

02000387_BF__1001_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Excellent! This is exactly what I ordered.

02000387_BF__1001_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: There seems to have been a miscommunication...

02000387_BF__1009_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Hmm? That's not what I ordered!

02000387_BF__10_RANDOMPORTAL__0-ItemPart.name: Stand on one of the highlighted areas.

02000387_BF__10_RANDOMPORTAL__1-ItemPart.name: Oh, no! One of your party members has gone missing! It won't be long before the boss finds out.

02000387_BF__10_RANDOMPORTAL__2-ItemPart.name: You abandoned your post! You're a disgrace to the business.

02000387_BF__10_RANDOMPORTAL__3-ItemPart.name: You are all fired! Get out of my sight.

02000387_BF__1101_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Thank you! You guys don't deliver, do you?

02000387_BF__1101_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Hmm... Are you making fun of an old man?

02000387_BF__1105_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: This is wrong! You call this service?

02000387_BF__1109_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: This is exactly what I needed, thank you!

02000387_BF__1109_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: This isn't what I ordered! Why did I even come here?

02000387_BF__1117_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: I should be able to continue my project with this. Thanks!

02000387_BF__1117_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Oh, no. This isn't right at all.

02000387_BF__1121_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Thanks! You should stop by our restaurant some time.

02000387_BF__1121_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Please hurry. I can't leave my shop unattended.

02000387_BF__1201_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: That's not what I ordered! Don't make me eat you.

02000387_BF__1205_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: This is pretty good quality. I'll be sure to shop here again.

02000387_BF__1205_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: You think this is an amp? I don't know about that...

02000387_BF__1209_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Ha! You really gotta work on your stamina!

02000387_BF__1209_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: What are you doing? That's not what I ordered! Get it out of my sight.

02000387_BF__1213_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: I'll draw a picture of her. She's gonna love my gift. Hehe.

02000387_BF__1213_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: I don't have time for this! I'm busy!

02000387_BF__1217_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: I hear this is so cozy. Ooh, I just want to lay on it forever!

02000387_BF__1217_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: I need to head back before my comrades notice I'm gone... Hmm...

02000387_BF__1221_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: I need this to hone my skills. My fight with him isn't over.

02000387_BF__1221_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: ...This is not what I ordered. Were you even listening?

02000387_BF__1225_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Thank you. I hope this will help the empress relax.

02000387_BF__1225_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: I'm sorry, but this is not what I was looking for.

02000387_BF__2002_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: This is even better than I expected. Good luck with your business!

02000387_BF__2002_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Something's not right... This isn't my order.

02000387_BF__2006_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Uh... Would you mind double-checking my order?

02000387_BF__2010_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: No. This can't be what I ordered.

02000387_BF__2102_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Yes, this is it. Thanks for not screwing up my order.

02000387_BF__2102_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Hmm...? That's not what I wanted.

02000387_BF__2106_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Hehe, Thanks, again! Service like this is why I'm a regular customer.

02000387_BF__2106_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Hasn't my order arrived yet? This is a problem...

02000387_BF__2110_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Yo! Yes! This is it! Get into the rhythm!

02000387_BF__2110_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: On no, this is not it, man!

02000387_BF__2114_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Ugh. I feel a headache coming on...

02000387_BF__2118_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: It's bigger than I thought but... this will do the trick. Thanks.

02000387_BF__2118_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Excuse me, this is not what I ordered.

02000387_BF__2122_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Startz should be able to work culinary wonders with this baby!

02000387_BF__2122_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Umm... I'm pretty sure this isn't what Startz asked me to get.

02000387_BF__2206_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Beautiful. This was too precious for me to dare order by courier... Ciao!

02000387_BF__2206_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Hasn't my order come in? Please look for it!

02000387_BF__2210_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Ahaha, thank you. I've heard great things about this.

02000387_BF__2210_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Look again! Don't they train you people at all? Tsk tsk...

02000387_BF__2214_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: With this, I'll have peace of mind on my missions.

02000387_BF__2214_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: I thought I was just going to be able to pop in and pick up my order. I've got a mission to get back to! Please check again.

02000387_BF__2218_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: This is actually a training tool. It's to strengthen your legs for flight.

02000387_BF__2218_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: There's no way I ordered the wrong thing! Are you trying to trick me?

02000387_BF__2222_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: All that's left is to go home and relax with a nice hot bath!

02000387_BF__2222_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Ugh, another trial from the Baaz. I just wanna relax!

02000387_BF__2226_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Woohoo! It feels comfy, and it's pretty! This is perfect for my room.

02000387_BF__2226_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: This isn't my order! Check again, and pay attention this time!

02000387_BF__3003_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: What are you doing? I don't have time for this.

02000387_BF__3007_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Haha, thank you. The staff here really have it together.

02000387_BF__3007_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: This is not what I ordered...

02000387_BF__3011_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Wow, thanks! Shopping is so much fun.

02000387_BF__3011_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: What is this...? Sure, it looks cool, but it's not what I ordered.

02000387_BF__3103_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Yes, this is it! I'll be back!

02000387_BF__3107_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Heh... This is not what I was looking for.

02000387_BF__3111_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Hmm... The quality looks good. Nice.

02000387_BF__3111_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Tsk tsk... No, this won't do.

02000387_BF__3115_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Thank you! This is gonna be awesome!

02000387_BF__3115_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Um... Some time today, if you don't mind?

02000387_BF__3119_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Thanks! You know, I'd love to draw you some time.

02000387_BF__3119_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Take it back. This is not what I ordered.

02000387_BF__3123_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: This is what I ordered... But why are you looking at me like that? Eh, whatever. Bye!

02000387_BF__3123_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Stop fidgeting and find what I ordered.

02000387_BF__3207_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Excellent! Without the blade, there is no knight.

02000387_BF__3207_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: You must have misunderstood. Time is money, friend.

02000387_BF__3211_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: This was totally worth it. Now I just have to go home and set it up.

02000387_BF__3211_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: I heard you have what I want in stock... I hope I didn't come here for nothing.

02000387_BF__3215_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Thanks. Now I can sleep in comfort.

02000387_BF__3215_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Please tell me you didn't mess up my order. I spent every coin I had!

02000387_BF__3219_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Pay attention, and bring me what I asked for!

02000387_BF__3223_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: This is it, thanks! Now I have to get it to $npc:11001281$...

02000387_BF__3223_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: My order is the same as last time, and this isn't it!

02000387_BF__3227_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Looking beautiful is so much work. But it's a worthwhile investment, don't you think?

02000387_BF__4004_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Hmph. I didn't come here to have my time wasted.

02000387_BF__4008_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: This isn't what I ordered. Is something wrong?

02000387_BF__4012_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: What's going through that head of yours? Get a hold of yourself.

02000387_BF__4104_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Yes that's my item, but please handle it more delicately. Do you even know how much I paid for this?

02000387_BF__4104_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: I don't know what this is but I would never order something this tacky.

02000387_BF__4108_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: That's the right one. Of course, if it's defective, I'll put a curse on you.

02000387_BF__4108_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: How dare you treat me this way! I'll attach your elbow to your butt!

02000387_BF__4112_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Thank you. This store is always so clean and orderly.

02000387_BF__4112_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: I can't sit around here all day. Could you hurry it up a little?

02000387_BF__4116_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: This looks useful. Seems like I ordered just the right thing!

02000387_BF__4116_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Haha. That's funny. You ARE kidding, right?

02000387_BF__4120_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: I was never here. This is our little secret, okay?

02000387_BF__4120_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: I know you're looking for excuses to have more time with me, but just give it up already.

02000387_BF__4124_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: With this I can become a great knight, like the captain!

02000387_BF__4124_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: This is a difficult situation... Ahem...

02000387_BF__4204_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Looking at this makes me feel so calm. I can't wait to share it with him.

02000387_BF__4204_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: This is not beautiful at all.

02000387_BF__4208_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: I like it. The shield is the hallmark of any defender.

02000387_BF__4212_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Thank you! I'm going to make so many shoes with this!

02000387_BF__4212_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: This is weird... This isn't what I ordered...

02000387_BF__4216_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Is this it? I hear that this item helps people understand the world.

02000387_BF__4216_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: I don't remember it looking like this... Are you sure this is the right item?

02000387_BF__4220_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Yahoo! It's exactly what I wanted. What? What are you looking at?

02000387_BF__4220_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: What? That's not it! Pay more attention.

02000387_BF__4224_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: Ha... I shall accept this item.

02000387_BF__4224_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: This is not what I wanted.

02000387_BF__4228_CUSTOMER__0-ItemPartyD.name: The staff here is very dependable. Keep up the good work.

02000387_BF__4228_CUSTOMER__1-ItemPartyD.name: Ahem. If you keep making mistakes, you're going to lose the trust of your customers.

02000388_BF__MAIN__2--.name: How dare you place these filthy things here...!

02000388_BF__MAIN__3--.name: Calm down, $npcName:11003085$. We need to meet $npcName:11003086$ first.

02000388_BF__MAIN__10--.name: I'll open the door in front of us.

02000388_BF__MAIN__19--.name: We need to raise all the anchors if we want to get the ship moving.

02000389_BF__MAIN__5--.name: There are enemies still aboard the pirate ship.\nDefeat them all!

02000389_BF__MAIN__8--.name: How dare you invade this place...?!

02000389_BF__MAIN__10--.name: I won't stand for this anymore!

02000389_BF__MAIN__11--.name: Go back! Stop polluting the ocean!

02000389_BF__MAIN__16--.name: It's too early to give up. Let's go underwater to meet $npcName:11003086$.

02000389_BF__MAIN__17--.name: The baby whales will help us. Mount them!

02000390_BF__AI__1--.name: He's not out of his mind!

02000390_BF__AI__4--.name: Humans... All they bring is destruction...

02000390_BF__AI__6--.name: I don't get it. Explain it to us!

02000390_BF__AI__7--.name: I will not speak with such foolish creatures...

02000390_BF__MAIN__0--.name: Careful, kid. $npcName:11003086$ is serious right now!

02000390_BF__SUMMON__0--.name: Be careful! Cocos! They're savage baby whales!

02000395_BF__01_ENTER__0-DarkCastle-.name: So far, so good. Let's press on.

02000395_BF__01_ENTER__1-DarkCastle-.name: The bulk of their forces will be inside. Let us try to reach $npcName:11001698$ without being discovered.

02000396_BF__01_ENTERTHEHALL__0-DarkCast.name: You made it through the tunnels?

02000396_BF__01_ENTERTHEHALL__1-DarkCast.name: If we don't keep a low profile, we're done for.

02000396_BF__01_ENTERTHEHALL__5-DarkCast.name: This is bad... We'll have to deal with them!

02000396_BF__01_ENTERTHEHALL__7-DarkCast.name: We've made too much of a commotion here. Let's find a better way past their patrols.

02000396_BF__01_ENTERTHEHALL__8-DarkCast.name: Keep looking for a way further into the castle.

02000396_BF__01_ENTERTHEHALL__9-DarkCast.name: We can't stop here. Find a way up.

02000396_BF__01_ENTERTHEHALL__10-DarkCas.name: We must find a way through that avoids as many enemies as possible. Otherwise, we'll be overwhelmed.

02000396_BF__01_ENTERTHEHALL__11-DarkCas.name: We can't afford to keep getting into scraps like that!

02000396_BF__01_ENTERTHEHALL__12-DarkCas.name: We're too out in the open. Find a way forward.

02000396_BF__04_RANDOMPORTAL__0-DarkCast.name: You found a way to the balcony

02000396_BF__04_RANDOMPORTAL__1-DarkCast.name: Scale the wall up to the balcony. I'll make my own way from here. Be careful!

02000396_BF__04_RANDOMPORTAL__2-DarkCast.name: You opened the way to another room

02000396_BF__04_RANDOMPORTAL__3-DarkCast.name: This castle is full of secret passages. Let's use them to our advantage. I'll scout for enemies. You hurry on ahead.

02000396_BF__04_RANDOMPORTAL__4-DarkCast.name: You discovered a path to the top

02000396_BF__04_RANDOMPORTAL__5-DarkCast.name: You can scale the walls from watchtower to watchtower, but there's no telling how many enemies are stationed at each. Good luck.

02000397_BF__04_HALLWAYBATTLE__0-DarkCas.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

02000397_BF__04_HALLWAYBATTLE__1-DarkCas.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

02000397_BF__04_HALLWAYBATTLE__2-DarkCas.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

02010051_BF__PORTAL03__0--.name: Do you truly believe you can stand against Kargon's immaculate darkness?

02010051_BF__PORTAL06__0--.name: The foolish pawns of the lights are here... Hahaha...

02010051_BF__PORTAL06__1--.name: Will your dim light help you escape this maze?\nWe shall see...

02010052_BF__BOSS__1--.name: The fire's warmth melts the ice.

02010052_BF__BOSS__3--.name: The fire's warmth melts the ice.

02010052_BF__BOSS__4--.name: I can't go back... I didn't want to hurt you...

02010052_BF__BOSS__5--.name: The fire's warmth melts the ice.

02010052_BF__BOSS__6--.name: I'll protect this place... For the Empress... For everyone!

02010052_BF__BOSS__7--.name: The fire's warmth melts the ice.

02010052_BF__MAIN__2--.name: This will be the new land for our kingdom.

02010052_BF__MAIN__3--.name: I don't know how you got here, but you'd better leave now.

02010052_BF__MAIN__5--.name: You don't want to end up frozen like these monsters, do you?

02010052_BF__MAIN__6--.name: Brace yourself, if you dare to approach.

02010052_BF__TORCHLIGHT_01__0--.name: The fire's warmth melts the ice.

02010052_BF__TORCHLIGHT_02__0--.name: The fire's warmth melts the ice.

02010052_BF__TORCHLIGHT_03__0--.name: Are you even listening to me?

02010052_BF__TORCHLIGHT_03__1--.name: It's not too late! Go back!

02010052_BF__TORCHLIGHT_03__2--.name: The fire's warmth melts the ice.

02010052_BF__TORCHLIGHT_04__0--.name: The fire's warmth melts the ice.

02010052_BF__TORCHLIGHT_04__1--.name: I don't want to fight if I don't have to.

02010052_BF__TORCHLIGHT_04__2--.name: You don't know when to give up... just like me...

02010052_BF__TORCHLIGHT_05__0--.name: But I need to protect this place... for everyone.

02010052_BF__TORCHLIGHT_05__1--.name: The fire's warmth melts the ice.

02010052_BF__TORCHLIGHT_06__0--.name: The fire's warmth melts the ice.

02010052_BF__BOSS__8--.name: No... Empress, I'm sorry... I thought that everyone would be happy again in this place...

02010054_BF__GUIDE_01__0--.name: You can now reach Grazna.\nReturn gravity to normal.

02010054_BF__MAIN__1--.name: You can now reach Grazna.\nReturn gravity to normal.

02010055_BF__SCENE01__0--.name: This is the place the Lumenstone's reacting to. But this is not a dragon's power... It's the power of darkness!

02010055_BF__SCENE02__0--.name: Thank you! I found the lost lumenstone while you were fighting $npcName:11003053$!

02010055_BF__SCENE02__1--.name: $npcName:11001292$! We'll exchange greetings later.\nWe need to go back right now!

02010055_BF__SCENE02__2--.name: Yeah. Let's get out of here first!

02010069_BF__MAIN__1--.name: What a fool.\nTo be tricked this easily...

02010069_BF__MAIN__2--.name: I know.\nI didn't think they'd fall for it.

02010069_BF__MAIN__3--.name: Anyway, it should be quiet now that we've made a sacrifice.

02010070_BF__MAIN__1--.name: Follow me. Your riches await you...

02010070_BF__MAIN__2--.name: Don't think about it too much. Just enjoy...

02010070_BF__MAIN__3--.name: A grim laugh echoes from somewhere...\nIs this a dream? Can it be real?

02010070_BF__MAIN__4--.name: There is no warmth here.\nAs if this were only a mirage...

02010070_BF__MAIN__5--.name: Beyond the illusions lies only dust.\nLike Kakalp, they amount to nothing.

02010087_BF__BOSS__0--.name: I, $npcName:11003125$, will hide no longer! Come at m— Hmm? It... stopped...?

02010087_BF__BOSS__1--.name: D-did you stop it? Hah... I should've been quicker. I was going to end this with a single strike.

02010087_BF__BOSS__2--.name: A-anyway... Good work. What should I say so that Wei Hong doesn't scold me as much...?

02020098_BF__BARRICADE__0-Kritias_Infern.name: The entrance will close in 30 seconds.\nThe party leader can no longer forfeit the dungeon.

03000014_AD__IA_118__0--.name: I owe you a favor! Woof!

51000003_DG__HIDDEN__0--.name: Only challengers who wish to overcome their limits have remained!\nIt will not be easy this time.

51000003_DG__MAIN__0--.name: Dodge all the attacks flying your way!

52000002_QD__MAIN__1--.name: Good job.\nNow move to the right.

52000002_QD__MAIN__3--.name: Good job.\nNow move to the right.

52000002_QD__MAIN__4--.name: Objective: Defeat the alpha of the pack

52000002_QD__MAIN__6--.name: Thanks for scaring off those wolves for us!

52000002_QD__MAIN__7--.name: Use the portal to move to $npcName:11000215$ville.

52000003_QD__KATVAN_01__1--.name: You think I'd let you take me in?

52000003_QD__KATVAN_01__2--.name: I swear... I will come back and I will destroy you!

52000004_QD__MAIN__1--.name: Grab the pizza to your right.

52000004_QD__MAIN__4--.name: Thanks for bringing it all the way here.

52000004_QD__MASSEGE__0--.name: Drop the pizza to use skills.

52000004_QD__MASSEGE__1--.name: Destroy the wall, pick up the pizza, and move left.

52000004_QD__MASSEGE__2--.name: Oh, dear...\nA filthy Giant Sewer Creep has appeared.

52000004_QD__MASSEGE__3--.name: Take the elevator to get up to the 2nd floor.

52000004_QD__MASSEGE__4--.name: Be careful! Stepping on the brick floor will destroy it.

52000004_QD__MASSEGE__5--.name: Beware of the hungry piggies. Drop your pizza for a moment and deal with them.

52000005_QD__ACT01__0--.name: Oh, you're here, too! It's good to see you again, haha!

52000005_QD__ACT01__1--.name: Welcome. It's good to see you, too. Oh, look. The Empress is here, too!

52000005_QD__ACT01__2--.name: I called everyone today because I have something that I must tell you.

52000005_QD__ACT01__3--.name: A messenger from Layla, a former lumarigon elder, found me recently. They said that the descendant of life born in Drachenheim has disappeared...

52000006_QD__EXIT__0--.name: Congratulations. You will receive the $npcName:11001478$ priestess's blessing as well as the prize.

52000006_QD__TUTORIAL_06_1__0--.name: How far are you going to run?!

52000006_QD__TUTORIAL_06_1__1--.name: Hmm?! That over there... that's definitely...

52000007_QD__EXIT__0--.name: Congratulations. You will receive the $npcName:11001478$ priestess's blessing as well as the prize.

52000011_QD__MAIN__0--.name: The Time Barrier...! It's shaking! We need to hurry!

52000011_QD__MAIN__1--.name: We need to defeat all the monsters disrupting the law of time and stabilize the Time Barrier!

52000012_QD__MAIN__0--.name: The ghosts are everywhere! Let's defeat them first!

52000012_QD__MAIN__1--.name: S-save me... I'm scared... sniff sniff

52000014_QD__COLLAPSE_2000__0--.name: The evil thoughts of $npcName:11001488$ are burning within. Be careful near the lava's hot air and crumbling terrain.

52000014_QD__COLLAPSE_2800__0--.name: Hurry! This place is about to crumble as Balrog's will grows stronger.

52000014_QD__COLLAPSE_2900__0--.name: Reach the Eternal Flame, deep within $npcName:11001488$'s evil thoughts!

52000014_QD__COLLAPSE_2900__1--.name: You have entered $npcName:11001488$'s evil thoughts. Move along the road while Balrog is down.

52000014_QD__COLLAPSE_2900__2--.name: Placing the flickering $npcName:11001488$ weapon in the Eternal Flame will melt the curse on the weapon.

52000014_QD__COLLAPSE_2900__3--.name: You can't retrieve the weapon you placed in the fire, but you'll get a different powerful weapon, free of Balrog's curse. Remember to claim the weapon you've earned through much hardship.

52000015_QD__TUTORIAL03__0--.name: Remember... Don't lower your guard, not for an instant!

52000015_QD__TUTORIAL03__1--.name: Zurile, Dalt, Kirisika, Kahm... Will you really raise a blade against your own in defense of a murderer?

52000015_QD__TUTORIAL03__2--.name: We stand with $npcName:11001231$! There's nothing else to be said.

52000015_QD__TUTORIAL03__3--.name: You won't even try to justify your actions? After all we've been through... Cowards and traitors, the lot of you!

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__0--.name: Well... Now I know what that sound was.  It was the entrance to the tomb collapsing.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__1--.name: We'll need to remove this debris so we can continue on.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__4--.name: Ngh... I think I tore my stitches...

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__5--.name: Agh... Thanks. You got us out of a real pinch.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__6--.name: You're amazing. Guess I should've expected that from $npcName:11001281$'s disciple.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__10--.name: Ah, is that you, $npcName:11001281$...? I didn't find what I was looking for. There's nothing in this place besides the oldest writings of the Baaz.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__11--.name: You've got a lot of nerve desecrating this sacred place! The Baaz are turning in their graves.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__12--.name: Hmph. After all your talk about changing Terrun Calibre... I see now you're still stuck in the past.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__14--.name: Hear me, $npcName:11001281$. You'll never find what you're looking for working alongside the vermin of Terrun Calibre.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__15--.name: I've heard enough of your nonsense!

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__16--.name: Hmm? Did you hear something...? Hey look, a switch!

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__17--.name: $npcName:11001281$, are you okay? I see $npcName:11001231$ managed to escape.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__18--.name: I'm fine... It seems that $npcName:11001231$ is after the Wisdom of the Baaz.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__19--.name: The Wisdom of the Baaz...? You're telling me he's searching for something out of an old myth? There's no proof it even exists!

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__20--.name: $npcName:11001230$, I must go to Victoria Island at once! There's someone I need to inform about what's transpired here.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__21--.name: All right. I'll head straight back to the fortress and put together a team to track down $npcName:11001231$. Ishura... Be careful out there.

52000016_QD__TUTORIAL04__22--.name: $MyPCName$, return to the fortress with $npcName:11001230$ and join in the manhunt.

52000017_QD__QUEST01__0-SoulBinder-.name: It can't be... The one who was with me at the time...

52000019_QD__MAIN__0--.name: Easy. You just have stick real close to me.

52000019_QD__MAIN__1--.name: Hmm, let's see... if I do this... and that... right here...

52000019_QD__MAIN__2--.name: Eek! These Wigglers are pretty upset!

52000019_QD__MAIN__5--.name: Let's look in the second hole!

52000019_QD__MAIN__6--.name: Hmm, let's see... if I do this... and that... right here...

52000019_QD__MAIN__7--.name: Eek! The Wigglers are back again!

52000019_QD__MAIN__10--.name: Shall we look in one last hole?

52000019_QD__MAIN__11--.name: Let's be more careful this time! If I do this to this...

52000019_QD__MAIN__13--.name: Hugh... I owe you guys big time! Good work!

52000020_QD__MAIN__1--.name: You dare to interfere with our work? We will crush you!

52000020_QD__MAIN__2--.name: Since you've already seen our faces... we can't let you go!

52000020_QD__MAIN__4--.name: Not bad... but you won't be able to handle all of us!

52000020_QD__MAIN__5--.name: So many people can't defeat a single person...?! Where did someone like that come from...?!

52000020_QD__MAIN_01__0--.name: So you admit the information was bad?

52000020_QD__MAIN_01__2--.name: This is all a big misunderstanding.

52000020_QD__MAIN_01__3--.name: Enough excuses. For an intelligence broker, you're real dumb.

52000020_QD__MAIN_01__4--.name: I think you need a lesson in respect. Guys!

52000020_QD__MAIN_01__8--.name: And here I thought today was gonna be boring.

52000020_QD__MAIN_02__1--.name: You caught me off guard last time...

52000020_QD__MAIN_02__2--.name: But now you're going to pay!

52000021_QD__MAIN01__0--.name: $npcName:11001264$ has used up all of her strength. Protect her! I'll stop Holstatt!

52000021_QD__MAIN01__1--.name: Hurry, activate the protection rune beside $npcName:11001264$!

52000021_QD__MAIN01__2--.name: No matter what happens, you must stay inside. Do not leave Eupheria's side. Do you hear me?

52000021_QD__MAIN01__5--.name: No... the protection rune is growing weaker.

52000021_QD__MAIN01__6--.name: Protect the rune stone! Don't let them touch it!

52000021_QD__MAIN01__7--.name: Ugh... the runestone... If I deactivate the Protective Shield and harness its power...

52000022_QD__PATROL01__0--.name: Hmm... So it was true that $npcName:11001231$ was here...

52000022_QD__PATROL01__2--.name: $npcName:11001231$'s  runic energy still permeates every corner of the laboratory.

52000022_QD__PATROL01__3--.name: What kind of experiments was he running?

52000022_QD__PATROL01__4--.name: I don't know yet... but witnessing all this strangeness...

52000022_QD__PATROL01__8--.name: No... I let my guard down...

52000022_QD__PATROL01__10--.name: He was experimenting on these things...

52000023_QD__MAIN01__1--.name: We can talk after we've dealt with the threat at hand.

52000023_QD__MAIN01__2--.name: $MyPCName$, you've improved! Well, this is no time for reminiscing...

52000023_QD__MAIN01__3--.name: It appears $npcName:11001231$ left a few clues about what he was searching for while he was hiding out here over the past few days.

52000023_QD__MAIN01__4--.name: I don't know the specifics... But I know he's after a power greater than Wisdom of the Baaz.

52000023_QD__MAIN01__5--.name: We need to figure out exactly what that power is before $npcName:11001231$ does. Hurry!

52000023_QD__MAIN01__7--.name: Hmm... $npcName:11001231$... Is this what you've been chasing?

52000024_QD__MAIN__2--.name: I-I found him! The others are staking out the entrance of his hideout.

52000024_QD__MAIN__3--.name: Stay put and guard the entrance until I arrive!

52000025_QD__MAIN__2--.name: Whew... They certainly didn't know when to quit!

52000025_QD__MAIN__3--.name: Now, let's take care of our injured allies and recover what the pirates took from us!

52000025_QD__MAIN__5--.name: Ah! $npcName:11001230$! Stop moving so much, you're making your wounds worse!

52000025_QD__MAIN__6--.name: Hey, $npcName:11001281$. Considering everyone's conditions, it may be hard for us to move the books to Ellinia safely.

52000025_QD__MAIN__7--.name: We might be able to... if the fairies of Ellinia help us...

52000025_QD__MAIN_ETC__2--.name: Whew... They certainly didn't know when to quit!

52000025_QD__MAIN_ETC__5--.name: Ah! $npcName:11001230$! Stop moving so much, you're making your wounds worse!

52000025_QD__MAIN_ETC__6--.name: Hey, $npcName:11001281$. Considering everyone's conditions, it may be hard for us to move the books to Ellinia safely.

52000025_QD__MAIN_ETC__7--.name: We might be able to... if the fairies of Ellinia help us...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__0--.name: Oh, it seems someone got here before us.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__1--.name: $MyPCName$, you're early. The others aren't here yet...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__2--.name: The empress kindly ordered them to gather... but I'm not sure it's possible for them to agree on anything unanimously.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__3--.name: Something big must have happened if we're all gathered here. What could it be?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__4--.name: Sheesh, Rolling Thunder, keep it down. You don't have to shout to be heard here. Come on.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__6--.name: It's been chaos from the very start...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__7--.name: Sorry I'm late. I ran into a bit of trouble in the countryside...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__8--.name: Whew... so much work... they're always tugging us around, like we're dogs on a leash...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__9--.name: I know you're from the streets, but you should try to control what you say in a place like this.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__10--.name: Hmm... that's enough, all of you. Looks like everyone's here...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__11--.name: We've gathered today in the empress's name because there's a critical issue that needs all of your support.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__12--.name: For the details... Ishura, why don't you brief everyone?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__14--.name: Will you help us stop Holstatt? It's not just the fate of the runeblades at stake, but the entire world.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__15--.name: Hmm... So to summarize... You don't really have any idea how strong this so-called ultimate secret is nor what it actually does?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__16--.name: This is nonsense. Why would you draw us into this mess? Sort our your little family squabble within the Calibre!

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__17--.name: I don't think I need to be here anymore. Good day.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__18--.name: I understand the predicament, but to provide support in something so uncertain... I need to think about it. I'll be in touch.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__19--.name: Well... everyone has their own agenda and way of thinking. We can't gain everyone's support immediately.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__20--.name: But at least those who've remained will support us. Together, we'll find a way to persuade the rest.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__21--.name: Hmm... I can't say I'm surprised by this turn of events, but... Well, what's in Empress's mind is also important... so...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_01__22--.name: $MyPCName$, meet with the empress and ask for her insight.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__5--.name: Sheesh, Rolling Thunder, keep it down. You don't have to shout to be heard here. Come on.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__7--.name: It's been chaos from the very start...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__8--.name: Sorry I'm late. I ran into a bit of trouble in the countryside...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__9--.name: Ah, $MyPCName$! Ikas said there was a special guest, but I had no idea it was you.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__10--.name: Whew... so much work... they're always tugging us around, like we're dogs on a leash...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__11--.name: I know you're from the streets, but you should try to control what you say in a place like this.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__12--.name: Hmm... that's enough, all of you. Looks like everyone's here...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__13--.name: We've gathered today in the empress's name because there's a critical issue that needs all of your support.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__14--.name: For the details... Ishura, why don't you brief everyone?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__16--.name: It's not just the fate of the runeblades at stake, but the entire world. Please help us.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__17--.name: Hmm... So to summarize... You don't really have any idea how strong this so-called ultimate secret is nor what it actually does?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__18--.name: This is nonsense. Why would you draw us into this mess? Sort our your little family squabble within the Calibre!

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__19--.name: I don't think I need to be here anymore. Good day.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__20--.name: I understand the predicament, but to provide support in something so uncertain... I need to think about it. I'll be in touch.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_RANGER__21--.name: $MyPCName$! I'll return to Henesys first.\nMeet you there!

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__0--.name: Looks like there are people who are already here.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__2--.name: Oh, $MyPCName$! I'm so happy to see you again!

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__3--.name: The empress kindly ordered them to gather... but I'm not sure it's possible for them to agree on anything unanimously.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__4--.name: Something big must have happened if we're all gathered here. What could it be?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__5--.name: Sheesh, Rolling Thunder, keep it down. You don't have to shout to be heard here. Come on.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__8--.name: Sorry I'm late. I ran into a bit of trouble in the countryside...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__9--.name: Whew... so much work... they're always tugging us around, like we're dogs on a leash...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__10--.name: $MyPCName$! When did you get here? Darn it, were you faster than me...?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__11--.name: I know you're from the streets, but you should try to control what you say in a place like this.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__12--.name: Hmm... that's enough, all of you. Looks like everyone's here...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__13--.name: We've gathered today in the empress's name because there's a critical issue that needs all of your support.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__14--.name: For the details... Ishura, why don't you brief everyone?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__16--.name: It's not just the fate of the runeblades at stake, but the entire world. Please help us.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__17--.name: Hmm... So to summarize... You don't really have any idea how strong this so-called ultimate secret is nor what it actually does?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__18--.name: This is nonsense. Why would you draw us into this mess? Sort our your little family squabble within the Calibre!

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_THIEF__20--.name: I don't think I need to be here anymore. Good day.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__0--.name: Oh, it seems someone got here before us.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__2--.name: The empress kindly ordered them to gather... but I'm not sure it's possible for them to agree on anything unanimously.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__3--.name: Something big must have happened if we're all gathered here. What could it be?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__4--.name: Sheesh, Rolling Thunder, keep it down. You don't have to shout to be heard here. Come on.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__6--.name: It's been chaos from the very start...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__7--.name: Sorry I'm late. I ran into a bit of trouble in the countryside...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__8--.name: Whew... so much work... they're always tugging us around, like we're dogs on a leash...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__9--.name: I know you're from the streets, but you should try to control what you say in a place like this.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__10--.name: Hmm... that's enough, all of you. Looks like everyone's here...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__11--.name: We've gathered today in the empress's name because there's a critical issue that needs all of your support.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__12--.name: For the details... Ishura, why don't you brief everyone?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__14--.name: It's not just the fate of the runeblades at stake, but the entire world. Please help us.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__15--.name: Hmm... So to summarize... You don't really have any idea how strong this so-called ultimate secret is nor what it actually does?

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__16--.name: This is nonsense. Why would you draw us into this mess? Sort our your little family squabble within the Calibre!

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__17--.name: I don't think I need to be here anymore. Good day.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__18--.name: I understand the predicament, but to provide support in something so uncertain... I need to think about it. I'll be in touch.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__19--.name: Well... everyone has their own agenda and way of thinking. We can't gain everyone's support immediately.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__20--.name: But at least those who've remained will support us. Together, we'll find a way to persuade the rest.

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__21--.name: Hmm... I can't say I'm surprised by this turn of events, but... Well, what's in Empress's mind is also important... so...

52000026_QD__SEPERATEGROUP_WIZARD__22--.name: $MyPCName$, meet with the empress and ask for her insight.

52000027_QD__MEETROOKIE01__0--.name: If your body is slow, at least your senses should be sharp.

52000027_QD__MEETROOKIE01__5--.name: Shh, light, silent footsteps. Look forward.

52000027_QD__MEETROOKIE01__7--.name: They're standing on a device that opens the ground beneath them. If only we could get it to operate... We'd get rid of them so fast.

52000027_QD__MEETROOKIE01__8--.name: Time to put your senses to the test.

52000027_QD__MEETROOKIE01__10--.name: Well, for you it wasn't too bad, $MyPCName$.

52000027_QD__MEETROOKIE01__12--.name: I'll take care of this guy, so take the golden safe to $npcName:11001822$.

52000027_QD__RANDOMLEVER02__0--.name: As expected, your senses cannot be relied upon.

52000027_QD__RANDOMLEVER02__1--.name: This is a waste of time.

52000028_QD__MAIN__1--.name: $npcName:11000031$! Do you know where we might find the "Rune Pavilion" capable of absorbing the Baaz rune?

52000028_QD__MAIN__2--.name: They say it's right under your nose...

52000028_QD__MAIN__3--.name: The Rune Book seems to be pointing toward the Godspring.

52000029_QD__MAIN__0--.name: What? There's no one here? Did we go to the wrong place?

52000029_QD__MAIN__5--.name: $npcName:11001231$... He's already absorbed the Baaz's rune and disappeared!

52000029_QD__MAIN__6--.name: Jeeeez! If only you didn't scream, $npcName:11001264$... I could have blasted them with my cannon...

52000029_QD__MAIN__7--.name: What? What are you going to do with that junk...?

52000029_QD__MAIN__9--.name: $npcName:11001231$ is definitely after the Runicta. He's probably teleported to the Rune Temple. Perhaps there's still some latent power in these runes...

52000029_QD__MAIN__10--.name: $npcName:11001230$! Can you harness the power of these runestones to open the path?

52000029_QD__MAIN__11--.name: Hm, sounds doable. Let's give it a shot!

52000030_QD__MAIN__0--.name: Hurry! We have to stop $npcName:11001231$ from claiming the Runicta!

52000030_QD__MAIN__2--.name: All right, to the second floor!

52000030_QD__MAIN_A__0--.name: What? Did Holstatt already awaken the titan?

52000030_QD__MAIN_B__0--.name: $npcName:11001231$!! Did that good-for-nothing fool wake the titan?

52000030_QD__MAIN_B__1--.name: Can't you see? There's no time to waste. We have to move!

52000030_QD__MAIN_H__1--.name: Haha... this is getting interesting! All right, $MyPCName$! Let's show them the true strength of our cannons!

52000030_QD__MAIN_H__2--.name: What? There's more? Muahaha... You guys are all dead!

52000030_QD__MAIN_K__1--.name: We better take care of that rune titan first! Everyone, move!

52000030_QD__MAIN_K__3--.name: All right everyone, to the second floor!

52000030_QD__MAIN_R__0--.name: No! The rune titan has accepted $npc:11001231$ as the bearer of the Runicta!

52000030_QD__MAIN_R__1--.name: We're running out of time! We have to move!

52000030_QD__MAIN_R__2--.name: $MyPCName$! It's not the end yet! Don't let your guard down!

52000030_QD__MAIN_R__3--.name: All right everyone, to the second floor!

52000030_QD__MAIN_T__1--.name: We don't have time to be surprised! Everyone, move! Think about it later!!

52000030_QD__MAIN_T__2--.name: There's still much to be done!

52000030_QD__MAIN_T__3--.name: All right everyone, to the second floor!

52000030_QD__MAIN_W__0--.name: $npc:11001231$ has the Runicta...!!\nWe have to hurry!

52000031_QD__MAIN__0--.name: Careful everybody! Don't take these jerks lightly!

52000031_QD__MAIN__1--.name: Don't underestimate our enemies! $MyPCName$! Don't let your guard down!

52000031_QD__MAIN__2--.name: Ugh! How annoying…! $MyPCName$! Let's destroy them in one go!

52000031_QD__MAIN__3--.name: Everyone, be careful! The titan is seething with rage!

52000031_QD__MAIN__4--.name: $MyPCName$! Don't let your guard down! May you go with divine protection...!

52000031_QD__MAIN__5--.name: It's narrow here! Gather the enemies into one spot. The bowmen will support you from the back!

52000031_QD__MAIN__6--.name: Haha, look, $MyPCName$! All those guests have lined up for a taste of our cannons!

52000031_QD__MAIN__7--.name: What's going on...?! Like a bunch of back alley delinquents... Noisy, noisy... ugh!

52000031_QD__MAIN__8--.name: Hm... There's no time to waste! Let's finish it in one go!

52000031_QD__MAIN__9--.name: Sigh... $npcName:11001231$, that fool... We've almost caught up—

52000031_QD__MAIN__10--.name: Wait! From now on, we need to be more careful! Focus!

52000031_QD__MAIN__11--.name: $npcName:11001231$ is near! Hurry, we must avenge our master!

52000032_QD__MAIN__0--.name: I will not allow you to escape!

52000032_QD__MAIN__1--.name: Hmph. Do you really think yourselves my equals?

52000032_QD__MAIN__3--.name: Everyone, focus!! The titan is moving!

52000032_QD__MAIN__5--.name: Everyone, focus!! The titan is moving!

52000032_QD__MAIN__7--.name: Be careful!! The titan is attacking!

52000032_QD__MAIN__11--.name: The rune titan is moving...! Everyone, watch out!

52000032_QD__MAIN__13--.name: Ahhh...! Be careful!! The rune titan is attacking!

52000032_QD__MAIN__15--.name: Get a hold of yourself!! One hit from the titan could kill you!

52000032_QD__MAIN__17--.name: Everyone, stay focused! If you don't want to die...!

52000032_QD__MAIN__19--.name: Everyone, listen up! Deal with the titan first!

52000032_QD__MAIN__21--.name: Sob... Sob... Because of me, $npcName:11001281$ is....

52000032_QD__MAIN__22--.name: We don't have the time for this. There's still hope. We have to move straight to the Forest of Life!

52000032_QD__MAIN__23--.name: O-Okay... The runestone's still got some juice... Enough to teleport to the $map:02000179$ right now!

52000033_QD__AUDIENCEWITHEREB_01__1--.name: You've exceeded my every expectation. I look forward to seeing what you accomplish next.

52000033_QD__AUDIENCEWITHEREB_02__2-Seas.name: They say that you resisted Madria's sorcery.

52000033_QD__AUDIENCEWITHEREB_02__3-Seas.name: You may be just what we need to stop her!

52000033_QD__AUDIENCEWITHEREB_02__4-Seas.name: With all due respect, let's not be hasty!

52000033_QD__AUDIENCEWITHEREB_02__5-Seas.name: We cannot simply trust everyone who comes to us.

52000033_QD__AUDIENCEWITHEREB_02__6-Seas.name: What do we really know about $male:him,female:her$?

52000033_QD__AUDIENCEWITHEREB_02__8-Seas.name: You must listen to me, Your Highness!

52000033_QD__AUDIENCEWITHEREB_02__9-Seas.name: Maybe this isn't the time for such a conversation.

52000033_QD__AUDIENCEWITHEREB_02__12-Sea.name: We have more urgent matters to address.

52000033_QD__AUDIENCEWITHEREB_02__13-Sea.name: Someone close to the court leaked the caravan route.

52000033_QD__AUDIENCEWITHEREB_02__14-Sea.name: I would like to task our new friend with finding this traitor.

52000033_QD__AUDIENCEWITHEREB_02__15-Sea.name: $male:He,female:She$ is not known throughout the empire. $male:He,female:She$ can move discreetly.

52000033_QD__AUDIENCEWITHEREB_02__17-Sea.name: I hope you're sure of this...

52000033_QD__AUDIENCEWITHEREB_03__2-Seas.name: You tell the empress what you've learned.

52000033_QD__AUDIENCEWITHEREB_03__3-Seas.name: Empress Ereve is shocked at the news of Winn's death.

52000033_QD__AUDIENCEWITHEREB_03__6-Seas.name: The whole of the empire is in danger.

52000033_QD__AUDIENCEWITHEREB_03__9-Seas.name: I fear $npc:11001966$ may have received dire news. Speak with him at once.

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__0--.name: Hey, $npcName:11001678$! Do you know anything about $npc:11000492$, the writer?

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__1--.name: Boss told me to monitor him, but I need to know who it is to keep an eye on him!

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__2--.name: Hey, idiot! $npcName:11000492$ is the one we tried to convince to let us pocket the goods that were supposed to be used for the announcement.

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__3--.name: He's supposed to be full of integrity and upstanding and all. Might be hard to persuade him.

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__4--.name: You don't even know what's going on in the organization. Are you just going around pretending to know what you're doing?

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__5--.name: $npcName:11001678$! Amazing. Even you know what's going on. You've matured!

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__6--.name: So where do I have to go to meet $npcName:11000492$? Do you have that info, too?

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__7--.name: Oh, you. How much longer do I have to look after you? Good thing you've got such a great big brother.

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__8--.name: I know it's your first time in Tria, but you've got to learn how to look after yourself.

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__9--.name: So, you have no idea, right?

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__10--.name: It's fine. Just keep eating that cone ice cream and stay put! Quietly!

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__11--.name: Ah...! Are you making fun of my name?

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__12--.name: You want to get beat up?

52000034_QD__QUEST_01__13--.name: Must be nice to work with such great men, huh? Hehe...

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_STRIKER_01__1--.name: Are you curious as to how we got here?

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_STRIKER_01__2--.name: I heard that $npcName:11000492$ ran this way.

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_STRIKER_01__4--.name: Darn! $npcName:11001678$, who was that just now? That was fast!

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_STRIKER_01__5--.name: How should I know? By the way, something seems reeeallyyy wrong...

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_STRIKER_01__6--.name: What are you doing? We have to go inside.

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_STRIKER_01__8--.name: Wh-What's that? B-Bravos! Is he dead? W-What do we do, now?

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_STRIKER_01__9--.name: What do you mean, "what do we do"? We have to get out of here first. We can't linger, or else the blame might land on us.

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_STRIKER_01__10--.name: I knew something felt strange... Things are just getting worse and worse.

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_STRIKER_01__11--.name: Hey, why are you picking that up?! Agh, pass it to someone suitable quickly, before there's a misunderstanding.

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_STRIKER_01__13--.name: We'll report this to the boss... See you later.

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_SOULBINDER_12__1-S.name: That man... It seems he's making a dangerous deal

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_SOULBINDER_12__2-S.name: Well, it has nothing to do with me

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_SOULBINDER_12__3-S.name: All I need to do is listen and see if he knows about the godly artifacts

52000037_QD__LOOKINTO_SOULBINDER_12__4-S.name: If he doesn't, I'll just ask the royal family to connect me to someone else...

52000037_QD__RUNAWAY_SOULBINDER_13__1-So.name: I better hand this over to the guard

52000037_QD__RUNAWAY_SOULBINDER_13__2-So.name: The guard thought the person was suspicious...

52000037_QD__RUNAWAY_SOULBINDER_13__3-So.name: Since I helped, I should ask for a favor

52000037_QD__RUNAWAY_SOULBINDER_13__4-So.name: I should ask him about the Godly Artifacts...

52000037_QD__RUNAWAY_SOULBINDER_13__7-So.name: ...I better escape before I attract more attention!

52000037_QD__MAIN__2-Season1-.name: Does it feel different in here to you?

52000037_QD__MAIN__4-Season1-.name: Oh man. Something bad's gonna happen. I just know it...

52000037_QD__MAIN__7-Season1-.name: Who're you calling a shrub, you dummy?!

52000038_QD__MAIN__0--.name: Do I just follow this path?

52000038_QD__MAIN__9--.name: I can't stand places like this...

52000038_QD__MAIN__10--.name: Turn on the computer up there.

52000039_QD__MAIN__0--.name: What are you doing? Hurry and get rid of them!!

52000039_QD__MAIN__1--.name: All right, now let's look for $npcName:11001678$.

52000039_QD__MAIN__6--.name: All right. Let's get going, then.

52000040_QD__MAIN__0--.name: Project Mantra...? What's this? Refinement rate... Sample data...

52000040_QD__MAIN__1--.name: How boring. It's supposedly a Humanoid Engineering Research Institute... Just some lab records.

52000040_QD__MAIN__2--.name: Hm...? T-This is? Hey, $npcName:11001682$! Look at this.

52000040_QD__MAIN__3--.name: What? Did you find something useful?

52000040_QD__MAIN__4--.name: It seems like a lab video recording... Look. The faces of those inside the test tube. They all look the same.

52000040_QD__MAIN__5--.name: True. They do look pretty similar. Dolls? Robots? Are they humans? Perhaps twins?

52000040_QD__MAIN__6--.name: 100 of them, though...? And calling them human doesn't seem very fitting, either...

52000040_QD__MAIN__8--.name: Who are you? There wasn't anyone in here when I came... Who are you? Are you the manager of this... Huh?! You!

52000040_QD__MAIN__9--.name: What is it, $npcName:11001678$? Do you know that person...? Y-Y-You! You look like the twins from the video!

52000040_QD__MAIN__10--.name: $npcName:11001682$... that's the guy who fled from the cave with the toxic river.

52000040_QD__MAIN__11--.name: I am a disciple of Guidance. I, too, have something I'm looking for. That's why I came here.

52000040_QD__MAIN__12--.name: The incident at the poisonous cave has nothing to do with me. Please don't misunderstand.

52000040_QD__MAIN__13--.name: Guidance? I've never heard of it. But that's fine. You said you were a clone, right? Does that mean you're one of them or what?

52000040_QD__MAIN__14--.name: I can't answer that. Because... I don't know. The information I'm looking for is from a past I can't remember.

52000040_QD__MAIN__15--.name: Then why are they making those clones or whatever?

52000040_QD__MAIN__16--.name: Even though I'm a member of an end-of-the-road organization in the Underworld, I know that this situation is on a completely different plane than the Baba Powder incident!

52000040_QD__MAIN__17--.name: How can I answer something to which I don't know the answer? I'm also in search of the answer.

52000040_QD__MAIN__19--.name: I can tell you the few things I do know, though. I'm digging for information about BeyondLink to recover my lost memories.

52000040_QD__MAIN__20--.name: I'm not sure if it's due to that, but they are after me and I am on the run.

52000040_QD__MAIN__21--.name: BeyondLink is a bioengineering company based out of Taliskar, but that's just a front to cover for their true purpose.

52000040_QD__MAIN__22--.name: I don't know what they're researching and developing, but it's been exposed that they are trying to use the slaves of the Land of Darkness.

52000040_QD__MAIN__23--.name: Why is it so complicated? Phrase it so that I can understand!

52000040_QD__MAIN__24--.name: As I mentioned before, I am on the run. I am being chased. I can't stay in this place for long.

52000040_QD__MAIN__25--.name: If you're interested in my story, use the hub computer and view the information about codes zero, one, and two.

52000040_QD__MAIN__27-SoulBinder-.name: Y-You! You look just like the twins in the video!

52000040_QD__MAIN__28-SoulBinder-.name: You were the one that fled from the poisonous cave!

52000041_QD__MAIN__1-SoulBinder-.name: Taigu Furian...? Is that really you?

52000041_QD__MAIN__2-SoulBinder-.name: Were you also defeated by the shades? Your physique has deteriorated...\nYou look nothing like you did when you were a practitioner...

52000041_QD__MAIN__3-SoulBinder-.name: Still going on and on about training...\nHis mouth never stops, even when injured...

52000041_QD__MAIN__4-SoulBinder-.name: He lacked patience and ran away... Look at him.\nThat is what happens to those who forgo their training.

52000041_QD__MAIN__5-SoulBinder-.name: Oh my... How deep must your soul have been injured to have turned out like this...

52000041_QD__MAIN__6-SoulBinder-.name: Hah, what are you talking about? I'm just...

52000041_QD__MAIN__7-SoulBinder-.name: Round stomach, pudgy fingers, hair oozing with oil...

52000041_QD__MAIN__9-SoulBinder-.name: Brother $npc:11001720$. No matter how you look at it, this is your typical...

52000041_QD__MAIN__10-SoulBinder-.name: I've put on some pounds, but it's nothing serious.

52000041_QD__MAIN__11-SoulBinder-.name: I've put on some pounds, but it's nothing serious.

52000041_QD__MAIN__12-SoulBinder-.name: Y-Y-You imbecile...!\nWhat happened to your sense of duty as a pupil of Guidance? Why haven't you been training!

52000041_QD__MAIN__13-SoulBinder-.name: H-Hey! You're not the boss of me.\nDon't think you can tell me what to do!

52000043_QD__50001451__1-SoulBinder-.name: The Veiled Light Training Site. Weird.

52000043_QD__50001451__3-SoulBinder-.name: You need to be careful. Don't be overly logical, but don't get too invested in your feelings either.

52000043_QD__50001453__1-SoulBinder-.name: Come back? Who are you talking to?

52000043_QD__50001453__3-SoulBinder-.name: Don't try to mislead us, follower of darkness!

52000043_QD__50001454__0-SoulBinder-.name: Uh... What? Where did it go?!

52000043_QD__50001454__1-SoulBinder-.name: It was just here! How does something just disappear!

52000043_QD__50001454__2-SoulBinder-.name: Wait, could someone have taken it while we were fighting?!

52000043_QD__50001454__4-SoulBinder-.name: Were you ordered to use us to find Guidance's godly artifact and steal it?

52000043_QD__50001454__6-SoulBinder-.name: Do you take someone here for a fool?

52000043_QD__50001454__7-SoulBinder-.name: This one knows $npc:11001778$, the BeyondLink, and is definitely connected in some way.

52000043_QD__50001454__8-SoulBinder-.name: My sources have confirmed that that this one went into the BeyondLink building without any restrictions.

52000043_QD__50001454__9-SoulBinder-.name: Furthermore, the clones found inside BeyondLink...\nI hear they all look exactly like him.

52000043_QD__50001454__10-SoulBinder-.name: $npc:11001656$. I'm sure you have an idea.

52000043_QD__50001454__11-SoulBinder-.name: I was waiting...\nWaiting for you to tell me the truth.

52000043_QD__50001454__12-SoulBinder-.name: But $MyPCName$.\nYou didn't tell any of us a thing. Why?

52000043_QD__50001454__13-SoulBinder-.name: Is there anything else you can't tell us about?

52000043_QD__50001454__16-SoulBinder-.name: I don't even want to look at you. Get lost, Kandura's lapdog.

52000043_QD__50001454__19-SoulBinder-.name: If he really is $npc:11001778$'s lapdog, he'll return to his master.

52000043_QD__50001454__21-SoulBinder-.name: He'll try to prove himself. Trust me...

52000043_QD__50001454__23-SoulBinder-.name: Don't jump to conclusions, $npc:11001656$.\nAnd I will do the same.

52000043_QD__50001454__24-SoulBinder-.name: I'll follow the teachings of Guidance, as master wanted...\nI will watch.

52000046_QD__10003042__2--.name: Quiet down!\nAll your fussing's going to knock them out again.

52000046_QD__MAIN_01__0--.name: To be honest, I didn't think you'd actually find me.

52000046_QD__MAIN_01__3--.name: There's a reason no one has caught me yet.

52000073_QD__MAIN__8-Season1-.name: This isn't what it looks like!

52000073_QD__MAIN__10-Season1-.name: You are under arrest for the murder of $npcName:11003219$!

52000073_QD__MAIN__11-Season1-.name: You won't get away with this!

52000073_QD__MAIN__12-Season1-.name: It looks like you won't listen to reason...

52000073_QD__MAIN__14-Season1-.name: They've played right into my hands.

52000073_QD__LOSTEVE__0-Season1-.name: Captain. Still no sign of Eve, sir!

52000074_QD__QUESTNPCSPAWN01__0--.name: Of course I hate $npcName:11003200$ for what he's done! But that doesn't mean we shouldn't at least talk to him.

52000074_QD__QUESTNPCSPAWN01__1--.name: In case you forgot, he murdered Winn Stilton. Your father! $npcName:11003200$ deserves nothing less!

52000116_QD__MAIN__0-Season1-.name: Hear that? It must be him.

52000116_QD__MAIN__5-Season1-.name: A guard who's afraid of a puppy...

52000116_QD__MAIN__7-Season1-.name: Thanks! You really saved my butt.

52000117_QD__MAIN__0-Season1-.name: There sure are a lot of books here...

52000117_QD__MAIN__2-Season1-.name: Jeez, I sure hope this mission is safer than the last one...

52000117_QD__MAIN__3-Season1-.name: Just thinking about that last fight... Yikes...

52000117_QD__MAIN__8-Season1-.name: Ahem! Did $npc:11003165$ tell you we'd be working together again?

52000117_QD__MAIN__9-Season1-.name: I'm sure it'll be a real hoot!

52000117_QD__MAIN__10-Season1-.name: Anyway, $npc:11000492$ said he'd meet us at his house.

52000117_QD__MAIN__11-Season1-.name: He said there are too many eyes here. Wonder what that means?

52000117_QD__MAIN__12-Season1-.name: He lives in $map:02000119$. The path to that neighborhood is right outside.

52000117_QD__MAIN__13-Season1-.name: I'll go on ahead. See you soon!

52000118_QD__MAIN__6-Season1-.name: <font size='20'>A guard... Then I have no choice...</font>

52000118_QD__MAIN__7-Season1-.name: Sorry to bother you, but have you seen $npcName:11000492$?

52000118_QD__MAIN__9-Season1-.name: Why'd he ask me to come here, then not show up?

52000118_QD__MAIN__10-Season1-.name: <font size='20'>What... what is he talking about...?</font>

52000118_QD__MAIN__11-Season1-.name: Wait... I know who you are!

52000118_QD__MAIN__12-Season1-.name: <font size='20'>Sorry, fool, but I can leave no witnesses...</font>

52000118_QD__MAIN__15-Season1-.name: Yes. Yes, I am the janitor.

52000118_QD__MAIN__16-Season1-.name: That explains why the house is so clean!

52000118_QD__MAIN__17-Season1-.name: <font size='20'>Is this the best Tria has to offer?</font>

52000118_QD__MAIN__18-Season1-.name: I am done cleaning and should go now. I am the janitor.

52000118_QD__MAIN__19-Season1-.name: Mind giving me some pointers sometime?

52000118_QD__MAIN__20-Season1-.name: The guard's real big on keeping a clean bunk.

52000118_QD__MAIN__21-Season1-.name: Yes. Of course. Because I am the janitor.

52000119_QD__MAIN__2-CBT-.name: We find you strutting around our turf, and you have the gall to ask why?

52000119_QD__MAIN__5-CBT-.name: This good-for-nothing guard doesn't seem to understand how things work around here.

52000119_QD__MAIN__6-CBT-.name: I think you ought to teach him!

52000119_QD__MAIN__10-CBT-.name: Save Joddy from the criminal lowlifes!

52000119_QD__MAIN__11-CBT-.name: I might be able to avoid enemy patrols by walking along the ceiling pipes.

52000119_QD__MAIN__13-CBT-.name: Well, looky here. We got a hero on our hands!

52000119_QD__MAIN__15-CBT-.name: Isn't that something, my spineless friend?

52000119_QD__MAIN__17-CBT-.name: Too bad there's no room for heroes here...

52000119_QD__MAIN2__1-CBT-.name: Oh, you got a real sour face on your mug. Heheheh...

52000119_QD__MAIN2__3-CBT-.name: You thought you could outfox the master?

52000119_QD__MAIN2__9-CBT-.name: Even the best mess up sometimes!

52000119_QD__MAIN2__10-CBT-.name: But this time will be different!

52000119_QD__MAIN3__2-CBT-.name: You're about to feel a whole new world of pain!

52000119_QD__MAIN3__5-CBT-.name: Cheer as loud as you can!

52000119_QD__MAIN3__10-CBT-.name: This is your time to shine!

52000120_QD__01_HENESYSDEFENSE__0-Season.name: The evacuation is complete. Have we heard back from $map:02000001$?

52000120_QD__01_HENESYSDEFENSE__1-Season.name: No, and we don't have time to wait. The enemy army is in sight.

52000120_QD__01_HENESYSDEFENSE__3-Season.name: I'm your reinforcements from $map:02000001$. What's the situation?

52000120_QD__01_HENESYSDEFENSE__4-Season.name: Reinforcements, at last! Where's the rest of your squad?

52000120_QD__01_HENESYSDEFENSE__5-Season.name: Right here. Me. I'm the squad.

52000120_QD__01_HENESYSDEFENSE__7-Season.name: There's nothing we can do about that now. The defense of $map:02000076$ is in our hands.

52000120_QD__01_HENESYSDEFENSE__8-Season.name: The enemy army has us completely surrounded.

52000120_QD__01_HENESYSDEFENSE__9-Season.name: We can't beat them in an open battlefield. We have to hold the fortress walls.

52000120_QD__01_HENESYSDEFENSE__10-Seaso.name: We have to hold them here. Green Hoods, form up at the choke point!

52000120_QD__01_HENESYSDEFENSE__12-Seaso.name: We can't hold out much longer!

52000120_QD__01_HENESYSDEFENSE__14-Seaso.name: That was just the first wave. $MyPCName$, tend to the wounded before the next attack!

52000120_QD__01_HENESYSDEFENSE__15-Seaso.name: This isn't over yet. Everyone, back in formation!

52000120_QD__01_HENESYSDEFENSE__16-Seaso.name: So that's the one who ruined $npc:11001820$'s plans... $MyPCName$... I may find a use for $male:him,female:her$.

52000124_QD__MAIN__0-CBT-.name: And I'm saying you can't trust him!

52000124_QD__MAIN_01__0-CBT-.name: $npcName:11001024$ has always had it out for Lennon.

52000124_QD__MAIN_01__1-CBT-.name: Their old rivalry is blinding him to the truth...

52000124_QD__MAIN_01__7-CBT-.name: Come along peacefully and you won't get hurt... much.

52000125_QD__MAIN__1-CBT-.name: I don't like your tone of voice.

52000125_QD__MAIN__5-CBT-.name: In that case, I'll just hit ya 'til mesos pop out!

52000125_QD__MAIN__11-CBT-.name: You'll be sorry you messed with us!

52000125_QD__MAIN_01__0-CBT-.name: Only my brother knows about this place...

52000125_QD__MAIN_01__1-CBT-.name: So what brings you here, really?

52000126_QD__MAIN__0-CBT-.name: What're you hanging around for? Shoo!

52000126_QD__MAIN__2-CBT-.name: Hey, it's that idiot hero from before.

52000126_QD__MAIN__4-CBT-.name: We took over the $map:02000083$, and now we're here to conquer $map:02000138$!

52000126_QD__MAIN__5-CBT-.name: We are the toughest gang in Maple World! The Three!

52000126_QD__MAIN__6-CBT-.name: Our last defeat was a fluke!

52000127_QD__MAIN__0-CBT-.name: It's so dark... Are you dead?

52000127_QD__MAIN__1-CBT-.name: But you still have so much left to do!

52000127_QD__MAIN__2-CBT-.name: You can't accept this fate so soon...

52000127_QD__MAIN__3-CBT-.name: Also, you didn't expect the afterlife to be quite this dark.

52000127_QD__MAIN__4-CBT-.name: You feel something wet running down your face...

52000127_QD__MAIN__5-CBT-.name: It feels like tears and... snot?

52000127_QD__MAIN__6-CBT-.name: Are there tears and snot in heaven?

52000127_QD__MAIN__8-CBT-.name: I thought you'd never wake up. I was so worried...

52000127_QD__MAIN__11-CBT-.name: You're at $map:52000127$. You were really hurt!

52000128_QD__52000128_MAIN__3-JobIntro-.name: So much cash. So much gold!

52000128_QD__52000128_MAIN__9-JobIntro-.name: Clean it out before the cops get here!

52000128_QD__52000128_MAIN__11-JobIntro-.name: Stick to the plan. I'll hold them off while you make a getaway!

52000128_QD__52000128_MAIN__12-JobIntro-.name: The others should have made it to safety by now...

52000128_QD__52000128_MAIN__13-JobIntro-.name: Hey, $npcName:11003274$! You finally decided to show up?

52000128_QD__52000128_MAIN__14-JobIntro-.name: $MyPCName$! Today's the day I lock you up in $map:02000124$ and throw away the key!

52000128_QD__52000128_MAIN__15-JobIntro-.name: You're later than usual. What's the matter? Had trouble with your makeup?

52000128_QD__52000128_MAIN__17-JobIntro-.name: I'd love to stay and play, but I've got somewhere to be.

52000128_QD__52000128_MAIN__18-JobIntro-.name: Here's a little gift from me to you...

52000128_QD__52000128_MAIN__19-JobIntro-.name: That oughta hold you for a while. See you around!

52000128_QD__52000128_MAIN__20-JobIntro-.name: You'll rot in a cell in $map:02000124$ someday. I swear it!

52000129_QD__52000129_MAIN__2-JobIntro-.name: Now, to fetch some dinner for granddaughter...

52000130_QD__52000130_MAIN__0-JobIntro-.name: Nice job keeping the cops off our backs.

52000130_QD__52000130_MAIN__1-JobIntro-.name: That's why you made me the boss! Hey, where are the others?

52000130_QD__52000130_MAIN__4-JobIntro-.name: What's the point of all this stealing if you're just gonna give it all away?

52000130_QD__52000130_MAIN__5-JobIntro-.name: I'm sick of this wretched life. And I'm sick of you.

52000130_QD__52000130_MAIN__7-JobIntro-.name: They wouldn't give up their loyalty to you. Not while you're alive, at least.

52000130_QD__52000130_MAIN__8-JobIntro-.name: That's why I'm sending you away.

52000130_QD__52000130_MAIN__9-JobIntro-.name: You won't... get away with this...!

52000130_QD__52000130_MAIN__10-JobIntro-.name: You're wasting your breath. I've practically gotten away with it already.

52000130_QD__52000130_MAIN__11-JobIntro-.name: It turns out there's a lot of people who wanted you out of the picture... and are happy to pay up.

52000130_QD__52000130_MAIN__13-JobIntro-.name: You should have known your place. Too late to learn now, I guess. Well... I won't see you around.

52000131_QD__52000131_MAIN__1-JobIntro-.name: Don't get up. He stuck you pretty good.

52000131_QD__52000131_MAIN__3-JobIntro-.name: Don't worry. If I wanted you dead, you'd be dead.

52000131_QD__52000131_MAIN__5-JobIntro-.name: I don't care if you're thankful or not. I just couldn't leave you to die on the street.

52000131_QD__52000131_MAIN__7-JobIntro-.name: Is it really charity if you expect everyone to fawn over you?

52000131_QD__52000131_MAIN__9-JobIntro-.name: What's with the surprise? The Nightwalkers weren't exactly keeping a low profile. Anyway, what are you going to do now that you're alone?

52000131_QD__52000131_MAIN__11-JobIntro-.name: Listen, it's none of my business, but you're not gonna be avenging anything without some proper equipment.

52000131_QD__52000131_MAIN__12-JobIntro-.name: Every other gang in the underworld wants a piece of you. I'd stay away from the criminal element if I were in your shoes.

52000131_QD__52000131_MAIN__13-JobIntro-.name: Maybe I'd head to $map:02000062$. Pick up some new gear. Try to make connections on the right side of the law.

52000131_QD__52000131_MAIN__14-JobIntro-.name: It shouldn't be hard for someone with your skills.

52000137_QD__ACT01__0-Season1-.name: $npc:11003289$! Open your eyes! We can still purge the shadow seed that has grown within you!

52000137_QD__ACT01__3-Season1-.name: $MyPCName$... I feared it would come to this.

52000137_QD__ACT01__4-Season1-.name: I'd hoped we'd be more prepared. My magic... is at its limit...

52000137_QD__ACT01__6-Season1-.name: I've grown bored. Let's finish this.

52000137_QD__ACT01__9-Season1-.name: Interesting! And how did you get in here?

52000137_QD__ACT01__10-Season1-.name: I don't know what's going on, but I'll do whatever I can to help you. So stay calm and...

52000137_QD__ACT01__15-Season1-.name: Ha! I can't simply let you take it. This was crafted with great care.

52000137_QD__ACT01__17-Season1-.name: I'll take the Black Moon Key.

52000137_QD__ACT01__18-Season1-.name: Between fighting $npcName:11003289$ and maintaining the shield over $map:02000023$, $npc:11003283$ used every last bit of his magic.

52000137_QD__ACT01__19-Season1-.name: He fell into a deep sleep. And $npcName:11003289$, whom he fought so hard to protect, was stolen by a mysterious stranger.

52000137_QD__ACT01__20-Season1-.name: $map:52000101$ and $map:02000023$ are broken and unprotected. The survivors must prepare for an uncertain future, with no time to stop and grieve...

52000138_QD__MAIN__0-Season1-.name: They've sounded the alarm. Escape the base!

52000138_QD__MAIN__6-Season1-.name: You're not making it out of here alive!

52000138_QD__MAIN__8-Season1-.name: I thought you were our friend...

52000138_QD__MAIN__9-Season1-.name: You taught me how to fight. Traitor!

52000138_QD__MAIN__10-Season1-.name: I'm sorry, but this is the end!

52000138_QD__MAIN__11-Season1-.name: You won't get away with this!

52000138_QD__MAIN__15-Season1-.name: I look forward to our next meeting.

52000139_QD__MAIN__2-JobIntro-.name: I wouldn't take anything the captain said to heart.

52000139_QD__MAIN__3-JobIntro-.name: He just wants everyone to be safe. I'm sure he didn't mean anything by it.

52000139_QD__MAIN__4-JobIntro-.name: All I want is to help...

52000139_QD__MAIN__5-JobIntro-.name: But $npc:11003328$ may be right. I'm a burden to the soldiers here...

52000139_QD__MAIN__6-JobIntro-.name: Absolutely not! I, for one, am glad to count you among my allies.

52000139_QD__MAIN__7-JobIntro-.name: Thank you. I only hope I can prove myself in the days to come.

52000139_QD__MAIN__8-JobIntro-.name: $MyPCName$! We have wounded in the infirmary!

52000139_QD__MAIN__10-JobIntro-.name: It's $npc:11003328$'s scouting party. They came limping back into camp...

52000139_QD__MAIN__13-JobIntro-.name: My squad... Where are the others?

52000139_QD__MAIN__14-JobIntro-.name: They're resting nearby. What happened out there?

52000139_QD__MAIN__16-JobIntro-.name: By a powerful wraith... The captain! He's in danger!

52000139_QD__MAIN__19-JobIntro-.name: He attacked the wraith by himself so we could escape. We... ugh... we have to save him!

52000139_QD__MAIN__20-JobIntro-.name: You're in no shape to go anywhere. I'll make sure he's safe.

52000139_QD__MAIN__21-JobIntro-.name: There's no time to get reinforcements. I have to go alone!

52000140_QD__MAIN__1-JobIntro-.name: What are you doing here? This isn't the time for heroics!

52000140_QD__MAIN__2-JobIntro-.name: I'm sorry. Am I not commanding your full attention?

52000140_QD__MAIN__3-JobIntro-.name: And now you've brought an ally. How unfair. I say we even the playing field...

52000140_QD__MAIN__4-JobIntro-.name: C-captain... This is our chance! While their forces are weakened!

52000140_QD__MAIN__5-JobIntro-.name: I told you to stay back at camp!

52000140_QD__MAIN__6-JobIntro-.name: I couldn't let you face these monsters alone, Captain.

52000140_QD__MAIN__7-JobIntro-.name: Careless oaf! You aren't ready for this kind of action!

52000140_QD__MAIN__8-JobIntro-.name: The best thing you can do now is stay out of my way.

52000140_QD__MAIN__9-JobIntro-.name: I'm a Guardian $male:Priest,female:Priestess$, Captain! It's my duty to fight by your side!

52000140_QD__MAIN__12-JobIntro-.name: I don't know what you are, but I will bring you to justice!

52000140_QD__MAIN__13-JobIntro-.name: You may have defeated a few of my thralls, but you're still a mere child.

52000140_QD__MAIN__16-JobIntro-.name: You are going to tell us who you are, why you're here, and what happened to the $map:52000115$.

52000140_QD__MAIN__17-JobIntro-.name: The $map:52000115$ is gone. This place has become the $map:02000146$.

52000140_QD__MAIN__18-JobIntro-.name: Such is the decree of the $npcName:11001811$!

52000140_QD__MAIN__20-JobIntro-.name: There's no point in telling you, wretch. Your end is upon you!

52000140_QD__MAIN__23-JobIntro-.name: We will have to finish this another time. I have more important matters to attend to.

52000140_QD__MAIN__24-JobIntro-.name: I won't let you get away!

52000141_QD__MAIN__2-JobIntro-.name: Physically, $male:he's,female:she's$ almost fully healed. But it may be some time before $male:he's,female:she's$ ready to face battle again...

52000141_QD__MAIN__3-JobIntro-.name: This may not be the best time to say this, but...

52000141_QD__MAIN__4-JobIntro-.name: If you had done as I asked...

52000141_QD__MAIN__5-JobIntro-.name: My presence would have changed nothing.

52000141_QD__MAIN__6-JobIntro-.name: I understand that you have no desire to fight another war.

52000141_QD__MAIN__7-JobIntro-.name: But we need someone like you on the front lines.

52000141_QD__MAIN__8-JobIntro-.name: As you said, I don't wish to fight again. Even if I did, I don't think I could...

52000141_QD__MAIN__9-JobIntro-.name: I can never again serve as a Guardian Priestess.

52000141_QD__MAIN__10-JobIntro-.name: There isn't a single Guardian Priest in the current crop who comes close to your power.

52000141_QD__MAIN__12-JobIntro-.name: Without a real Guardian Priest on our side, the casualties will continue to mount...

52000141_QD__MAIN__13-JobIntro-.name: I'm sorry. I must ask that we not discuss such grim matters in front of my patient.

52000141_QD__MAIN__14-JobIntro-.name: I... apologize if I've upset you.
