52000141_QD__MAIN__15-JobIntro-.name: But we are on the brink of war. My men desperately need someone like you.

52000141_QD__MAIN__16-JobIntro-.name: I only hope their prayers are answered before it's too late...

52000141_QD__MAIN__17-JobIntro-.name: They said you were on death's door, but you don't look that bad.

52000141_QD__MAIN__19-JobIntro-.name: Hey, I know we aren't exactly best buds, but... What's this? You been crying?

52000141_QD__MAIN__21-JobIntro-.name: A Guardian $male:Priest,female:Priestess$, sobbing like a baby? Not a good look, friend.

52000141_QD__MAIN__22-JobIntro-.name: What did you think was gonna happen out there, anyway? You've never had to struggle to survive in your life.

52000141_QD__MAIN__24-JobIntro-.name: Forget war. Stay here and live a nice, quiet little life.

52000141_QD__MAIN__25-JobIntro-.name: Anyway, your sad sack face is bumming me out. You need some fresh air.

52000141_QD__MAIN__26-JobIntro-.name: I hear there's a lot going on in $map:02000062$ these days, what with the preparations for the empress's shindig.

52000141_QD__MAIN__27-JobIntro-.name: Yeah. Maybe you're right. I could use some fresh air...

52000141_QD__MAIN__28-JobIntro-.name: The sea breeze would do me good...

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__1-JobIntro-.name: Sergeant! $npcName:11003399$ is hurt. We need to get him to the infirmary.

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__2-JobIntro-.name: Squire $MyPCName$, you didn't carry him all the way here... did you?

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__3-JobIntro-.name: Yes, Sir! He collapsed while we were running, so I—

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__4-JobIntro-.name: We've talked about this. Worry less about what your fellow squires are doing and more about your own training.

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__5-JobIntro-.name: Sir, I couldn't just leave him there.

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__6-JobIntro-.name: On the field of battle, a knight has greater priorities!

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__7-JobIntro-.name: I suppose you think you've helped $npcName:11003399$.

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__8-JobIntro-.name: However, now he'll never know if he could have pushed himself to make it on his own.

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__9-JobIntro-.name: With all due respect, Sir, I can't just turn a blind eye when my allies are in pain.

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__10-JobIntro-.name: Don't talk back to me. A hundred laps around the yard. Go!

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__12-JobIntro-.name: I was getting real sick of $male:his,female:her$ holier-than-thou attitude.

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__13-JobIntro-.name: To think they let a commoner like $male:him,female:her$ become a squire...

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__15-JobIntro-.name: Are you disobeying a direct order?

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__16-JobIntro-.name: No, Sir! I'm starting my laps right now!

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__19-JobIntro-.name: $npcName:11003399$? Sir, what is the meaning of this?

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__21-JobIntro-.name: Squire $npcName:11003399$ is being punished for failing to complete basic training.

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__23-JobIntro-.name: Have you listened to a word I've said? You're in the wrong here, squire.

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__24-JobIntro-.name: Or did you want another hundred laps?

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__25-JobIntro-.name: Unless you plan to spend all night running circles around the yard, I suggest you return to your quarters.

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__26-JobIntro-.name: <FONT color='#909090'>(At this rate, $npcName:11003399$ won't last the night. But what can you do about it?)</FONT>

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__27-JobIntro-.name: <FONT color='#909090'>(You may be powerless to help, but you know someone who isn't. Seek out the garrison priest.)</FONT>

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__29-JobIntro-.name: Y-yes... Of course... I'll just use one of my healing spells... that I definitely have...

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__31-JobIntro-.name: I understand that I'm being selfish, Sir, and that this is interfering with $npcName:11003399$'s training...

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__32-JobIntro-.name: But if one of my comrades—no, if anyone needs my help, then I have to help them!

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__36-JobIntro-.name: $npcName:11003399$! Please, Brother, you have to help him!

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__37-JobIntro-.name: Y-yeah. Just... just give me a moment...

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__38-JobIntro-.name: Squire $MyPCName$! This is your final warning.

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__39-JobIntro-.name: Return to your quarters this instant!

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__40-JobIntro-.name: I'm sorry, Sir, but I can't do that. Not until I'm certain $npcName:11003399$ is okay.

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__41-JobIntro-.name: You give me no choice. For disobeying orders, I hereby strip you of the rank of squire. I suggest you gather your things.

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__42-JobIntro-.name: Hey, um, fellow knight-man? Our friend here is only trying to do some good. Aren't you being a bit harsh?

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__43-JobIntro-.name: There's no need for you to get involved, Brother.

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__44-JobIntro-.name: Haha, sure, it's no skin off my nose. But still...

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__45-JobIntro-.name: Fine. Discharge me if you want. But in return, please heal $npcName:11003399$.

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__46-JobIntro-.name: Very well. Priest, if you'd be so kind.

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__47-JobIntro-.name: Sure, sure! But, um, about that... You see, if I heal him right here, my spell might... go sideways and... be bad.

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__48-JobIntro-.name: I suggest we move him to the infirmary first. Yeah, that's the ticket!

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__49-JobIntro-.name: I'll just, um, let the other priests know we're coming...

52000142_QD__52000142_MAIN__50-JobIntro-.name: Understood. I leave him in your care. $MyPCName$, follow me.

52000143_QD__52000143_MAIN__1-JobIntro-.name: This is the $map:52000143$. The last place a squire sees before becoming a knight.

52000143_QD__52000143_MAIN__4-JobIntro-.name: But good intentions aren't enough. You must consider the consequences.

52000143_QD__52000143_MAIN__5-JobIntro-.name: The world isn't so simple or easy.

52000143_QD__52000143_MAIN__6-JobIntro-.name: Allow me to demonstrate what it is to be a real knight.

52000143_QD__52000143_MAIN__7-JobIntro-.name: My final test... I'll do my best, Sir!

52000143_QD__52000143_MAIN__10-JobIntro-.name: Captain! What are you doing here?

52000143_QD__52000143_MAIN__11-JobIntro-.name: I was on my way to meet $npcName:11003190$ about some incident at the $map:52000115$.

52000143_QD__52000143_MAIN__12-JobIntro-.name: But I heard the sound of fighting, so I thought I might observe.

52000143_QD__52000143_MAIN__13-JobIntro-.name: I trust your judgment, $npcName:11003401$, but I believe our friend here deserves a chance.

52000143_QD__52000143_MAIN__14-JobIntro-.name: Captain! If $male:he,female:she$ continues unchecked with this inflated sense of pride, $male:he,female:she$'ll die a dog's death out on the battlefield.

52000143_QD__52000143_MAIN__15-JobIntro-.name: I see you haven't gotten over that incident... And yes, you're right.

52000143_QD__52000143_MAIN__16-JobIntro-.name: But shouldn't we all strive to have such a keen sense of justice?

52000143_QD__52000143_MAIN__17-JobIntro-.name: Furthermore, if $male:he,female:she$ can hold $male:his,female:her$ own against you, then it's clear $male:he,female:she$'s ready to advance.

52000143_QD__52000143_MAIN__20-JobIntro-.name: You may be inexperienced, squire, but you've already demonstrated a knight's greatest virtue.

52000143_QD__52000143_MAIN__22-JobIntro-.name: As long as you hold onto that will, then I believe you can become a great knight. What do you say?

52000143_QD__52000143_MAIN__24-JobIntro-.name: It's settled, then! As your captain, I command you to always act for good. Be ready to sacrifice yourself and speak only truth.

52000143_QD__52000143_MAIN__25-JobIntro-.name: Defend the weak. Fear no foe. From this day forward, that is your creed.

52000143_QD__52000143_MAIN__26-JobIntro-.name: I hereby dub thee a Knight of $map:02000001$.

52000143_QD__52000143_MAIN__28-JobIntro-.name: Yessir! I'll do my best, even risk my life if you give me a chance!

52000144_QD__52000144_MAIN__1-JobIntro-.name: Yes. I've got a mission for you. It comes from the captain.

52000144_QD__52000144_MAIN__2-JobIntro-.name: It seems he has great expectations... I'm still not convinced that you're cut out to be a knight, of course.

52000144_QD__52000144_MAIN__3-JobIntro-.name: The captain may have chosen you, but don't think for one moment that you're special.

52000144_QD__52000144_MAIN__4-JobIntro-.name: I understand. I'll do my best not to let you down.

52000144_QD__52000144_MAIN__5-JobIntro-.name: See to it that you don't. Now, as for your first mission...

52000144_QD__52000144_MAIN__6-JobIntro-.name: You are to escort a caravan of goods back to the palace. It shouldn't be too difficult.

52000144_QD__52000144_MAIN__7-JobIntro-.name: The shipment should be arriving from $map:63000001$ soon. Report to the $map:52000116$ in $map:02000062$ for the full details.

52000144_QD__52000144_MAIN__8-JobIntro-.name: My first mission, at last! I'll make you proud!

52000144_QD__52000144_MAIN__9-JobIntro-.name: Keep your enthusiasm to yourself. This is real work, not some $male:schoolboy,female:schoolgirl$'s adventure.

52000144_QD__52000144_MAIN__10-JobIntro-.name: Do not tarnish the honor of our order!

52000144_QD__52000144_MAIN__11-JobIntro-.name: Yes, sir! You can count on me!

52000145_QD__52000145_MAIN__0-JobIntro-.name: But sometimes... They're hard footsteps to follow...

52000145_QD__52000145_MAIN__5-JobIntro-.name: Nothing... He's lucky I'm not the captain!

52000145_QD__52000145_MAIN__6-JobIntro-.name: It looks like I have to clean this place up myself. Again.

52000145_QD__52000145_MAIN__11-JobIntro-.name: I told you, don't sweat $npcName:11003380$. We got at least half an hour before she shows up...

52000145_QD__52000145_MAIN__14-JobIntro-.name: I've been up for hours, really! I was just lying down after cleaning the whole place up by myself.

52000145_QD__52000145_MAIN__15-JobIntro-.name: Brother, do you know what I despise most?

52000145_QD__52000145_MAIN__18-JobIntro-.name: I told you, in person, that today's chores were your responsibility.

52000145_QD__52000145_MAIN__20-JobIntro-.name: I'm telling you, I did it all myself!

52000145_QD__52000145_MAIN__21-JobIntro-.name: Brother, are you trying to make me angry?

52000145_QD__52000145_MAIN__23-JobIntro-.name: See to it that you do. Now, then...

52000145_QD__52000145_MAIN__24-JobIntro-.name: Some of the townsfolk were attacked by animals in the $map:52000146$. I want you to look into it.

52000145_QD__52000145_MAIN__25-JobIntro-.name: I can count on you... can't I?

52000145_QD__52000145_MAIN__26-JobIntro-.name: The $map:52000146$ is a good hike. Isn't there some other job you could give me?

52000145_QD__52000145_MAIN__27-JobIntro-.name: Well, it's been a long time since I've put someone through my special Green Hood training regimen. You could spend the day doing that.

52000145_QD__52000145_MAIN__28-JobIntro-.name: $MyPCName$, let's go! The forest won't patrol itself!

52000146_QD__52000146_MAIN__2-JobIntro-.name: What good are you to me if you can't keep watch properly?

52000146_QD__52000146_MAIN__3-JobIntro-.name: I can't believe I fought a ferocious beast just to save you.

52000146_QD__52000146_MAIN__4-JobIntro-.name: I mean, fighting beasts is part of the job description...

52000146_QD__52000146_MAIN__6-JobIntro-.name: Nothing! Next time, I'll... Huh? What's with those $npcNamePlural:29000302$?

52000146_QD__52000146_MAIN__7-JobIntro-.name: They're just $npcNamePlural:29000302$. What's the big deal?

52000146_QD__52000146_MAIN__8-JobIntro-.name: I've never seen so many in one place.

52000146_QD__52000146_MAIN__9-JobIntro-.name: Yeah, that is pretty weird. Anyway, let's get this over with. I could use a nap.

52000146_QD__52000146_MAIN__10-JobIntro-.name: Those were no ordinary $npcNamePlural:29000302$. We'd better tell the captain about this.

52000146_QD__52000146_MAIN__13-JobIntro-.name: It's nothing. What were you saying?

52000146_QD__52000146_MAIN__14-JobIntro-.name: Let's get back to $map:02000076$ and make our report.

52000146_QD__52000146_MAIN__15-JobIntro-.name: Great idea! Listen, I've got to hit the little elf's room. You go on ahead.

52000146_QD__52000146_MAIN__18-JobIntro-.name: What's taking him so long? $npcName:11003380$ will be mad if I come back alone.

52000147_QD__52000147_MAIN__1-JobIntro-.name: With this, our loved ones will be saved... But it seems you have a guest.

52000147_QD__52000147_MAIN__2-JobIntro-.name: $npcName:11003189$! I've been looking all over for you!

52000147_QD__52000147_MAIN__3-JobIntro-.name: $MyPCName$?! I told you to get back to town!

52000147_QD__52000147_MAIN__4-JobIntro-.name: Is this one of your compatriots? I fear we'll have to eliminate $male:him,female:her$.

52000147_QD__52000147_MAIN__6-JobIntro-.name: I cannot allow anything to jeopardize the $npcName:11001811$'s plan.

52000147_QD__52000147_MAIN__7-JobIntro-.name: It's best we don't leave any loose ends.

52000147_QD__52000147_MAIN__8-JobIntro-.name: I don't know who you are, shady guy, but me and $npcName:11003189$ won't let you get away with it!

52000147_QD__52000147_MAIN__9-JobIntro-.name: $MyPCName$! Why don't we listen to what he has to say?

52000147_QD__52000147_MAIN__10-JobIntro-.name: Your loyalty is admirable, but this situation cannot be resolved with words.

52000147_QD__52000147_MAIN__11-JobIntro-.name: The witness must be... dealt with.

52000147_QD__52000147_MAIN__12-JobIntro-.name: Fine! But if it has to be done, I'm doing it with my own hands. I owe $male:him,female:her$ that much.

52000147_QD__52000147_MAIN__13-JobIntro-.name: Yes, this is fitting. I shall observe.

52000147_QD__52000147_MAIN__15-JobIntro-.name: I'm sorry, but there's something I've got to do. I can't let anyone stand in my way... Not even you!

52000147_QD__52000147_MAIN__17-JobIntro-.name: Are you done? There's still much work to do before the empress's court.

52000147_QD__52000147_MAIN__18-JobIntro-.name: It's done! If you don't keep your end of the bargain...

52000147_QD__52000147_MAIN__19-JobIntro-.name: You have no reason to mistrust me. Come, see for yourself...

52000147_QD__52000147_MAIN__21-JobIntro-.name: Bronze Eagle, I leave $MyPCName$ in your care...

52000148_QD__52000148_MAIN__4-JobIntro-.name: I don't know. Bronze Eagle brought you back to town.

52000148_QD__52000148_MAIN__5-JobIntro-.name: You were critically hurt. Luckily, whoever did this didn't hit anything vital...

52000148_QD__52000148_MAIN__7-JobIntro-.name: I haven't seen him since you two left on your mission.

52000148_QD__52000148_MAIN__8-JobIntro-.name: Was he involved in this somehow?

52000148_QD__52000148_MAIN__9-JobIntro-.name: <FONT color='#909090'>($npcName:11003189$ betrayed you, but he also spared your life... Something strange is going on here.)</font>

52000148_QD__52000148_MAIN__10-JobIntro-.name: <FONT color='#909090'>(Nobody will understand if you tell them what happened...)</font>

52000148_QD__52000148_MAIN__12-JobIntro-.name: While we were scouting, we met a powerful enemy. A stranger in a mask...

52000148_QD__52000148_MAIN__13-JobIntro-.name: I was hurt in the fight, so $npcName:11003189$ had to handle him alone...

52000148_QD__52000148_MAIN__14-JobIntro-.name: A stranger in a mask? I've never heard of such a thing in our woods...

52000148_QD__52000148_MAIN__15-JobIntro-.name: My brother can hold his own in a fight. But surely he would have contacted us by now...

52000148_QD__52000148_MAIN__16-JobIntro-.name: For all the grief he gives me, he's the only family I have. We need to form a search party.

52000148_QD__52000148_MAIN__18-JobIntro-.name: We don't know if the stranger was working with anyone else. The Green Hoods need to stay put and keep the town safe.

52000148_QD__52000148_MAIN__19-JobIntro-.name: Leave it to me. I'll find $npcName:11003189$ and bring him back.

52000148_QD__52000148_MAIN__20-JobIntro-.name: I appreciate the statement, but you're in no shape to go out on your own.

52000148_QD__52000148_MAIN__21-JobIntro-.name: It's my fault that he had to fight alone in the first place. I have to be the one to find him!

52000148_QD__52000148_MAIN__22-JobIntro-.name: ...Very well. Let me know what I can do to help.

52000148_QD__52000148_MAIN__23-JobIntro-.name: And be careful. Your injuries are still healing.

52000148_QD__52000148_MAIN__25-JobIntro-.name: I'll leave you to your rest.

52000148_QD__52000148_MAIN__28-JobIntro-.name: The stranger in the mask mentioned the empress's court. I need to get involved somehow. A caravan, perhaps...?

52000149_QD__MAIN__0-Quest2017_2-.name: He looks as if he could wake up at any moment, but he's been this way for days now.

52000149_QD__MAIN__1-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm searching for a way to awaken him, but I can't let anyone know what I'm doing.

52010001_QD__MAIN__0--.name: Who told you to take out the fire...

52010001_QD__MAIN__2--.name: We have... the light... it shows which way he went...

52010001_QD__MAIN__3--.name: Ooh... The glorious path of the Scion of Light...

52010003_QD__MAIN__0--.name: Tada! I wasn't late, was I?

52010003_QD__MAIN__1--.name: Who's that handsome guy standing outside? He's totally $npcName:11001298$'s type...

52010003_QD__MAIN__3--.name: Hmm? Yes! I'm $npcName:11001288$. Who're you, lady?

52010003_QD__MAIN__4--.name: Ah... I guess I look like an old woman to you...

52010003_QD__MAIN__5--.name: Either way, I'm really glad to meet you and I'm relieved that you're safe. I'm $npcName:11001478$, the empress who protects Maple World.

52010003_QD__MAIN__6--.name: Ah! The empress that's been looking for me...?

52010003_QD__MAIN__7--.name: Ah! Sorry for being so casual before. Please forget that I ever talked like that.

52010003_QD__MAIN__8--.name: But why were you looking for me?

52010003_QD__MAIN__9--.name: $npcName:11001288$! Listen closely to what I'm about to tell you.

52010003_QD__MAIN__12--.name: I'm going back. I'm going back to Drachenheim right this instant!

52010003_QD__MAIN__13--.name: You all made it safely! Did you find the lumenstone?

52010003_QD__MAIN__15--.name: She's weak, but now that the lumenstone has been found, she'll recover in time. Did you discover who moved the lumenstone to Lubelisk?

52010003_QD__MAIN__16--.name: It was $npcName:11003053$... He was the one leading Kargon, the one who betrayed the lumarigons! He was trying to transform the lumenstone's light into darkness!

52010003_QD__MAIN__17--.name: We weren't able to capture him. We almost had him... but he disappeared!

52010003_QD__MAIN__18--.name: I'm sure he'll resurface sooner or later... Before he does, $npcName:11001288$ will have to recover her original form as a lumarigon, full of light.

52010004_QD__BATTLE01__0--.name: I knew it. I was no match for Vasara Chen...

52010004_QD__BATTLE01__1--.name: Hey, who're you? Another Blackstar goon?! I'm not really up for another fight...

52010004_QD__BATTLE01__2--.name: But I've got to protect my friends!

52010005_QD__ACT02__0--.name: You're here! I've been waiting for so long! Did you find the goods?

52010005_QD__ACT02__1--.name: $npcName:11001258$ is waiting. Hurry and get them to her!

52010005_QD__ACT03__1--.name: $npcName:11001288$... You must have felt your mom's presence...

52010005_QD__ACT03__2--.name: I will collect my mother's memories no matter what!

52010005_QD__ACT03__3--.name: I'll close this area off while you search for the memory fragments. The one who's read my memories may come looking.

52010006_QD__MAIN__0--.name: Oof... Didn't quite stick that landing. Now where did—my necklace! That jerk stole my necklace!

52010006_QD__MAIN__1--.name: That's enough out of you. You are of no use to me without the Lumenstone.

52010006_QD__MAIN__2--.name: I've had enough of that nova's meddling in Master $npcName:11001813$'s affairs.

52010006_QD__MAIN__4--.name: Street rats... I'll return you to the gutter, where you belong.

52010006_QD__MAIN__5--.name: The plan should be underway by now. It was fun, but I don't have time to toy with you.

52010006_QD__MAIN__6--.name: You should be grateful. I won't show you mercy if we meet again.

52010006_QD__MAIN__7--.name: Big words coming from someone who's running away! At least $npcName:11001288$ is safe.

52010006_QD__MAIN__8--.name: She's in shock. Let's get her to the shop so she can get some rest.

52010006_QD__MAIN__9--.name: Sorry I doubted you before, $MyPCName$. You really pulled through for us. Thanks.

52010007_QD__MAIN__0--.name: So... we've found the map but... it's ripped. What do we do?

52010007_QD__MAIN__1--.name: This hero found the ripped pieces of the map. Let's see... how about we take a look and try to piece it together?

52010007_QD__MAIN__5--.name: It's the Nazkar Main Hall! The entrance of the Lubelisk! Let's go! We have to find the lumenstone!

52010007_QD__MAIN__8--.name: The moment the lumenstone leaves the Lubelisk, the Sanctum of Light will disappear into darkness once more.

52010007_QD__MAIN__9--.name: Once you find the lumenstone, come to the Karkar Embassy. I'll be waiting with Mika.

52010008_QD__CATCHJAILBREAKER01__0--.name: Ha! Here you are! Did you really think you wouldn't get caught?

52010008_QD__CATCHJAILBREAKER01__1--.name: I told you, no one escapes Alikar... You think you're both so brave?

52010008_QD__CATCHJAILBREAKER01__2--.name: I'll drag you back to Alikar first, then we'll discuss your crimes!

52010009_QD__MAIN__0--.name: That could have been dangerous. Thanks.

52010009_QD__MAIN__1--.name: Whew... That scared the crap out of me.

52010009_QD__MAIN__2--.name: Sheesh... That could have been bad.

52010013_QD__MAIN__1--.name: $npcName:11001298$ has a keen eye when it comes to people.

52010013_QD__MAIN__3--.name: Someone who's journeyed all the way from Victoria Island to find you.

52010013_QD__MAIN__4--.name: $npcName:11001288$ has something to tell you, so I'm going to test them to see if they can be trusted.

52010013_QD__MAIN__5--.name: Ah, I don't know! I don't know what you're talking about. I'm hungry. Let's eat and talk.

52010013_QD__MAIN__6--.name: $npcName:11001288$... You... You just had a snack...

52010013_QD__MAIN__7--.name: Yeah, a snack... I need a meal! I want to eat your omelet. Let's go!

52010013_QD__MAIN__8--.name: Haaa... Maybe it's because you're a lumarigon... Your food cravings are...

52010013_QD__MAIN__9--.name: Hey, you, friend! You should come to our restaurant, too. Let's talk more there.

52010014_QD__MAIN__1--.name: Huh? It's that guy from before. Ah, whatever. I'm hungry.

52010017_QD__MAIN__0--.name: What are you doing? Hurry on up here!

52010017_QD__MAIN__4--.name: The last one is over there!

52010017_QD__MAIN__5--.name: All the fragments of light have been found!

52010017_QD__MAIN__6--.name: I can feel the power of light... I think I can open a path! Let's get back to the Sanctum of Light!

52010018_QD__MAIN__0--.name: Empress! $npcName:11001288$ found them all. The sacred stones of lumarigon.

52010018_QD__MAIN__1--.name: Thank you everyone. $npcName:11001288$... Do you feel something?

52010018_QD__MAIN_2__0--.name: Everyone... thank you so much. Thank you for leading me here.

52010018_QD__MAIN_2__1--.name: $npcName:11001288$... I hope that the dracheheim and lumarigon can find their places once again...

52010018_QD__MAIN_2__2--.name: Yes... I'll be sure to return with a joyous smile. I have to go now...

52010020_QD__MAIN__0--.name: Nom, nom, nom... Delicious. Better order another one once I finish this.

52010020_QD__MAIN__1--.name: Exactly how many more dishes am I going to have to make...? And why are you the only guest?

52010020_QD__MAIN__2--.name: I brought a flyer! If I bring 5 thousand mesos, I can eat as much as I want, right?

52010021_QD__MAIN__0--.name: I brought a flyer! I can eat as many $npcName:11001292$ omelets as I want, right?

52010021_QD__MAIN__1--.name: The restaurant lights stayed on throughout the night...

52010021_QD__MAIN__2--.name: And everyone had a great time filling their bellies with delicious food.

52010023_QD__MAIN__0--.name: I have to go this way, right?

52010027_QD__MAIN__8-Quest2017_2-.name: Who are they? Minions of the ragged wraith?!

52010027_QD__MAIN__9-Quest2017_2-.name: I can sort that out later. First, I'd better help those villagers!

52010027_QD__MAIN__15-Quest2017_2-.name: Be honored, Interloper. You get to witness the might of the Inakimo!

52010027_QD__MAIN__19-Quest2017_2-.name: I won't let you get away with this!

52010027_QD__MAIN__22-Quest2017_2-.name: Defeat the enemies and save the villagers

52010027_QD__MAIN__23-Quest2017_2-.name: You're better than I expected! But can you survive this?

52010027_QD__MAIN__26-Quest2017_2-.name: Bow before the power of darkness!

52010027_QD__MAIN__28-Quest2017_2-.name: At first, I found your efforts amusing. But I have grown impatient!

52010027_QD__MAIN__29-Quest2017_2-.name: You will not keep me from the Dark Lapenta Fragment.

52010027_QD__MAIN__31-Quest2017_2-.name: Hey, $npc:11003391$. Is it just me, or is the village under attack?

52010027_QD__MAIN__37-Quest2017_2-.name: Look at that! I thought I heard people screaming earlier...

52010027_QD__MAIN__38-Quest2017_2-.name: The Vayar should be here by now!

52010027_QD__MAIN__39-Quest2017_2-.name: These weaklings want a piece of the champion? What a waste of my time!

52010027_QD__MAIN__40-Quest2017_2-.name: Hmph. It seems more pests have arrived.

52010027_QD__MAIN__41-Quest2017_2-.name: I shall retreat... for now. But I will return for the Dark Lapenta Fragment, and then there will be a reckoning!

52010027_QD__MAIN__42-Quest2017_2-.name: Hey, $npcName:11003391$! They got one look of your ugly mug and took off running.

52010027_QD__MAIN__44-Quest2017_2-.name: Where are the Vayar? They let the villagers get hurt.

52010027_QD__MAIN__46-Quest2017_2-.name: Whoa! Where'd you come from? Were you here the whole time?

52010027_QD__MAIN__49-Quest2017_2-.name: Somebody's going after the Seven Heroes. $npcName:29000250$ and $npcName:11001573$ have already been attacked. I'm here to help keep $npcName:11000134$ safe!

52010027_QD__MAIN__50-Quest2017_2-.name: What is $male:he,female:she$ jabbering about? $npc:11003391$, why don't you take care of $male:him,female:her$?

52010027_QD__MAIN__51-Quest2017_2-.name: <font size='20'>What the–? Something about this kid's got me shaking with fear...</font>

52010027_QD__MAIN__54-Quest2017_2-.name: Sure, sure. Hey, you! Follow us.

52010027_QD__MAIN__55-Quest2017_2-.name: Use the portal to move to $map:02000051$

52010027_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003101__3-Quest.name: Where is the Dark Lapenta Shard...?

52010027_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003101__5-Quest.name: You again? It seems I can't escape you, no matter where I go.

52010027_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003101__6-Quest.name: What are you doing here? Does this mean you and $npc:11003391$...?

52010027_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003101__7-Quest.name: That Murpagoth dog? My wise woman said something about him, but...

52010027_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003101__8-Quest.name: I am to be king of Perion. I have no time for you or him.

52010027_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003101__10-Ques.name: It's time to end this. I'm sure you're as sick of me as I am of you.

52010027_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003101__11-Ques.name: This will be our final meeting!

52010027_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003101__13-Ques.name: Witness the true strength of the Inakimo!

52010027_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003102__0-Quest.name: I lost...? Have I not recovered my full power...?

52010027_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003102__2-Quest.name: I don't know what you are talking about, but you've lost.

52010027_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003102__3-Quest.name: You and the Inakimo will never rule Perion.

52010027_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003102__4-Quest.name: Heheheh... You fool... You did not defeat me. I was tricked!

52010027_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003102__5-Quest.name: And you will be next. A venomous serpent is after Perion.

52010027_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003102__6-Quest.name: The evil of the Inakimo knows no end...

52010027_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003102__8-Quest.name: What did he say about a serpent?

52010027_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003102__9-Quest.name: I'd better get back to $map:02000051$, and fast!

52010028_QD__MAIN__2-Quest2017_2-.name: Ow ow ow... I feel like I was falling forever...

52010028_QD__MAIN__4-Quest2017_2-.name: Is this the inside of the hourglass?

52010028_QD__MAIN__5-Quest2017_2-.name: Did $npcName:11000134$ and $npcName:11000009$ also fall down here...?

52010028_QD__MAIN__7-Quest2017_2-.name: I hear a voice! It might be $npcName:11000009$.

52010028_QD__MAIN__9-Quest2017_2-.name: Whew. I was worried I'd be lost in there forever!

52010028_QD__MAIN__12-Quest2017_2-.name: I can't hold out... much longer...

52010028_QD__MAIN__19-Quest2017_2-.name: The enemies of the Inakimo must perish.

52010028_QD__MAIN__24-Quest2017_2-.name: Y-yeah... You just take a nap...

52010028_QD__MAIN__27-Quest2017_2-.name: Can we get out of here now?

52010028_QD__MAIN__29-Quest2017_2-.name: I hope we aren't too late.

52010028_QD__MAIN__31-Quest2017_2-.name: We can discuss the details later. Everyone, help me with $npcName:11000134$ and $npcName:11000009$!

52010029_QD__MAIN__9-Quest2017_2-.name: That big stone guy... is it the Vayar?

52010029_QD__MAIN__17-Quest2017_2-.name: You won't get away with this!

52010029_QD__MAIN__18-Quest2017_2-.name: What a waste. The son of a great Inakimo, reduced to one of Murpagoth's dogs.

52010029_QD__MAIN__19-Quest2017_2-.name: Shut up! I'm no Inakimo. I'm the strongest warrior in $map:02000051$!

52010029_QD__MAIN__20-Quest2017_2-.name: Blinded to the truth, are you?

52010029_QD__MAIN__23-Quest2017_2-.name: The ability to harness that darkness... It's in your blood!

52010029_QD__MAIN__24-Quest2017_2-.name: You belong with us, your brothers and sisters.

52010029_QD__MAIN__25-Quest2017_2-.name: Join me, and become the greatest warrior our tribe has ever known!

52010029_QD__MAIN__32-Quest2017_2-.name: Ah, the outsider. We meet again.

52010029_QD__MAIN__38-Quest2017_2-.name: You will foil my plans no more!

52010029_QD__MAIN__39-Quest2017_2-.name: $npcPlural:21000994$! Put an end to our meddling visitor!

52010029_QD__MAIN__42-Quest2017_2-.name: I must admit, I'm impressed. But you're too late!

52010029_QD__MAIN__49-Quest2017_2-.name: As you can see, the $npc:11003392$ has submitted. Soon it will be my perfect servant.

52010029_QD__MAIN__50-Quest2017_2-.name: My business here is done. All that remains is the Dark Lapenta Shard.

52010029_QD__MAIN__51-Quest2017_2-.name: Bear witness to the end of the Murpagoth, and the crowning of $map:02000051$'s first king!

52010029_QD__MAIN__53-Quest2017_2-.name: This is bad! I need to warn the others.

52010029_QD__MAIN__55-Quest2017_2-.name: <font size='20'>I thought if I'd finally get the respect I deserve...</font>

52010029_QD__MAIN__56-Quest2017_2-.name: This is the fruit of all my hard work? Getting talked down to by this... this outsider?

52010029_QD__MAIN__57-Quest2017_2-.name: That was a close call. Are you hurt?

52010029_QD__MAIN__58-Quest2017_2-.name: <font size='20'>How much did $male:he,female:she$ hear? Does $male:he,female:she$ know what I am?</font>

52010029_QD__MAIN__63-Quest2017_2-.name: Anyway, we need to get back to the town and warn everyone.

52010029_QD__MAIN__66-Quest2017_2-.name: You're gonna tell them I'm Inakimo. You're gonna get me exiled!

52010029_QD__MAIN__68-Quest2017_2-.name: I won't let you ruin my life!

52010029_QD__MAIN__71-Quest2017_2-.name: Why do you care so much about being the strongest?

52010029_QD__MAIN__72-Quest2017_2-.name: If I'm strong, the others won't look down on me. They'll have to accept me...

52010029_QD__MAIN__75-Quest2017_2-.name: Look, I may be an outsider, but it's obvious that everyone in $map:02000051$ loves you.

52010029_QD__MAIN__76-Quest2017_2-.name: Shut up! I don't want your pity. You don't know anything...

52010029_QD__MAIN__77-Quest2017_2-.name: I've always been different. That's why I've gotta prove I can carry my own weight...

52010029_QD__MAIN__78-Quest2017_2-.name: But the harder I tried, the more the others treated me like a burden... Maybe it's because I really am an Inakimo...

52010029_QD__MAIN__80-Quest2017_2-.name: This... this is my life, you twerp!

52010029_QD__MAIN__81-Quest2017_2-.name: $map:02000051$ is in danger! If you want the others to respect you... If you want to be the greatest warrior...

52010029_QD__MAIN__82-Quest2017_2-.name: Then stop whining and help me save $map:02000051$!

52010029_QD__MAIN__83-Quest2017_2-.name: If you'd rather sit here and make excuses, instead... then it's no wonder nobody takes you seriously.

52010029_QD__MAIN__85-Quest2017_2-.name: I'm going back to $map:02000051$. Follow me if you want. I don't care!

52010030_QD__MAIN__0-Quest2017_2-.name: How much more do I gotta take...?

52010030_QD__MAIN__1-Quest2017_2-.name: If I go back to $map:02000051$ now, nothing will change.

52010030_QD__MAIN__2-Quest2017_2-.name: They ignore me... They mock me...

52010030_QD__MAIN__3-Quest2017_2-.name: I just want to be accepted by them.

52010030_QD__MAIN__5-Quest2017_2-.name: But they'll abandon me just because I'm Inakimo?

52010030_QD__MAIN__7-Quest2017_2-.name: This is no place for you.

52010030_QD__MAIN__9-Quest2017_2-.name: I am the one who will lead you to your destiny.

52010030_QD__MAIN__10-Quest2017_2-.name: Don't you want to be Perion's greatest warrior?

52010032_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003079__0-Quest.name: For $npcName:29000250$ and $npcName:11001573$ to meet such fates...

52010032_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003079__1-Quest.name: Before you arrived, a mysterious army attacked $map:02000051$. I have no doubt that it's the same army you described.

52010032_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003079__2-Quest.name: The war chief cannot be allowed to face this danger unprepared.

52010032_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003079__4-Quest.name: $map:02000051$ is nearly defenseless right now. If we send our remaining warriors after the chief, then we'll be an easy target.

52010032_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003079__5-Quest.name: They can protect $map:02000051$. I'll go look for $npcName:11000134$.

52010032_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003079__6-Quest.name: You would do this for us, even when you owe nothing to our tribe?

52010032_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003079__7-Quest.name: I'm fighting for a better Maple World for everyone, no matter where they're from!

52010032_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003079__9-Quest.name: What? How can you trust a big job like this to an outsider?!

52010032_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003079__10-Ques.name: I'm the guy you oughta send to save the war chief!

52010032_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003079__11-Ques.name: The war chief asked you to defend $map:02000051$ from further attacks. Nothing more.

52010032_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003079__13-Ques.name: $npc:11003391$, you are needed in the $map:52010029$. You will find out why the Vayar have failed in their duties to protect our people.

52010032_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003079__14-Ques.name: Put any thoughts of pursuing the war chief out of your mind.

52010032_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003079__15-Ques.name: I'm sick of this! You oughta treat the town's strongest warrior with more respect!

52010032_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003079__16-Ques.name: Let's see how far you get without my help.

52010032_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003079__18-Ques.name: Leave him. $npc:11003391$ must learn that he is the one who is holding himself back.

52010032_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003079__19-Ques.name: $npc:11003388$, inform $npc:11000078$ of the situation. It appears we'll need his help.

52010033_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003078__0-Quest.name: It worked! Now $npc:11003389$ will have to make me a real doctor!

52010033_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003078__1-Quest.name: I asked you so nicely... But, in the end, you subjected my patients to your "treatments."

52010033_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003078__5-Quest.name: I know you're just trying to help people, but an untested treatment can do more harm than good.

52010033_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003078__6-Quest.name: Fortunately, it seems our patients are on their way to a full recovery. Just be more careful next time, please.

52010033_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003078__8-Quest.name: And you must be $MyPCName$. I've heard of you.

52010033_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003078__10-Ques.name: A pleasure. But please, let's find somewhere more comfortable to chat.

52010032_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003095__2-Quest.name: I'm certain this will cure the war chief.

52010032_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003095__3-Quest.name: $npcName:11000134$, heed my call... The holy light compels you!

52010032_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003095__10-Ques.name: The ritual was perfect! But the dark aura returned... and the war chief...

52010032_QD__MAIN_QUEST10003095__12-Ques.name: Don't worry. We'll find another way.

52010026_QD__MAIN__3-Quest2017-.name: Man oh man, I was sure you were done for...

52010026_QD__MAIN__4-Quest2017-.name: That dragon did a number on you back at the $map:63000041$.

52010026_QD__MAIN__9-Quest2017-.name: There's this one lady in the caravan, $npcName:11003343$...

52010026_QD__MAIN__10-Quest2017-.name: She went up the hill to gather herbs for all the hurt people.

52010026_QD__MAIN__12-Quest2017-.name: Somebody really oughta go after her.

52010026_QD__MAIN__13-Quest2017-.name: You know, to protect her from scary monsters.

52010026_QD__MAIN__18-Quest2017-.name: Fine. I'll take care of it.

52010026_QD__MAIN__41-Quest2017-.name: Go to $npc:11003343$ and ask for help.

52010026_QD__MAIN__46-Quest2017-.name: Hurry! We have to get them to safety!

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__1--.name: Trap Master is a game where you avoid the traps and try to survive until the end. Both the winner and loser will get prizes.

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__2--.name: Vanishing cubes! They appear to be drawing a shape. Move toward cubes that don't vanish and survive until the end!

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__3--.name: Let's start then! Are you ready?!

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__4--.name: The cubes are drawing a different shape and vanishing. Watch the ground!

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__5--.name: The cubes are drawing a different shape and vanishing. Watch the ground!

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__6--.name: The cubes are drawing a different shape and vanishing. Watch the ground!

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__7--.name: The final stage. Who will survive until the very end?

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__8--.name: Congratulations! You're the winner of Trap Master.

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__9--.name: Wow! Give a round of applause to our victorious winner!

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__10--.name: A special benefit for the winners! Empress  $npcName:11001478$'s blessing.

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__12--.name: An honorary bonus for the winners! Stand clear for thunderous wealth!

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__13--.name: A cheery bonus for the losers! Riches rolling in!

61000001_ME_001__MASSIVE00__14--.name: Everyone has been eliminated. Please try this challenge again next time.

61000001_ME_001__WAIT__0--.name: It will begin in just a moment. Please wait for others to join.

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__1--.name: Will you make it to the end? Win or lose, everyone gets a prize!

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__2--.name: The floor tiles will vanish one at a time. Don't fall!

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__4--.name: That was just a warm-up. The real game begins now!

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__5--.name: Wow, not bad! But it's not over yet!

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__6--.name: We've got some real survivors today. Who will make it to the end?

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__7--.name: Congratulations! You're the winner of Sole Survivor.

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__8--.name: Give a round of applause to our winner!

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__9--.name: For our survivor, we present the blessing of Empress $npcName:11001478$ herself.

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__11--.name: And an extra bonus for the winners!

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__12--.name: Here's a special gift for our losers. Enjoy!

61000002_ME_002__MASSIVE01__13--.name: It looks like everyone's out. Better luck next time!

61000002_ME_002__WAIT__0--.name: We're just about to begin. Please wait for more players.

61000003_ME_003__MAIN__0--.name: Maple World's greatest MC welcomes you!

61000003_ME_003__MAIN__1--.name: It's time for the Maple OX Quiz!

61000003_ME_003__MAIN__2--.name: Read each statement carefully, then move to the O (true) or X (false) platform.

61000003_ME_003__MAIN__12--.name: Wow, you're a quiz master! Congratulations on your win!

61000003_ME_003__MAIN__13--.name: Too bad. Better luck next time!

61000003_ME_003__MAIN__15--.name: Sit tight. We'll send you back to the real world!

61000003_ME_003__WAIT__0--.name: The fun is about to begin!

61000004_ME__NOTICE__0--.name: You made it to the end. Go through the portal and claim your reward.

61000004_ME__TRIGGER_01__0--.name: Climb to the top of the tower before time runs out.

61000004_ME__WAIT__0--.name: It will begin in just a moment. Please wait for others to join.

61000005_ME__MAINPROCESS__1--.name: The game's going to start now!

61000005_ME__MAINPROCESS__2--.name: You've reached the center of the cave.

61000005_ME__MAINPROCESS__3--.name: If you step on the red platform, you'll go to the center of the cave!

61000005_ME__MAINPROCESS__4--.name: If you survive until the end, I'll give you a prize!

61000005_ME__MAINPROCESS__6--.name: While drawing a special shape, the floor will disappear. Try and survive!

61000005_ME__MAINPROCESS__7--.name: This time, it's a different shape. Watch carefully!

61000005_ME__MAINPROCESS__8--.name: This is the last shape. Focus, focus!

61000005_ME__MAINPROCESS__9--.name: Winners! You sure are grand! As promised, the winners will receive a prize and $npc:11000441$'s blessing!

61000005_ME__MAINPROCESS__10--.name: Those who were eliminated, don't be too hard on yourselves! Try again next time!

61000005_ME__MAINPROCESS__11--.name: Oh my... Everyone's been eliminated! Try again next time!

61000005_ME__WAIT__0--.name: Sit tight until your friends join! The game will begin soon!

61000006_ME__TRIGGER_03__0--.name: Reach the goal before time runs out!

61000006_ME__WAIT__0--.name: It will begin in just a moment. Please wait for others to join.

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__0-.name: Get ready. We're about to start!

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__1-.name: Let's get you to the playing field.

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__3-.name: At the start of each round, parts of the floor will shake.

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__4-.name: Find solid ground and survive to round 5 to win.

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__15.name: Congratulations! You're the winner of Spring Beach.

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__16.name: Give a round of applause for our winner!

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__19.name: And an extra bonus for the winners!

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__20.name: Here's a special gift for our losers. Enjoy!

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__21.name: Looks like everyone's out. That's too bad!

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__22.name: Now that the game is over, why don't you enjoy this lovely beach for a while?

61000007_ME__MAINPROCESS_SPRINGBEACH__23.name: In 2 minutes, we'll send you back to where you were before.

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__0--.name: It's time to Dance! Dance! Stop!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__1--.name: Dance to the beat and match the numbers on the floor!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__2--.name: When you have enough dancers on your platform, no one else can join!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__3--.name: Match the number of dancers to the number on your tile... or else!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__4--.name: Are you ready for our first dance?

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__5--.name: Nice moves you've got there! Time for dance break number two!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__6--.name: You're not tired already, are you? Time for dance break number three!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__7--.name: You're doing great. Time to let loose with another bonus dance!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__8--.name: The last dance, already? Let's turn it up to 11!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__9--.name: You guys sure know how to dance!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__10--.name: You can do better than that. Go again! It's dance time!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__11--.name: That's the spirit! You've got moves!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__12--.name: Follow the beat! Dance with all your heart! Again!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__14--.name: We're having way too much fun to stop now!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__16--.name: Ready for more? Dance, dance, dance!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__17--.name: Is it getting hot in here or what? Round 1 is gonna begin! You have 30 seconds!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__18--.name: Look at you shine! For round 2, you have 20 seconds!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__19--.name: That's the spirit. Round 3! You have 15 seconds!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__20--.name: Wow, you guys are amazing! Time for Round 4! You have 10 seconds!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__21--.name: Are we at the last round already? Round 5, go! You have 10 seconds!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__22--.name: Now for an extra special round. Go for numbers greater than 5!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__23--.name: Nab a red platform for better rewards. You have 15 seconds!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__24--.name: We're going all out in round 4! Go for numbers greater than 10!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__25--.name: Snag a red platform for an amazing bonus! You have 10 seconds!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__26--.name: Okay, big winners! Everyone who qualifies gets a bonus!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__27--.name: That wasn't too hard, was it? There's still another round!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__28--.name: What a shame. I hope you all come back to dance again!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__29--.name: Congratulations on winning, you dance maniac!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__30--.name: I can't wait to party with you again!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__31--.name: Time to dance back to where you came from!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__33--.name: You ready for your final dance? Time to pull out all the stops!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__34--.name: You guys sure know how to dance!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__35--.name: You can do better than that. Go again! It's dance time!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__36--.name: You guys sure know how to dance!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__37--.name: You can do better than that. Go again! It's dance time!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__38--.name: You guys sure know how to dance!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__39--.name: You can do better than that. Go again! It's dance time!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__40--.name: You guys sure know how to dance!

61000008_ME__01_MASSIVEMAIN__41--.name: You can do better than that. Go again! It's dance time!

61000010_ME__BUFFSKILL__0--.name: A flame has blossomed in the center of the arena.

61000010_ME__PVP__0--.name: Are you ready for a free-for-all fight?

61000010_ME__PVP__1--.name: You'll get 100 points for each KO and lose 50 points when you're knocked out.

61000010_ME__PVP__2--.name: The higher your score, the greater your rewards!

61000010_ME__PVP__3--.name: It's time to begin this bloody battle in the mine.

61000010_ME__PVP__5--.name: Not enough participants to proceed. The match will end.

61000010_ME__WAIT__0--.name: At least 5 participants must be gathered to proceed. Please stand by until more players join.

61000011_ME__ENTER__0--.name: Face off against random opponents in the arena. Last hero standing wins!

61000011_ME__ENTER__1--.name: Don't fall into the lava. It's hot!

61000011_ME__ENTER__2--.name: A special perk for the winner: Empress $npcName:11001478$'s blessing!

61000011_ME__ENTER__3--.name: A bonus for the winner! Here comes the onyx!

61000011_ME__ENTER__4--.name: Here's a special gift for our losers. Enjoy!

61000011_ME__WAIT__0--.name: At least 5 participants must be gathered to proceed. Please stand by until more players join.

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__0--.name: Ah, you've regained consciousness. Can you walk on your own?

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__1--.name: Hmm. Your magic feels unstable... Well, at least you can travel.

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__2--.name: We must return to $map:63000012$. Do you remember the way?

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__3--.name: We should hurry. Terrun Calibre hasn't issued a draft in our lifetime...

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__4--.name: But the crisis at hand warrants it.

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__5--.name: $npcName:11001230$ has temporarily taken on the role of Elder Blade.

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__6--.name: Whatever happens next, you must be strong.

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__7--.name: This bridge is old and rotted... I'll cross over first to make sure it's safe. You can follow as soon as I'm across.

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__9--.name: You ought to be more careful. Are you all right?  See if you can find another way up.

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__10--.name: Stop splashing around and get up here. I'm going on ahead.

63000006_CS__TUTORIAL01__11--.name: You have your task and I have mine. I'll see you again soon.

63000015_CS__INTRO01__0--.name: It takes a lot of guts to barge into Blackstar's stronghold alone. It seems you're as fearless as your namesake.

63000015_CS__INTRO01__1--.name: My men say you're looking for some folks. I wonder if you've considered how your recklessness might affect these people?

63000015_CS__INTRO01__2--.name: Hahaha... All right, let's have a chat, you and me.

63000015_CS__INTRO01__3--.name: The truth is, I admire people like you who are so full of spirit... A $male:man,female:woman$ on a mission.

63000015_CS__INTRO01__4--.name: Sadly, I can't just let you waltz out of here. Hmm... what to do?

63000015_CS__INTRO01__5--.name: Boss, what are you waiting for?

63000015_CS__INTRO01__7--.name: Say the word and I'll ice $male:him,female:her$!

63000015_CS__INTRO01__8--.name: Idiots... Enough. You really think you're a match for our friend here? I'll be the judge of that.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__0--.name: So you're the Gray Wolf I've heard so much about. Quite a number you've done on our little hideout.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__1--.name: The Boss wants me to show you the way to $map:63000020$... I hear you'll be going up against the Champ.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__2--.name: This corridor will get us halfway there.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__3--.name: There's an elevator at the end that goes to an underground passage leading to the arena.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__4--.name: With all the hubbub, I expected you to be some kind of three-eyed monster.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__5--.name: You're not at all what I imagined. Well, follow me.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__6--.name: Did you really do all this?

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__9--.name: But $map:63000020$'s champion is something else entirely...

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__11--.name: I wonder if you could really beat him?

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__12--.name: I'll see about getting you an escort through the underground passage. Just a moment.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__13--.name: It's me. I'm sending our friend down to you now. You are to escort them to the arena.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__14--.name: Your fight with the Champ will take place after today's tournament concludes.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__15--.name: Now, I'd best be off. I have important matters to attend to.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__16--.name: Here... Just in case things go badly in the ring. These herbs have healing properties.

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__17--.name: Although, I'm not sure someone as strong as you will need them...

63000016_CS__MEETJACEY01__18--.name: I look forward to seeing whether the rumors about you are true.

63000017_CS__CHAT01__0--.name: The Gray Wolf is really here?

63000017_CS__CHAT01__1--.name: Yeah, and $male:his,female:her$ skills are no joke!

63000017_CS__CHAT01__2--.name: Hm... Still, there's no way $male:he,female:she$ takes down the Champ.

63000017_CS__CHAT01__3--.name: I dunno man, this time, it could be really close...

63000017_CS__CHAT01__4--.name: Hey, hey! If you're not going to buy anything, go chitchat somewhere else!

63000018_CS__CHAT01__0--.name: I'll destroy you all with my nunchaku skills!

63000018_CS__CHAT01__1--.name: Hehehe... You won't act so tough once you've had a taste of my cudgel!

63000018_CS__CHAT01__2--.name: You think I'm afraid of that little stick? Hahaha!

63000018_CS__CHAT02__0--.name: Do you think any of those guys have a shot at winning this?

63000018_CS__CHAT02__2--.name: I heard the Champ is basically a monster.

63000018_CS__CHAT02__3--.name: Hmph! I'll be the new Champ after today!

63000018_CS__CHAT03__0--.name: Did you see the odds for today's match?

63000018_CS__CHAT03__1--.name: I'm thinking of betting on myself and walking out of here a rich woman.

63000018_CS__CHAT03__2--.name: Oh, quit it. He'll pulverize you.

63000018_CS__CHAT03__3--.name: Tch. Maybe somebody'll be willing to take a dive.

63000019_CS__DRINKJUICE01__0--.name: Well, shall we get on with the match then?

63000019_CS__DRINKJUICE01__2--.name: Heheheh... It should be quite a show. All right, Gray Wolf. Let's see what you've got.

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__0--.name: Ladies and gentlemen, we have a special treat for you tonight—a surprise battle for the $map:63000020$ championship!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__1--.name: The rules are simple! Contenders will battle through three rounds of qualifiers. The last one standing earns the right to take on the reigning champion!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__2--.name: Introducing our first fighter, the gigantic, roguish... Sylva!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__3--.name: And their challenger, Kerning City's lonely beast! Graaaaay Wolf!!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__4--.name: Amazing! Our next contender is one foul fowl who never quacks under pressure... the immortal $npc:29000101$!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__5--.name: And their challenger, Kerning City's lonely beast! Graaaaay Wolf!!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__6--.name: Unbelievable! It was over in a flash! But our next contestant's no pushover. Here to crush his foes with lightning-fast nunchaku, it's $npc:29000102$!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__7--.name: And their challenger, Kerning City's lonely beast! Graaaaay Wolf!!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__8--.name: Astounding! The ravenous Gray Wolf has torn through all $male:his,female:her$ foes in the blink of an eye! But that was only a warm-up, folks. It's time for the main event!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__9--.name: ....Huh? What's going on? My head feels all wobbly...

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__10--.name: Am I imagining things? The dizziness seems to have passed.

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__11--.name: Slavering for the $map:63000020$ champion's belt, a wild beast has emerged from the shadows! The vigilante who took on 100 Blackstar gangsters and sent them all to the emergency room...

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__12--.name: Off to a riotous start in their $map:63000020$ debut, it's the hero of Woodward, the scourge of the streets, the one, the only, the Graaaaay Wooolf!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__13--.name: And here to defend his title tonight is a very familiar face. With an unassailable record of 47 wins, one tie and ZERO losses, it's the reigning champion of $map:63000020$!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__14--.name: Presenting the invulnerable Titanium Fist, the Reaper of the Ring, our undefeated hero. You know him, you love him, it's Vasara Chen!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__15--.name: Ladies and gents the battle of a lifetime is about to begin! ARE... YOU... READY?!

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__16--.name: It's about time. Let's see if you're as tough as they say.

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__17--.name: All right, Gray Wolf... Show me what you've got.

63000020_CS__BATTLE01__18--.name: What happened to that determination I sensed in you? That fire...? What a disappointment...

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__0--.name: When's this $male:guy,female:lady$ gonna wake up? I ain't got all day.

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__1--.name: You blockhead. Can't you see $male:he's,female:she's$ awake?

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__2--.name: What? Really? It's about time. Though I'm honestly surprised $male:he,female:she$ woke up at all.

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__4--.name: Sorry, Miss. This meathead's a real talker.

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__5--.name: What'd you say you scrawny little weirdo?

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__6--.name: Shut yer yap and show some respect in front of the chairwoman.

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__10--.name: $npcName:11003125$ you idiot, you're gonna get us in trouble.

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__11--.name: Keep talking and I'll knock that tiny head off your body.

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__12--.name: ...Sigh. The things I put up with.

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__13--.name: How are you feeling, Gray Wolf? Do you know where you are?

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__14--.name: <font color="#909090">(Crackle)</font> It's me. Yes, $male:he's,female:she's$ awake. <font color="#909090">(Crackle)</font> I was just about to send $male:him,female:her$ your way.

63000021_CS__WAKUP01__16--.name: As expected, the boss has called you to the VIP showroom. It's best you hurry along.

63000022_CS__BUSINESS01__0--.name: It seems you're finally back with us. Would you care for another drink?

63000022_CS__BUSINESS01__1--.name: I was looking forward to a more violent brawl... But still, it's been a while since we've had such an entertaining fight.

63000022_CS__BUSINESS01__2--.name: What's with the sour face? Are you angry that you lost to Vasara Chen? Don't be. He's simply out of your league.

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__0--.name: —You got all that? We can't let the Gray Wolf out of our sights or the boss'll have our heads.

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__1--.name: Who do you think you're lecturing? Any more of your arrogant whining and I'll knock you on your butt.

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__2--.name: Are you kidding me? Your idiocy is the reason we keep getting called out. If you don't want to hear it, then get your act together.

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__3--.name: And by the way, you wouldn't last three seconds in the ring with me. Boss paired us up so I could babysit you.

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__4--.name: What'd you say you beardy little weirdo?!

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__6--.name: You promised you wouldn't call me that!

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__7--.name: Hey, you started it! And it's your name ain't it? I think I'll call you by your full name from now on!

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__8--.name: HAHAHA! $npcName:11000708$! You look like a bear, but you've got a name like a snot-nosed little rich girl.

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__9--.name: Grrr... At least I don't look like some ugly little creep!

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__10--.name: You look like somebody who hangs out in an alley selling ladies' undergarments!

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__11--.name: Oh yeah? You want a piece of me?!

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__12--.name: Oh yeah? You want a piece of me?!

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__13--.name: Of all the people to be paired with, I'm stuck with these children... At least I won't have to suffer alone, eh Gray Wolf?

63000023_CS__GOTOTRIA01__14--.name: Well, I'll leave these idiots to you.

63000024_CS__WAKEUP01__0-SoulBinder-.name: Ah! Finally awake? You fainted again during training, so I brought you here. I'm used to it by now, but honestly... that's not the sort of thing anyone should get used to!

63000024_CS__WAKEUP01__1-SoulBinder-.name: Are you training too hard? There's no need to push yourself so much, you know.

63000024_CS__WAKEUP01__2-SoulBinder-.name: Goodness, you look ready to start right back up again! Such motivation... if I were you, I'd snuggle right back down in those sheets. Mmm...

63000024_CS__WAKEUP01__3-SoulBinder-.name: But if you're already up, I suppose we might as well get ready and go. All of your training equipment is there in the showcase, so why not grab it before I change my mind and steal that cozy bed of yours?

63000024_CS__WAKEUP01__4-SoulBinder-.name: Brother $npc:11001720$ will grill us again if we're late, so let's hurry!

63000025_CS__TRAINING01__0-SoulBinder-.name: So much for proper training. Do you think the path to enlightenment starts after sleeping away half the day?

63000025_CS__TRAINING01__1-SoulBinder-.name: $MyPCName$. Fainting is a sign that your mind and body are weak. I expect you to train as if your life depends on it. Because one day it will.

63000025_CS__TRAINING01__2-SoulBinder-.name: Brother, have some compassion. This kind of stress is the last thing $MyPCName$ needs now.

63000025_CS__TRAINING01__3-SoulBinder-.name: You're in no position to say that, Tinchai. Left on your own, you never would have left your room today. I expect twice the effort from you to make up for it!

63000025_CS__TRAINING01__4-SoulBinder-.name: Whaa-at? Gah, why did I say anything...

63000025_CS__TRAINING01__5-SoulBinder-.name: Get to it! The pillars await in the pond.

63000025_CS__TRAINING01__6-SoulBinder-.name: You look tired already. Enough talk of new skills, you need to strengthen your fundamentals.

63000025_CS__TRAINING01__7-SoulBinder-.name: For your next exercise, I want you to...

63000025_CS__TRAINING01__9-SoulBinder-.name: I don't know. My barrier charm is buzzing.

63000025_CS__TRAINING01__10-SoulBinder-.name: That means someone is tampering with the barrier stones!

63000025_CS__TRAINING01__11-SoulBinder-.name: It's possible, or it could be another problem. Regardless, we must investigate. $npc:11001656$, follow me.

63000025_CS__TRAINING01__12-SoulBinder-.name: Really? I thought you were going to check...

63000025_CS__TRAINING01__13-SoulBinder-.name: The barrier stones are scattered all over Halo Mountain, you layabout! Checking every stone would take me all day!

63000025_CS__TRAINING01__14-SoulBinder-.name: ...should've just made charms for each stone, then.

63000025_CS__TRAINING01__16-SoulBinder-.name: Hmm... I have a bad feeling about this...

63000025_CS__TRAINING01__17-SoulBinder-.name: Do I really need to tag along for this? I need my rest...

63000025_CS__TRAINING01__18-SoulBinder-.name: You need to shape up! Now, let's go!

63000025_CS__TRAINING01__19-SoulBinder-.name: Follow us to the South Lotus Glade. It's just through the pass here.

63000026_CS__FAINT01__0-SoulBinder-.name: Hah... Oh good, you're still here. Something's wrong, we need to get to Crescent Moon Cave right away...

63000026_CS__FAINT01__2-SoulBinder-.name: Oh, no! Come on, we can't let them get to the cave!

63000026_CS__FAINT01__3-SoulBinder-.name: $MyPCName$? Are you coming? I need your...

63000026_CS__FAINT01__4-SoulBinder-.name: No, NO! Wake up! We need to get to the cave before... Oh, why now?

63000027_CS__MISTERY01__1-SoulBinder-.name: ...In the end, we found ourselves here. Hardly ideal...

63000027_CS__MISTERY01__2-SoulBinder-.name: ...I did predict this. It was only a matter of time. They would come, for we could not keep them blind forever...

63000028_CS__BATTLE01__2-SoulBinder-.name: Huh... hah... $MyPCName$! Are you up? Great, because I could use a hand!

63000028_CS__BATTLE01__3-SoulBinder-.name: Whew... that was close. $MyPCName$, are you all right?

63000028_CS__BATTLE01__5-SoulBinder-.name: Junta! JUNTAAA! Where are you, you-

63000028_CS__BATTLE01__6-SoulBinder-.name: Hiyah! You cannot stand against me!

63000028_CS__BATTLE01__7-SoulBinder-.name: Oh, thank goodness... Where were you?!

63000028_CS__BATTLE01__8-SoulBinder-.name: I followed one of those creatures across the mountain, where they ambushed me. It took time to teach them the error of their ways and make my way back.

63000028_CS__BATTLE01__10-SoulBinder-.name: $npc:11001656$, $MyPCName$! We're going to find the master. Follow me!

63000028_CS__BATTLE01__11-SoulBinder-.name: I like that plan! Come on, $MyPCName$, let's go!

63000029_CS__CAVE01__1-SoulBinder-.name: That should be enough for now.

63000029_CS__CAVE01__7-SoulBinder-.name: There's no need for such commotion, I am well aware. Their dark power can be felt all across Halo Mountain.

63000029_CS__CAVE01__8-SoulBinder-.name: $MyPCName$, come to me. There is something I must tell you.

63000029_CS__CAVE01__9-SoulBinder-.name: Unwelcome guests? I expected a warmer reception!

63000029_CS__CAVE01__13-SoulBinder-.name: Halo Mountain, undefended... Clearly, you never thought I would return. What has it been, $npc:11001556$? 200 years or so?

63000029_CS__CAVE01__14-SoulBinder-.name: Kandura. I knew this darkness was your doing.

63000029_CS__CAVE01__15-SoulBinder-.name: It has been too long since we trained together. I had hoped that time would be kinder to you.

63000029_CS__CAVE01__16-SoulBinder-.name: Trained...? Was he a student of Guidance?

63000029_CS__CAVE01__17-SoulBinder-.name: Does it matter now? He's the one threatening Halo Mountain!

63000029_CS__CAVE01__18-SoulBinder-.name: He's also not someone to trifle with. I will handle this.

63000029_CS__CAVE01__19-SoulBinder-.name: $npc:11001778$, you betrayed Guidance 200 years ago. What business do you have with us now? Is this revenge for not being chosen as Guidance's successor?

63000029_CS__CAVE01__20-SoulBinder-.name: Revenge? Ha, how petty you must think me. Your little tree-hugger club means nothing to me. But the divine power of the Munakra is of great interest to me.

63000029_CS__CAVE01__21-SoulBinder-.name: So, I'll make this simple. Hand over the source of that power, and you can keep playing pretend heroes up here.

63000029_CS__CAVE01__22-SoulBinder-.name: The divine power... Why return for something that was lost centuries ago? You know as well as I, none of us have that power.

63000029_CS__CAVE01__23-SoulBinder-.name: And even if we did, we would never hand it to someone so consumed by darkness. Your demands are meaningless here.

63000029_CS__CAVE01__24-SoulBinder-.name: Don't play dumb with me. That power is hidden somewhere here. Of that I am certain.

63000029_CS__CAVE01__25-SoulBinder-.name: Then I am certain you are a fool. Whether you choose to listen or not, we have no power to give, and no will to cooperate with your evil schemes.

63000029_CS__CAVE01__26-SoulBinder-.name: Well, I did give you a choice. It would seem that today marks the end of Guidance's long and storied history.

63000029_CS__CAVE01__27-SoulBinder-.name: I will deal with $npc:11001556$. You lot, kill the rest!

63000029_CS__CAVE01__29-SoulBinder-.name: $npc:11001720$, $npc:11001656$... You must continue our work. Leave, and seek the voice of destiny.

63000029_CS__CAVE01__31-SoulBinder-.name: We all have our place on the great wheel of fate. And this is mine.

63000029_CS__CAVE01__33-SoulBinder-.name: Enough of this. I'm eager to finish the fight we began 200 years ago.

63000029_CS__CAVE01__34-SoulBinder-.name: Listen to me, $npc:11001720$! Take the others and go!

63000029_CS__CAVE01__37-SoulBinder-.name: Gah... We've got no choice! Tinchai, $MyPCName$, follow me!

63000030_CS__FLYINGCLOUD01__2-SoulBinder.name: T-these monsters! Burning our mountain, our home... No, I'll go back and show them all! I'll avenge...

63000030_CS__FLYINGCLOUD01__3-SoulBinder.name: Enough! Would you really defy the master and dishonor his sacrifice?

63000030_CS__FLYINGCLOUD01__4-SoulBinder.name: There's just three of us now! If you go off and get yourself killed, what will become of Guidance? Look at you, you're not even in any condition to fight.

63000030_CS__FLYINGCLOUD01__5-SoulBinder.name: Nonsense! I have all the... Agh!

63000030_CS__FLYINGCLOUD01__6-SoulBinder.name: No more of your bluster. You're a disciple of Guidance, so act like it. You heard what the master said. We all have a place on the great wheel of fate.

63000030_CS__FLYINGCLOUD01__7-SoulBinder.name: Now that the master is gone, the only person who can lead Guidance is you. That is your place, not lying cold on this mountain.

63000030_CS__FLYINGCLOUD01__10-SoulBinde.name: ...Fine. There is wisdom in your words, $npc:11001656$. I lost myself there... and I apologize. So, what do we do now?

63000030_CS__FLYINGCLOUD01__11-SoulBinde.name: We haven't had a moment to think since those creatures appeared. Now might be a good time to collect ourselves.

63000030_CS__FLYINGCLOUD01__13-SoulBinde.name: But I have no expectation of them helping us.

63000030_CS__FLYINGCLOUD01__14-SoulBinde.name: I know, but it's still our best option right now.

63000030_CS__FLYINGCLOUD01__15-SoulBinde.name: With just the three of us, we need as much support as possible.

63000030_CS__FLYINGCLOUD01__16-SoulBinde.name: We can't dismiss any opportunity yet.

63000030_CS__FLYINGCLOUD01__19-SoulBinde.name: You two go on ahead. I will hold them off!

63000030_CS__FLYINGCLOUD01__20-SoulBinde.name: You can't stop them on your own! $MyPCName$, get on the cloud! We'll buy you some time!

63000030_CS__PUSH02__0-SoulBinder-.name: $MyPCName$, you fool! Why do you hesitate? Get on the cloud!

63000030_CS__PUSH02__1-SoulBinder-.name: $MyPCName$, don't worry about us... The fate of Guidance is in your hands now!

63000035_CS__REPORT01__0-SoulBinder-.name: Detecting biometric response to Destiny Wave effect! Shifting scan modes... Code R initializing... Contact! We have full resonance response!

63000035_CS__REPORT01__1-SoulBinder-.name: Analyzing source... It's them! The lost child! Calculating location coordinates... M5750, point GE 0-64!

63000035_CS__REPORT01__2-SoulBinder-.name: Interesting. They actually managed to survive. And those coordinates... Halo Mountain, is it? I say, it's been so very long now...

63000035_CS__REPORT01__3-SoulBinder-.name: Prepare the shadows. I will lead the strike on Halo Mountain myself. I've an old friend there I really should visit... Heh, heh.

63000036_CS__LISTEN01__0-SoulBinder-.name: $npc:11001778$, sir, all of Guidance's members have escaped. Shall we proceed to phase 4?

63000036_CS__LISTEN01__1-SoulBinder-.name: $npc:11001556$... You managed to foil my plan after all. But in the end, it hardly matters. Yes, begin phase 4 immediately.

63000036_CS__LISTEN01__2-SoulBinder-.name: The road shifts, but the destination remains the same. Absolute power will soon be mine!

65000001_BD__ENTER__0--.name: The hero who survives all of the random face-offs to the very end will receive a reward.

65000001_BD__ENTER__1--.name: Make sure you don't fall into the lava.

65000001_BD__ENTER__2--.name: Not enough members to progress with the match. The match will end.

65000001_BD__ENTER__3--.name: A special perk for the winners: Empress $npc:11001478$'s blessing!

65000001_BD__ENTER__5--.name: Valor tokens to console the loser.

65000001_BD__WAIT__0--.name: At least 5 participants must be gathered to proceed. Please stand by until more players join.

65000001_BD__WAIT__1--.name: At least 5 participants must be gathered to proceed. Please stand by until more players join.

65000001_BD__WAIT__2--.name: At least 5 participants must be gathered to proceed. Please stand by until more players join.

65000002_BD__BUFFSKILL__0--.name: A flame has blossomed in the center of the arena.

65000002_BD__PVP__0--.name: Are you ready for a free-for-all fight?

65000002_BD__PVP__1--.name: You'll get 100 points for each KO and lose 50 points when you're knocked out.

65000002_BD__PVP__2--.name: The higher your score, the greater your rewards!

65000002_BD__PVP__3--.name: It's time to begin this bloody battle in the mine.

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__0-GuildMini.name: Welcome to Dance, Dance, Stop! In this mini-game, your guild members will team up to take on another guild!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__1-GuildMini.name: Dance to the rhythm of the music and match the number that appears on the platform!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__2-GuildMini.name: The team with the greater number of surviving members wins the round. The first guild to reach 3 points, or the guild with the most points at the end is the winner!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__3-GuildMini.name: Once the correct number of people from the same team gather on a platform, no one else will be able to get on!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__4-GuildMini.name: Shall we move on to the next round? Is everyone ready?

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__5-GuildMini.name: Get on the stage if you want to play! You can have up to 30 people on one team!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__6-GuildMini.name: Get on the stage if you want to participate!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__7-GuildMini.name: Shall we warm up? Dance time number one!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__8-GuildMini.name: Yo! You guys sure know how to dance!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__9-GuildMini.name: Aw, you can do better than that! Go once again! Dance time!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__10-GuildMin.name: That's the spirit! You've got the moves!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__11-GuildMin.name: Follow the beat, dance with your heart! All right, one more time! Dance time!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__13-GuildMin.name: We're having way too much fun to stop now, right? Once more! Dance time!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__14-GuildMin.name: What fantastic dancers! Look at you all shine!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__15-GuildMin.name: Ready for some more?! Dance! One more time! Dance!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__16-GuildMin.name: Woo, is it getting hot in here or what? Round 1 is about to start!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__23-GuildMin.name: Now, it's time to decide who's participating in the next round! Everyone, return to the team lobby!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__24-GuildMin.name: Nice moves you've got there! Dance time number two!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__25-GuildMin.name: Impressive work, everyone! Let's start Round 2!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__32-GuildMin.name: You're not tired already, are you? Dance time number three!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__33-GuildMin.name: Oh yeah! That's the spirit! Round 3, start!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__40-GuildMin.name: You guys are all doing great. Let's go a bit more! Dance time number four!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__41-GuildMin.name: Wow, you guys are amazing! Time for Round 4!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__48-GuildMin.name: It's already the last dance?! Let's get this party started one last time!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__49-GuildMin.name: Yo! Is it the last round already?! Round 5, go go go!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__56-GuildMin.name: Wow! We already have a winner!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__57-GuildMin.name: Wait... is it already over? Looks like we have a winner...

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__58-GuildMin.name: Wow! We already have a winner!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__59-GuildMin.name: Wait... is it already over? Looks like we have a winner...

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__60-GuildMin.name: The enemy team didn't have enough members, and was forced to forfeit. Your guild won by default.

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__61-GuildMin.name: You don't have enough members to play. Your guild lost by default.

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__62-GuildMin.name: The enemy team didn't have enough members, and was forced to forfeit. Your guild won by default.

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__63-GuildMin.name: You don't have enough members to play. Your guild lost by default.

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__64-GuildMin.name: Neither team has enough members to play. The match has been canceled.

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__65-GuildMin.name: Time to dance back to where you came from!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__66-GuildMin.name: Now, let's take a look at who passed!

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__67-GuildMin.name: I'll start Round 1 now! Is everyone ready?

66200001_GD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__68-GuildMin.name: This is the last round! Everyone, ready?

02000295_BF__MAIN__7--.name: Save me save me save me!

02000295_BF__MAIN__14--.name: You take care of the arena!

02000295_BF__MAIN__15--.name: We'll take care of these deadbeats!

02000295_BF__MAIN__32--.name: Everything here seems to be under control. Good work.

02000296_BF__MAIN__0--.name: You've made it in one piece. There's someone up ahead.

02000296_BF__MAIN__3--.name: Eve is at the top of the tower. I can sense her...

02000296_BF__MAIN__4--.name: We'll take care of this level. You go get $npcName:11000523$!

02000296_BF__MAIN__7--.name: Let's get this over with and catch up to $npcName:11001236$.

02000296_BF__MAIN__8--.name: I have a bad feeling about this. Be careful.

02000329_BF__01_MAIN__2--.name: All my chickens are gone! Help me!

02000329_BF__01_MAIN__3--.name: I bet it was those mean monkeys!

02000345_BF__MAIN__1--.name: You're late! Let's start the shoot.

02000345_BF__MAIN__2--.name: Let's see, the scene we're about to shoot is...

02000345_BF__MAIN__3--.name: Let's see, the scene we're about to shoot is...

02000345_BF__MAIN__11--.name: Establishing shot, the Slime King arrives at the castle.

02000345_BF__MAIN__14--.name: You've come to take my castle from me?

02000345_BF__MAIN__15--.name: You've come to take my castle from me?

02000345_BF__MAIN__16--.name: I'll make you regret stepping foot in my home!

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__0--.name: The quest cannot be completed because your inventory is full. You will be returned to the original map.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__1--.name: The quest cannot be completed because your inventory is full. You will be returned to the original map.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__2--.name: The quest cannot be completed because your inventory is full. You will be returned to the original map.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__3--.name: Dark Sanctum: Black Moon Abyss Citadel

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__4--.name: This is a shameful turn of events, $npcName:11001811$. For my colleague to fail both at Henesys and at Perion...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__5--.name: And where were your Rooks when my soldiers were facing the Vayar?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__6--.name: You were supposed to support us!

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__7--.name: My liege, if you want him punished, then I will gladly—

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__8--.name: You think you can pin your failures on me?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__9--.name: I followed the $npcName:11001811$'s orders to the letter, you raggedy buffoon.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__10--.name: You, on the other hand, have failed twice now. You don't deserve your rank here.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__11--.name: You're digging your own grave, $npcName:11001815$. Shall I bury you in it?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__14--.name: Do you know why I have summoned you here?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__15--.name: If your incompetence continues, our plans in Ellinia are certain to fail.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__17--.name: While you fight amongst yourselves, our enemies move against us.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__18--.name: For such an entity to appear in Maple World... It was unexpected...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__19--.name: Who cares about $male:him,female:her$? I'm waaaay better than that stupid bug. I should've squished $male:him,female:her$ when I had the chance!

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__20--.name: Leave it to me. I'll wipe $MyPCName$ from the face of Maple World.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__23--.name: You've already had your fun in Kerning City. Now it's time to focus on greater things.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__24--.name: Good point. Kerning City was a ton of fun.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__25--.name: Just you wait. I'm gonna give you the best army! Better than any stinky old devil army. Something totally new!

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__26--.name: See to it that you do. But do it quietly. We cannot afford for the empress's pawns to learn our true plans.
