52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__27--.name: Fine, fine. I'll be nice and quiet.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__28--.name: I somehow don't think that "nice and quiet" will be enough.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__29--.name: $npc:11001820$ has made herself into the empire's most wanted criminal. Even those idiots in the guard are bound to stumble upon her lair sooner or later.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__30--.name: You think I can't handle some dummy guards?!

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__31--.name: We need a distraction. Something to keep them busy.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__32--.name: And who's going to do that? Even with the $npcName:11001811$'s express summons, we're missing over half of the commanders.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__34--.name: Ah, the red cape. Are you certain you're up to the task?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__35--.name: I'm the most qualified person for this job.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__36--.name: The royal court and their allies still consider me family.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE4MOVIE__37--.name: Their sentimentality will be their undoing.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__0--.name: The quest cannot be completed because your inventory is full. You will be returned to the original map.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__2--.name: Then again... You sure had a lot of time to prepare your 'magic'... Heh heh heh...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__3--.name: ...Turka. How do you know what $npcName:11001811$ is preparing?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__4--.name: I have eyes and ears everywhere...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__5--.name: To think that only the Rooks see and hear all... Such arrogance...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__6--.name: All right, then let me fill you in, you who have eyes and ears everywhere.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__7--.name: I don't know how much you know about the magic that $npcName:11001811$ is preparing, but...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__8--.name: Please blab about it everywhere. That way I have a reason to slice you with my sword.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__9--.name: Hehehe... Are you telling me to watch my mouth?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__10--.name: If a mouth even exists inside those rags.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__11--.name: What an interesting threat... $npcName:11001815$... Did you know? I've heard a lot of interesting things...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__12--.name: Since the $npcName:11001811$ is not here, let me tell your seemingly carefree self a few things...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__13--.name: Thanks to $npcName:11000525$, the Tria royals and the guardian are all focused solely on her...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__14--.name: It's very good news for us...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__15--.name: You can't take the human bonds of family lightly... It is their greatest strength, and their greatest weakness...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__16--.name: $npc:11001815$, you became a commander for your family's sake, did you not?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__17--.name: Say another word, and I'll consider it just cause. So how about it? Care to continue?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__19--.name: Heh heh heh... Calm down... I just wanted to compliment $npcName:11000525$, that's all...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__21--.name: The Tria royals don't seem to want to give you up so easily... I wanted to ask you how you felt about that... Heh heh...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__22--.name: It was just a mission. I have no affection for the Red Capes.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__23--.name: Of course, you shouldn't... Especially if you want to be of use...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__24--.name: I've pledged my loyalty entirely to the $npcName:11001811$, $npcName:11001813$.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__25--.name: Take it easy, heh heh. I just thought it'd be fun to hear how you felt...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__26--.name: $npcName:11000525$, if you have nothing to say, get going. I'll report to $npcName:11001811$.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__28--.name: "A false peace created through the sacrifice of innocents..."

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__29--.name: Maple World has no future as long as its people believe this fabricated history. That is why I turned my back on everything and became the Red Cape.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__30--.name: But after everything that's happened... Can we be so sure that saving the world is truly the Black Mage's goal?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE5MOVIE__31--.name: ...There's no turning back for me now.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__0--.name: The quest cannot be completed because your inventory is full. You will be returned to the original map.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__1--.name: Finally... The Innocent of Darkness is within reach.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__2--.name: But too much of our plan was revealed in the process. And now, they're right on our heels. Worst of all, the Innocent of Darkness is beyond our grasp.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__3--.name: Dark Lord, we had no other option. Sacrifices must be made to achieve our goals. We have dealt with such decisions in the past.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__4--.name: But it was because of that choice that the world was able to welcome the existence of $npcName:11001811$, no? ...heh heh

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__5--.name: Oooh? $npcName:11001813$, keep acting like that and you'll die.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__6--.name: Just say the command and I'll...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__8--.name: Their words are not completely wrong.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__9--.name: If it weren't for that situation, I might still be blinded by false hope. The false hope that the light will rescue everyone...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__10--.name: A world intoxicated with light will cover up the ugliness of reality and make it beautiful... We are so very familiar with this.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__11--.name: Wait just a little longer, Win... I mean, Dark. Lord. $npcName:11001698$ will completely destroy that world of light!

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__12--.name: With $npcName:11000525$ engaging their full attention,my army has been able to prepare without any obstacles!

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__14--.name: Argh! I didn't let my guard down! $npcName:11001698$ just...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__15--.name: $npcName:11001698$, I gave you the most important mission, didn't I?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__16--.name: I will need you when the time is most critical. Until then, don't make any mistakes.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__17--.name: Sorry to ask... Heh heh... But was $npcName:11001698$'s mission really that important...?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__18--.name: The four Commanders who aren't here are all out on missions, but it seems as though $npc:11001698$'s is the only mission the $npcName:11001811$ considers important.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__19--.name: Conspiracy theorist $npcName:11001813$. That should be your new title.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__20--.name: I gave you the job of spreading disbelief, jealousy, and envy throughout Maple World. And you've been doing a fantastic job of it.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__21--.name: That's the reason you're the owner of Conspiracy within the 7 Commanders.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__24--.name: The first step to shed the world of light... is to expose the rage of darkness to the source of light.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__25--.name: It'd be good for the one who deals the blow to be someone that "died" because of the light.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__26--.name: With the its name and its mission... Doesn't $npcName:11001698$ seem perfectly suited for the role?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__28--.name: $npc:11001698$'s army needs more time to complete their preparations. But with most of the commanders busy attending to other assignments, we're short on manpower.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__29--.name: I think it's still too soon...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__31--.name: $npc:11000525$ has been moving a lot lately. There's a risk of her being tracked while trying to divert attention.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__32--.name: The board is set. The time has come to choose your knight.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__33--.name: I think it's time we find some new bait... Some extremely fresh new bait...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__34--.name: I have an excellent plan, $npcName:11001811$... Trust this task to I, Conspirator $npcName:11001813$, heh heh.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__35--.name: $npcName:11001815$ and the Rooks are unable to take action due to the Black Moon, not to mention the Blood Red Lion in Elnas Fortress...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__37--.name: $npcName:11001811$! $npcName:11001813$ cannot be trusted. Why not select Gray Leopard instead? Although he was only just appointed a commander, his loyalty is...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__38--.name: $npcName:11001813$ will try to justify his name within the 7 Commanders, $npcName:11001815$. Just focus on your mission.

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__40--.name: So, $npc:11001813$... How exactly will you draw their attention?

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__41--.name: I'm not going to spoil it before the fun has even begun, but I've got my eyes on a few... pawns. Oh yes, one this is certain: $npcName:11001815$ will really enjoy this... heh heh...

52000035_QD__EPILOGUE6MOVIE__42--.name: It's time to start using them...

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__0--.name: The quest cannot be completed because your inventory is full. You will be returned to the original map.

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__3--.name: $npcName:11000044$, I'm hurt. Weren't you to contact me, first?

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__4--.name: $npcName:11001813$! I never should have trusted you, you raggedy windbag!

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__5--.name: If the $npcName:11001815$ were here... he'd put you in your place...

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__6--.name: $npcName:11001815$, $npcName:11001815$, $npcName:11001815$. Do I hear an echo in here?

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__7--.name: Where is your $npcName:11001815$ now, hm? Where was he when the empire's hounds started closing in on you?

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__8--.name: Silence, fool! He and the Rooks have a greater purpose... The Black Moon...

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__9--.name: And this so-called "Black Moon" is more important than your life, is it? How cruel.

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__10--.name: Don't mock them simply because you have no sense of duty...

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__11--.name: Perhaps not. But what of your duty, $npcName:11003200$?

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__13--.name: You swore to protect $npcName:11000523$, did you not? Sold your soul to carry out this duty of love. To guard her...

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__15--.name: You lie before me, broken. How will you protect your precious $npcName:11000069$ like this? How will you save her world?

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__16--.name: You placed your trust in the $npcName:11001815$, but he never cared about your "duty."

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__18--.name: He put you at the head of Dark Wind and turned you into his puppet.

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__19--.name: If he actually cared about you, wouldn't he have rescued you by now?

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__22--.name: Stop making excuses. If you want to change your destiny, I have a gift for you...

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__24--.name: This shadow seed will grant you the power of the $npcName:11001811$.

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__25--.name: You will become the scion of the darkness itself.

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__26--.name: The $npcName:11001815$ has abandoned you. But with this strength, you won't need him ever again.

52000054_QD__EPILOGUE_K__27--.name: Accept this gift... and save $npcName:11000523$ with your own hands!

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__0--.name: Warning. Multiple unidentified life forms detected. Inbound towards Kerning City.

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__2--.name: It's our early response radar system, Sir. It's detecting a level 3... no, a level 2 security breach!

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__3--.name: Analyzing life forms now... We should know what we're up against in a moment.

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__4--.name: Pattern recognition failed. Category NULL. Cannot proceed with target analysis.

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__6--.name: Whatever it is, it doesn't want to be identified.

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__7--.name: The life forms have broken through the city's perimeter defenses. They're coming from all sides!

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__8--.name: Wh-what do we do, Captain? Most of our agents are out searching for $npcName:11000064$!

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__9--.name: Calm down. Deploy all available agents into the streets of Kerning City.

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__10--.name: Also, as captain of Dark Wind...

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__11--.name: I am issuing protocol Black Mushroom.

52000055_QD__DARKWINDMOVIE__13--.name: Yes. Kerning City is about to become a battlefield.

52000056_QD__50001460__1--.name: Huh, that person...? Do they need help?

52000057_QD__GUIDESCENE_01__0--.name: $npcName:11001869$! No need to go! I'm here!

52000057_QD__GUIDESCENE_01__1--.name: Oh, you have a guest! Well, since I'm here, you got anything you need enchanted?

52000057_QD__GUIDESCENE_01__2--.name: You know that you can enchant from your inventory window, too, right?

52000058_QD__MAIN__0--.name: Wh-what's going on? The island is shaking!

52000058_QD__MAIN__2--.name: I-I'm not sure... I wonder what's going on...

52000062_QD__GUIDESCENE_01__0--.name: Welcome! Is this your first time at our boutique?

52000062_QD__GUIDESCENE_01__1--.name: There's no need to be shy! Don't feel burdened! Come over here!

52000062_QD__GUIDESCENE_01__3--.name: It looks so good on you!

52000062_QD__GUIDESCENE_01__4--.name: The design... The fit... It's perfect!

52000063_QD__90000640__0--.name: Welcome, one and all, to the (unofficial) MapleCar Racing Circuit!

52000063_QD__90000640__1--.name: The race will begin soon. Racers, come to the starting line!

52000063_QD__90000640__3--.name: Anyone want to race in my super car? Anyone? Anyone?!

52000063_QD__90000640__4--.name: Are you all ready to race?

52000063_QD__90000640__7--.name: Wow! You actually finished! I'm amazed!

52000066_QD__CHASE01__2--.name: A trap! Gotta find a way through...

52000066_QD__CHASE01__3--.name: I bet that lever will call another cart.

52000067_QD__MAIN__2--.name: But that's what we have the Black Mushroom protocol for.

52000067_QD__MAIN__3--.name: The package should be arriving just about now...

52000067_QD__MAIN__4--.name: Behold, the ultimate weapon. Crafted using advanced Taliskar technology, I present the MK 52 Alpha.

52000067_QD__MAIN__5--.name: It technically hasn't been cleared for combat use, but these are desperate times.

52000067_QD__MAIN__6--.name: I'm entrusting you with the MK 52. The survival of Kerning City is in your hands!

52000067_QD__MAIN__8--.name: Don't let them rally their forces!

52000067_QD__MAIN__16--.name: The damage to the city isn't minimal, but we suffered no casualties thanks to you.

52000067_QD__MAIN__17--.name: Who were they and why were they targeting Kerning City? These questions are now my top priority.

52000067_QD__MAIN__18--.name: The MK 52 is scrap... for now. At least it held out through this battle.

52000067_QD__MAIN__19--.name: In fact, this made an excellent field test for it. And the city is safe, so I'd call that a win.

52000067_QD__MAIN__20--.name: But that's enough of that. Let's go inside. I have something to ask you.

52000067_QD__MAIN__21--.name: That should be plenty of combat data for her... and for him.

52000067_QD__SUB_EVENT_01__2--.name: You'll never make it with that attitude!

52000067_QD__SUB_EVENT_01__5--.name: Pinch a penny, make a penny!

52000067_QD__SUB_EVENT_01__6--.name: What are you doing? Repeat after me!

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE__1--.name: Is that $npcName:11001698$? I didn't know her army was so strong...

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE__2--.name: Come on, $npcName:11000523$... We need those reinforcements...

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE__3--.name: $MyPCName$, we have to buy her as much time as we can!

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE__4--.name: Soldiers, with me! Hold the line!

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE__5--.name: We've got wounded soldiers on our flank! $MyPCName$, get them on their feet!

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE__6--.name: Just hold out a bit longer!

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE__8--.name: Oh jeez, look at that. $MyPCName$, you get that guy. I'll get the little ones!

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE__9--.name: We'll hold the walls. $MyPCName$, go after them!

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE__1--.name: This wasn't a battle. It was a slaughter.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE__2--.name: $MyPCName$! It's you! I haven't seen you since the caravan attack.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE__3--.name: There's no time to chat. Joddy... He's hurt! He jumped in front of a fireball to save the rest of us... Fool...

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE__4--.name: I'll do what I can to help him!

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__1--.name: ...and the guards who laid down their lives to protect Tria... They were true heroes.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__2--.name: If they hadn't held the line, Tria would have fallen.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__3--.name: We can't let their sacrifices be in vain, can we?

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__4--.name: No, we can't. If $npcName:11001698$ is one of these "Seven Commanders," then that means there are six more commanders to worry about.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__5--.name: If we're going to survive, we need to set aside our differences and work together.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__6--.name: In that case, please, lend me your ears.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__7--.name: There are certain... facts about myself and my station that I'm not free to share with you.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__8--.name: $npcName:11001812$, leader of the Seven Heroes, feared these facts and what they meant for the future...

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__9--.name: But it is not yet time for those facts to come to light.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__10--.name: Instead, let me offer you a promise. When the time is right, I will tell you everything. I swear it.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__11--.name: Until then, I ask you to trust me.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__12--.name: We face an enemy with the ambition and power to threaten all of Maple World.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__13--.name: To honor the heroes who have fallen and to protect Maple World, we must make a stand.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__14--.name: We must set aside our old feuds and pool our strengths. If you will join in a new alliance with me...

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__15--.name: Then I will offer you all of the support I can as empress.

52000068_QD__TRIA_SEIGE_MOVIE_02__16--.name: Our war against the darkness begins today.

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__0--.name: They broke straight through the walls. Hurry! Before the guards are overwhelmed!

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__1--.name: Push through! To the end of the hallway!

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__2--.name: Stand firm! We are the last line of defense against the darkness!

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__5--.name: Thank you, $MyPCName$, $npcName:11000064$, everyone. Without your courage, Tria would be...

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__6--.name: With all due respect, Empress, you should be thanking $npcName:11000523$. If she hadn't warned us, the enemy would have overwhelmed us before we knew they were coming.

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__7--.name: You don't think this is over, do you?

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__9--.name: I haven't even started to play, and you guys want to pack up for the day? I'm hurt!

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__10--.name: You are $npcName:11001698$ of the Seven Commanders. $npcName:11000069$ told me about you.

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__11--.name: Oh, that little girl told you about us? I've gotta give it to her. She's got connections!

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__12--.name: But I don't care if our secret is out. Starting today, the Seven Commanders are in charge, and you're not!

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__13--.name: See, you're a big, bad monster, so we're going to seal you up. It's for the good of Maple World, after all!

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__14--.name: Wh-what...? It's... it's the light of destruction...!

52000069_QD__TRIA_BUNKER__15--.name: Fine, be that way. I'm leaving!

52000070_QD__TRAP01__0--.name: Thought you had this room all figured out, huh?

52000070_QD__TRAP01__1--.name: We saw your Humblis buddies staking out the building. Too bad they didn't know about this entrance!

52000070_QD__TRAP01__2--.name: How'd they get past us? Another secret door?

52000070_QD__TRAP01__3--.name: We'll clean up here. Go report to $npcName:11001822$.

52000076_QD__MAIN__4--.name: You all need to stop fighting and just listen to me.

52000076_QD__MAIN__5--.name: There's so much we didn't know. Let $npcName:11000044$ explain. Please!

52000076_QD__MAIN__6--.name: Have you lost your mind? $npcName:11000044$ is the enemy! He killed your father, and he nearly killed us, too!

52000076_QD__MAIN__7--.name: I don't know what you said to her, $npcName:11000044$, but you won't fool me!

52000076_QD__MAIN__8--.name: Are you so afraid of the truth, $npcName:11001236$? Even when it's right in front of you, you refuse to open your eyes.

52000076_QD__MAIN__9--.name: Little matter. You'll die by my hands no matter what you believe.

52000076_QD__MAIN__10--.name: I will entrust $npcName:11000523$ with the truth. But you... You will die!

52000076_QD__MAIN__11--.name: $npcName:11000044$! Please stop! Even if the others don't believe you, I do...

52000076_QD__MAIN__12--.name: But if we're going to save the world, we all have to work together. Please, $npcName:11000044$... Can't we go back to the way we were?

52000076_QD__MAIN__13--.name: The three of us... We swore we'd always be able to believe in each other...

52000076_QD__MAIN__18--.name: And the lives of the people of Tria...

52000076_QD__MAIN__20--.name: $npcName:11000523$, it is up to you to decide how you'll use what I've told you. But I doubt your allies will believe a thing you say.

52000076_QD__MAIN__21--.name: To change the future, you have to give up your present.

52000076_QD__MAIN__23--.name: What... What is going on here?

52000076_QD__MAIN__24--.name: $npcName:11000523$! What, exactly, did $npcName:11000044$ say to you?

52000076_QD__MAIN__25--.name: I promise I'll tell you everything. But first, we have more important things to do.

52000076_QD__MAIN__26--.name: Follow me. There's no time to waste. Thousands of lives are on the line!

52000076_QD__MAIN__27--.name: Is that what he meant? The people of Tria are in danger?

52000076_QD__MAIN__29--.name: The forces of darkness are marching on Tria!

63000041_CS__MAIN__0--.name: Gee wiz, I didn't think it'd be so spooky out here...

63000041_CS__MAIN__2--.name: Oh man... Did you hear something?

63000041_CS__MAIN__9--.name: $npcName:11003344$? From cadet training? What are you doing here?

63000041_CS__MAIN__11--.name: The rest of you, follow me!

63000041_CS__MAIN__12--.name: Just ahead... it's a trap! We need to form up and protect the caravan!

63000041_CS__MAIN__14--.name: There's no time. Help us hold them off!

63000041_CS__MAIN__15--.name: Uh... Maybe I should fall back with the others...

63000041_CS__MAIN__16--.name: You haven't changed. What about you, mercenary?

63000041_CS__MAIN__18--.name: You've got to buy us time. Just until the captain gets here.

63000041_CS__MAIN__19--.name: I'll get the others to safety.

63000041_CS__MAIN__20--.name: As for you, $npcName:11003344$... Stay out of the way.

63000041_CS__MAIN__23--.name: Look at this! Some of the little bugs survived!

63000041_CS__MAIN__24--.name: I'm getting sick of playing with you pests.

63000041_CS__MAIN__27--.name: What the? That spell should've knocked you out! Boo!

63000041_CS__MAIN__28--.name: Hm... You aren't like the other little bugs.

63000041_CS__MAIN__29--.name: Hm... You aren't like the other little bugs.

63000041_CS__MAIN__32--.name: Aw. You weren't so tough, after all.

63000041_CS__MAIN__33--.name: Aw. You weren't so tough, after all.

63000041_CS__MAIN__34--.name: But... why do I feel like there's a connection between this little bug and me...?

63000041_CS__MAIN__35--.name: But... why do I feel like there's a connection between this little bug and me...?

63000041_CS__MAIN__37--.name: Get outta here, Red Cape. I'm not in the mood!

63000041_CS__MAIN__38--.name: We've got new orders. It's time to go.

63000041_CS__MAIN__39--.name: I said I'm not in the mood!

63000041_CS__MAIN__40--.name: That's too bad. The others are waiting for you.

63000041_CS__MAIN__41--.name: Ugh... And I was just starting to have fun...

63000041_CS__MAIN__42--.name: If you're worried about your plaything over there, I'll finish $male:him,female:her$ off for you.

63000041_CS__MAIN__43--.name: I've already taken care of it. Just open your stupid portal.

63000041_CS__MAIN__44--.name: Little Luka will take care of you, bug.

63000041_CS__MAIN__47--.name: I still have things to do!

63000041_CS__MAIN__49--.name: I don't remember how the fight ended.

63000041_CS__MAIN__53--.name: I woke up on the road to Tria.

63000041_CS__MAIN__54--.name: We had to get to the capital and report what had happened.

63000042_CS__WAKEUP01__1--.name: You were the least wounded among those who were attacked crossing the mountain trail... But I was worried the injury might be severe because you took so long to regain consciousness.

63000042_CS__WAKEUP01__2--.name: Anyway, now that you're awake, I'm relieved. Take some time to recover.

63000042_CS__WAKEUP01__3--.name: I heard you crossed the dangerous mountain trail for the ceremony... It's been canceled.

63000042_CS__WAKEUP02__7-Season1-.name: You can't see anything because your eyes are closed.

63000042_CS__WAKEUP02__9-Season1-.name: There we go. I was worried you might have brain damage for a moment there.

63000042_CS__WAKEUP02__10-Season1-.name: It seems you've pulled through, after all.

02000391_BF__MAIN__0--.name: Where be she, my bonnie lass?

02000391_BF__MAIN__1--.name: There! The most beautiful fish in the sea!

02000391_BF__MAIN__2--.name: No more will ye spurn my love! You're comin' with me, one way or t'other!

02000391_BF__MAIN__3--.name: Ugh. How many times do I have to tell you? I don't date pirates.

02000391_BF__MAIN__6--.name: ♬ O magicked waves, reveal my cave! ♬

02000391_BF__MAIN__7--.name: That oaf will never find me here...

02000391_BF__MAIN__8--.name: Aaak! Where be my scaly maiden fair?

02000391_BF__MAIN__9--.name: Find her, or I'll boil the lot of ye!

02000392_BF__SUMMON__1--.name: $npcName:11003084$! Landwalker, I will not forgive you!

02000392_BF__MAIN__0--.name: What...?! Ugh...You're tough for a pirate...!

02000392_BF__MAIN__2--.name: $npcName:11000444$ the explorer said you could help me.

02000392_BF__MAIN__3--.name: $npcName:11000444$...? $npcName:11003084$, I thought I told you not to see that human again!

02000392_BF__MAIN__4--.name: Oh... I guess you're not a pirate.

02000392_BF__MAIN__5--.name: I'm really sorry about the misunderstanding.

02000392_BF__MAIN__6--.name: Sorry, we've had a lot of pirate trouble lately...

02000392_BF__MAIN__7--.name: $npcName:11003086$, Guardian of the Seas, says the same.

02000392_BF__MAIN__8--.name: It'd be best if you spoke with him in merson.

02000392_BF__MAIN__9--.name: Perhaps we can convince him to grant you an audience!

02000392_BF__MAIN__10--.name: Here, proof that he sent me.

02000392_BF__MAIN__11--.name: So why have you come here?

02000392_BF__MAIN__12--.name: $npcName:11000444$ claims this world is on the brink of disaster.

02000384_BF__BARRICADE__0--.name: The entrance will close in 30 seconds.

02000386_BF__MAIN__2--.name: Attack Pippy before he gets away!

02000401_BF__FACTION_01__0--.name: You need to destroy the turrets to capture the bridge!

02000401_BF__FACTION_02__0--.name: Royal Guard combat horses! Avenge the Royal Guards!

02000401_BF__FACTION_03__0--.name: We can't let the Maple Alliance steal the show.\nTaliskar will step in now.

02000401_BF__FACTION_04__0--.name: MK 52 Omega, landing successful.\nUnion, this is a present from Dr. Kartronic.

02000401_BF__MADRICANSIEGE__0--.name: For the alliance army to congregate, we need to take over the bridge!\nLet's move!

02000401_BF__MADRICANSIEGE__2--.name: A secret tunnel? Here? How unexpected.\nWe wouldn't even need to crush the ramparts...

02000401_BF__MADRICANSIEGE__3--.name: But we won't be able to get many soldiers in through here.

02000401_BF__MADRICANSIEGE__4--.name: We've got this spot. You go on ahead and infiltrate the fortress.

02000403_BF__EVENT_01__0--.name: I sense... a remnant of the past.\nIt's a vision of an old mansion.

02000403_BF__EVENT_02__1--.name: Well, no matter. I'm sure you're curious about this place as well...

02000403_BF__EVENT_02__2--.name: Can you feel it? These powerful evil spirits... It's rare to come across so many spirits. They must carry a strong grudge.

02000403_BF__EVENT_02__3--.name: Welcome to the Cursed Mansion. I hope you find the answer you seek...

02000403_BF__EVENT_02__4--.name: Evil spirits issue forth from the magic circle in the center of the hall.\nDefeat them to purify the mansion.

02000403_BF__EVENT_02__5--.name: I will make this place sparkle!

02000403_BF__EVENT_02__6--.name: I'm so happy to work here!

02000403_BF__EVENT_02__7--.name: Mistress hates bugs. I need to keep things clean.

02000403_BF__MAGIC_01__1--.name: Cough... I think I'm coming down with something...

02000403_BF__MAGIC_02__1--.name: Our lady is very sick. He must be too worried to eat...

02000403_BF__MAGIC_03__1--.name: ...The fever is not going down... This is bad.

02000403_BF__MAGIC_04__1--.name: Where can I find a good book to read to my daughter...?

02000403_BF__MAGIC_05__3--.name: We need to cure her, no matter what!

02000403_BF__MAGIC_06__0--.name: Can... can we cure this disease...?!

02000403_BF__MAGIC_06__1--.name: Right now,  $npcName:11001812$ is working on his research as best as he can.

02000403_BF__MAGIC_06__2--.name: Minister...! Please persuade the empress not to abandon her realm!

02000403_BF__MAGIC_06__3--.name: We can't all die just here...We need to save whatever salvageable land we can.

02000403_BF__MAGIC_06__5--.name: Let's go back, $npcName:11000525$. Forget this place now.

02000403_BF__MAGIC_06__6--.name: But... but I made a promise to the lady!

02000403_BF__MAGIC_06__7--.name: Stop whining. You sound like a baby.

02000410_BF__BARRICADE_GIVEUP_0--.name: The entrance will be closed in 30 seconds.\nStarting now, the party leader can no longer forfeit the dungeon.

02000419_BF__BARRICADE__0--.name: The entrance will close in 30 seconds.

02000403_BF__MAIN__0--.name: A powerful source of evil has appeared in the center of the hall.

02010055_BF__SCENE01__1--.name: Still, this power will allow me to become the kaiser. Finally, I will rule over Grandis!

52000081_QD__MAIN__1--.name: Hm... This is definitely the place...

52000081_QD__MAIN__4--.name: Traipsing so blindly into danger is going to get you killed.

52000081_QD__MAIN__5--.name: You should turn back now, while you still can.

52000081_QD__MAIN__6--.name: Wait! I have something to ask you!

52000081_QD__MAIN__7--.name: Were you the one our expedition encountered?

52000081_QD__MAIN__8--.name: They were here investigating a weather anomaly.

52000081_QD__MAIN__9--.name: That is, until they were attacked by someone matching your description.

52000081_QD__MAIN__10--.name: Why did you attack them? Why are the forces of darkness here?

52000081_QD__MAIN__11--.name: Your friends were standing in the way of my mission.

52000081_QD__MAIN__12--.name: There's someone I must eliminate with my own two hands...

52000081_QD__MAIN__13--.name: I'll show no mercy to anyone who stands in my way.

52000081_QD__MAIN__15--.name: You should trust your instincts and leave this place.

52000081_QD__MAIN__16--.name: Someone like you could never survive that deadly cold.

52000083_QD__MAIN__1--.name: Your aid is unnecessary. I could have handled things alone.

52000083_QD__MAIN__2--.name: I think the words you're looking for are "thank you."

52000083_QD__MAIN__3--.name: She looks hurt... Hey, are you okay?

52000083_QD__MAIN__6--.name: Yes, thanks to you. I don't know what would've happened if you hadn't come...

52000083_QD__MAIN__8--.name: No. Their leader has been manipulating Queen $npcName:11003074$. We have to stop him.

52000083_QD__MAIN__10--.name: After the loss of her kingdom and King $npcName:11003075$, $npcName:11003074$ dwelt here alone in sadness. Until he appeared.

52000083_QD__MAIN__11--.name: He promised to reunite $npcName:11003074$ with $npcName:11003075$ if she opened the path to the secret shrine. He showed her $npcName:11003075$'s bracelet—a gift from $npcName:11003074$—as proof of his claims.

52000083_QD__MAIN__12--.name: Eventually, $npcName:11003074$'s sadness became too much for her, and she agreed to take him to the secret shrine on $map:02000381$. Then they left.

52000083_QD__MAIN__13--.name: I tried to stop him from leaving with her, but his minions were too strong.

52000083_QD__MAIN__14--.name: Can you describe him to me?

52000083_QD__MAIN__15--.name: I never saw his face because of that black hood, but... he looked like a ghost.

52000083_QD__MAIN__17--.name: Wait, are you really going to run off on your own again?

52000083_QD__MAIN__18--.name: If we're both going after the forces of darkness, we should do it together...

52000083_QD__MAIN__19--.name: Turka's life is mine to end.

52000084_QD__1122330_FINDWAY__0--.name: Hurry! We have to hurry and get up the mountain.

52000084_QD__1122330_FINDWAY__1--.name: $npc:11003074$ is at the shrine hidden at the top of this mountain!

52000085_QD__50001538__1--.name: Unfortunately, I don't have time to give each of our guests a proper greeting. There are matters I must attend.

52000085_QD__50001538__2--.name: Wait. I thought the reason you came here was to help me?

52000085_QD__50001538__4--.name: Hehehe... Why do you think I wanted you to bring me here, of all places?

52000085_QD__50001538__5--.name: Two things are required to unseal the temple doors...

52000085_QD__50001538__7--.name: You finally understand. Your Majesty, you are the final key.

52000085_QD__50001538__8--.name: Release the seal and throw open the door to the Frostpillar Temple.

52000085_QD__50001538__9--.name: Your beloved companion awaits you there.

52000085_QD__50001538__11--.name: My queen! You mustn't! If you open the door to the Frostpillar Temple... The Frozen Crystal might explode!

52000085_QD__50001538__13--.name: Your Majesty, if you would be so kind as to dispatch those noisy whelps, I will deal with our newest guest.

52000085_QD__50001538__14--.name: Does your treachery know no end?

52000085_QD__50001538__15--.name: My, what an unexpected face... Have you come all this way to find me? Ehehehe...

52000085_QD__50001538__16--.name: There's nowhere to run. This day will be your last.

52000085_QD__50001538__17--.name: Run? Ahahaha... What confidence! All right, I'll play along.

52000085_QD__50001538__18--.name: Let's spend a little time together, just you and I. What do you say, disgraced bladesman?

52000085_QD__50001538__20--.name: My Queen, you can't throw away everything for the words of a stranger. Especially while the king remains missing...

52000085_QD__50001538__21--.name: But $npcName:11003075$ is who I've come here to find.

52000085_QD__50001538__23--.name: I'm sorry, but I must see my beloved. If you would stand against me, you leave me no choice!

52000085_QD__50001538__25--.name: My Queen, you cannot release the temple's seal on the words of a stranger whose motives remain unknown. Let me take you home where you can rest...

52000085_QD__50001538__28--.name: What do we now? Have we failed?

52000085_QD__50001538__29--.name: This ice was conjured with $npcName:11003074$'s magic... It would take a special potion to melt it...

52000085_QD__50001538__30--.name: How long will we be stuck like this?

52000085_QD__50001538__31--.name: You fool. Didn't I tell you your self-righteousness would get you killed?

52000085_QD__50001538__33--.name: I appreciate you saving us, but what are you doing here?

52000085_QD__50001538__34--.name: I followed you here because of what that $male:guy,female:girl$ said... Dark forces this,  end-of-the-world that... I was worried you idiots would hurt yourselves!

52000085_QD__50001538__35--.name: It's okay, $MyPCName$. Surmany may act mean, but it's only because he cares about us.

52000085_QD__50001538__36--.name: Don't be ridiculous! I just don't want the world ending on my watch.

52000085_QD__50001538__37--.name: Thanks, Surmany. And $MyPCName$... Thank you for everything you've done.

52000085_QD__50001538__38--.name: Things are looking grim. We should regroup at the outpost and think.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__0--.name: Thank you all for joining me today.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__1--.name: These past fifteen years, we've allowed ourselves to grow apart, and $npc:11001698$ has taken advantage of this fact.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__2--.name: I invite everyone here to come together to form a new Maple Alliance, dedicated to the protection of the light and our people.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__3--.name: That's a beautiful thought, Empress, but we need to face facts.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__4--.name: The enemy's hit all of us, and hit us hard. Even after combining our forces, we're coming up short.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__5--.name: I hate to admit it, but $npcName:11001822$ is right. It's going to take time before my guards are back up to full strength.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__6--.name: We can't just sit here and do nothing!

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__7--.name: Calm yourself. We have to weigh our options carefully.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__8--.name: I'm more concerned about how little we know about our enemies...

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__9--.name: She's right. I've set Dark Wind to digging up anything we can on $npcName:11001698$, but so far... nothing.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__10--.name: Even looking into $npc:11000044$'s activities turned out to be a dead end. The man knew how to cover his tracks.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__11--.name: So now we're left with no leads, and no answers.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__12--.name: Your Majesty, shall I tell them about the expedition?

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__13--.name: Yes. But first, how many of you know about the lumarigons?

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__14--.name: I've sent what few men I could spare to search for any trace of the lumarigons. This led us to look at Karkar Island.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__15--.name: A dragon-like man has been stirring up trouble there, it seems.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__16--.name: He's been asking around about the lumarigons, as well. I cannot say if this man is an ally or a foe, but we cannot turn a blind eye to him.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__17--.name: Since he tends to leave chaos in his wake, we need to be careful in how we proceed.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__18--.name: There's so much work ahead of us. We need to learn more about $npcName:11001698$, build up our armies, care for our people... And every one of these tasks is important.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__19--.name: But this man on Karkar Island may hold the answers to our questions.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__20--.name: Your Majesty, our forces are already stretched too thin. How can we spare anyone to look for this dragon man?

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__21--.name: We will find a way. We must.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__22--.name: The very fate of our alliance may depend on this mission.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__23--.name: Urrrggg, I really don't want to teleport. Tria is so far.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__24--.name: Anyway... I, $npc:11003137$, have arrived under the command of the empress. Ah, so you were here as well, $MyPCName$?

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__25--.name: I'll head off first. $MyPCName$, follow along! There's lots to be done.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__26--.name: We were victorious over $npcName:11001698$. Those that attacked Tria and Maple World got what they deserved.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__27--.name: Although $npcName:11001698$ escaped safely, it wasn't what she wanted.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__28--.name: $npc:11001698$ lost her closest friend in this battle.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__29--.name: Ack... I... I can't believe I lost...

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__30--.name: Hurry and end it, you idiots...! I'll never become your prisoner...!

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__31--.name: Slaves of light…! I'd rather die than become a hypocrite like you!

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__32--.name: With that, we landed a final hit on $npcName:11001698$. It was vengenace for the royal guards of Tria! And for $npcName:11003178$.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__35--.name: But $npcName:11001698$ was safe, after all. Her dragon, $npcName:11003144$, took the final blow in her place.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__36--.name: Not just that, but Lukarax use the final bit of her strength to teleport $npcName:11001698$ to safety. To protect her...

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__39--.name: Luka! I'm coming! I'm going to go with $npcName:11003144$, too!

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__41--.name: $npcName:11001698$ cried out for her dragon until she disappeared, and that marked the end of the Madrakan battle.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__42--.name: $npcName:11001698$ will surely return. And when that happens, all who we love will be in danger once more.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__43--.name: But we're searching for resolution that doesn't involve fighting $npcName:11001698$. Vengeance will only lead to ruin, for both sides.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__44--.name: Therefore I vowed to thoroughly investigate the "Destruction From Light" that awakened the rage within $npcName:11001698$.

52000087_QD__52000087_TRIGGER__45--.name: Little did I know what the results of that vow would be. There was no way to tell then.

52000091_QD__52000091_TRIGGER__2--.name: Fine! Let them attack us. I'd like to see them try.

52000091_QD__52000091_TRIGGER__3--.name: We'll squish them all like the pests they are!

52000093_QD__20002281_RP__0--.name: While $npcName:11001822$ and Dark Wind were repelling $npcName:11001698$'s army, Oska and the militia were fighting another army at Shadow Canyon.

52000094_QD__20002280_RP__0--.name: Meanwhile, $npcName:11001822$ and his Dark Wind forces were fighting $npcName:11001698$'s army in an empty field.

52000096_QD__MAIN__2--.name: Get down here! You're only making things worse for yourself.

52000096_QD__MAIN__3--.name: The captain wants to see you!

52000097_QD__MAIN__0--.name: $npcName:11003086$. This guy is different from those pirates. Tell this person what you told me last time.

52000097_QD__MAIN__1--.name: You look so different. Scared me there. If something dangerous is happening, let me know. Who knows? It might get resolved.

52000097_QD__MAIN__2--.name: How naive of you, $npcName:11003085$. To want to help the humans... You don't know how pointless that is.

52000097_QD__MAIN__3--.name: Humans will be the ones to push this world into extinction.

52000097_QD__MAIN__4--.name: Although humans may not be the most perfect creatures...

52000097_QD__MAIN__5--.name: They will not try to ruin this world if it's in danger.

52000097_QD__MAIN__6--.name: Spare me. Humans can't even trust each other. They're too selfish.

52000097_QD__MAIN__7--.name: Thanks to the returned mage of light, I've learned everything. I know of the destruction you'll bring to the world.

52000097_QD__MAIN__9--.name: Don't believe me? Then see for yourself.

52000097_QD__MAIN__11--.name: Come to your senses, little guy!

52000097_QD__MAIN__14--.name: What you showed me... I'm still not sure what it means.

52000097_QD__MAIN__15--.name: But if someone's poor choices leads to a crisis...

52000097_QD__MAIN__16--.name: Others will pool forces to block it. Please keep that in mind.

52000097_QD__MAIN__18--.name: Fine, I'll keep an eye out. I'll watch and see how whatever disaster comes next is handled.

52000097_QD__MAIN__19--.name: But I wonder what the other Shinsoos will think of you... What they do is fully up to them. Remember that.

52000097_QD__MAIN__20--.name: He's usually quite friendly... There must be a reason for his actions. Don't take it to the heart.

52000097_QD__MAIN__21--.name: I'll talk it out some more... If there's something I need to tell you, I'll contact you. Also…

52000097_QD__MAIN__22--.name: Would you deliver a message to $npcName:11000444$? Tell him that I hope he gets better soon... And that I'd like to see him again...

52000097_QD__MAIN__23--.name: Are you blushing, $npcName:11003084$? You must like him a lot. He seemed rather ordinary to me...

52000097_QD__MAIN__24--.name: I'll deliver the message. Thank you, $npcName:11003084$. Thank you, $npcName:11003085$.

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__0--.name: You've failed to secure Empress $npcName:11001478$... Perhaps I've put too much trust in you, $npcName:11001698$.

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__1--.name: But, $npcName:11001811$...! If $npcName:11001698$ had continued to use her strength there... $npcName:11001969$ may have turrned into an empress of destruction...

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__2--.name: $npcName:11001811$ wanted $npcName:11001478$ alive and not awakened! $npcName:11001698$ didn't run away!

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__3--.name: Also, we damaged their castle. Doesn't this mean $npcName:11001698$ succeeded?

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__5--.name: You're a fool if you thought I'd give you a pat on the back for your failure.

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__6--.name: You are as good as dead.

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__8--.name: You've lost your troops and made the enemy aware of our actions... Where exactly is the silver lining on that?

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__10--.name: Enough. I don't remember taking in such pitiful subordinates.

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__11--.name: This is your last chance, $npcName:11001698$. This time, succeed.

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__12--.name: Remember, there are 6 others who would love to use your failure as a stepping stone to their own success.

52000098_QD__EP10MOVIE__13--.name: Fight with $npcName:11003144$ this time. I didn't give you that dragon for a pet.

52000100_QD__52000100__3-JobIntro-.name: Professor! Why does $MyPCName$ get special treatment?

52000100_QD__52000100__4-JobIntro-.name: Dueling isn't even on the syllabus!

52000100_QD__52000100__9-JobIntro-.name: $MyPCName$, however, left the classroom in a state...

52000100_QD__52000100__11-JobIntro-.name: How was $male:he,female:she$ able to use such magic...?

52000100_QD__52000100__12-JobIntro-.name: If $male:he,female:she$ had actually hit me with that spell...

52000100_QD__52000100__13-JobIntro-.name: Kate? Where are you going? Weren't we having fun?

52000101_QD__52000101__2-JobIntro-.name: That fire will burn out on its own... probably.

52000101_QD__52000101__6-JobIntro-.name: Hey! Are you listening to me?! Hey!!

52000101_QD__52000101__7-JobIntro-.name: Wait... Did $male:he,female:she$ say she has a personal class with $npcName:11000032$?!

52000102_QD__52000102__1-JobIntro-.name: ...had already been arranged and decided upon.

52000102_QD__52000102__4-JobIntro-.name: Why on earth did you even ask me, then?!

52000102_QD__52000102__5-JobIntro-.name: Think of this as an experience, my child. An experience!

52000102_QD__52000102__6-JobIntro-.name: That's supposed to make me feel better?!

52000104_QD__52000104__1-JobIntro-.name: A Secluded Island in the Far East

52000104_QD__52000104__2-JobIntro-.name: Tch...! I'll get him next time!

52000104_QD__52000104__9-JobIntro-.name: I wonder what he's got in store?

52000104_QD__52000104__10-JobIntro-.name: I can't wait to get started.

52000105_QD__52000105__0-JobIntro-.name: I'll get you this time, old man!

52000105_QD__52000105__1-JobIntro-.name: I have to leave for a while. I'll be back before you know it.

52000106_QD__52000106__4-JobIntro-.name: I have to stay strong. Everyone will return someday.

52000106_QD__52000106__7-JobIntro-.name: The Door of Light, Victoria Island

52000106_QD__52000106__8-JobIntro-.name: The day the old man left...

52000107_QD__52000107__2-JobIntro-.name: Good, good. Everything seems to be working.

52000108_QD__52000108__0-JobIntro-.name: The burning smell means it's working, right?

52000108_QD__52000108__2-JobIntro-.name: You sure are something. When everyone else mocked me,  you recognized my talents!

52000108_QD__52000108__3-JobIntro-.name: Not only that, but... Wait. Burning smell?

52000108_QD__52000108__4-JobIntro-.name: Look, Boss! The core is burning with your fiery passion!

52000108_QD__52000108__5-JobIntro-.name: Ack! $npcName:11003291$! Quick, get me an extinguisher!

52000108_QD__52000108__7-JobIntro-.name: Modular barrel. Multi-shell compatibility. A firing speed to die for.\nThe boss's signature invention...

52000108_QD__52000108__8-JobIntro-.name: The Monster Extinguisher! Wow, what a witty name!

52000108_QD__52000108__9-JobIntro-.name: Heh... My sense of humor is unbeatable.

52000108_QD__52000108__10-JobIntro-.name: This is no time for jokes!

52000108_QD__52000108__11-JobIntro-.name: I see the problem. The discount coolant parts I used fell apart...

52000108_QD__52000108__12-JobIntro-.name: There's no cooling system powerful enough to cool down your passion, Boss!

52000108_QD__52000108__14-JobIntro-.name: Is that supposed to make me feel better...?

52000108_QD__52000108__16-JobIntro-.name: It's just your imagination. ...Aaand the wall is exploding.

52000108_QD__52000108__17-JobIntro-.name: Wow! It's just like a bad action movie!

52000108_QD__52000108__18-JobIntro-.name: This isn't a movie! Take cover!

52000108_QD__52000108__26-JobIntro-.name: Hey! We're not done with you yet!

52000108_QD__52000108__28-JobIntro-.name: Your arsenal might be a little too much, don't you think? It'll be a hassle if you accidentally blow the lab up...

52000108_QD__52000108__29-JobIntro-.name: I think I can handle one little punk.

52000108_QD__52000108__30-JobIntro-.name: I'm just saying be careful. No need to bite my head off.

52000108_QD__52000108__33-JobIntro-.name: All right. You're asking for it now!

52000108_QD__52000108__34-JobIntro-.name: Then I won't hold back, either!

52000108_QD__52000108__37-JobIntro-.name: What a waste of a fusion core. Well, I can always make another one!

52000108_QD__52000108__39-JobIntro-.name: Any respectable invention comes with a self-destruct function!

52000108_QD__52000108__40-JobIntro-.name: I'd rather blow it up than give it to the likes of you. $npcName:11003291$, do it!

52000108_QD__52000108__42-JobIntro-.name: Come on, $npcName:11003291$! Let's get out of here!

52000109_QD__52000109__5-JobIntro-.name: $npcName:11003291$... Please make my tombstone from stainless steel...

52000109_QD__52000109__8-JobIntro-.name: How did those guys know about the fusion core...?

52000109_QD__52000109__9-JobIntro-.name: We better make sure the town is okay.

52000109_QD__52000109__10-JobIntro-.name: Good idea. The blast shouldn't have gone too far beyond the lab, but it doesn't hurt to make sure.

52000109_QD__52000109__11-JobIntro-.name: Ah, right. The plaza. We built the lab under the plaza.

52000109_QD__52000109__19-JobIntro-.name: Once I was hired by $npcName:11000264$, my life of servit— er, adventure began.

52000111_QD__52000111__2-JobIntro-.name: Kerning City... It's been a while.

52000112_QD__52000112__1-JobIntro-.name: Look at all these survivors. Inefficient!

52000112_QD__52000112__3-JobIntro-.name: Stop fighting and I'll make it painless.

52000113_QD__52000113__2-JobIntro-.name: Let's return to base. There's no point in continuing this search.

52000113_QD__52000113__3-JobIntro-.name: If $male:he,female:she$ is still alive, then $male:he'll,female:she'll$ come back on $male:his,female:her$ own... eventually.

52000113_QD__52000113__4-JobIntro-.name: After all, I know who $male:he,female:she$ really is.

52000115_QD__52000115__0-JobIntro-.name: This time... I will save this world...

02000026_IN__MAIN__0-CBT-.name: Is that what you truly think of me, $npcName:11000264$?

02000026_IN__MAIN__1-CBT-.name: How hurtful... Still, your analysis is fairly accurate.

02000026_IN__MAIN__2-CBT-.name: I suppose you do possess some scholarly qualities, after all.

02000026_IN__MAIN__3-CBT-.name: I'm relieved. I'd feared you would hold our research back.

02000026_IN__MAIN__4-CBT-.name: Ha. Looks like those ears aren't just for show.

02000026_IN__MAIN__5-CBT-.name: For future reference, I'm precise, not cold.

02000026_IN__MAIN__7-CBT-.name: How nice. It's been too long since I've engaged in such light banter.

02000026_IN__MAIN__9-CBT-.name: Right, right! $MyPCName$, this is $npcName:11003313$. Have you met?

02000026_IN__MAIN__10-CBT-.name: $npcName:11000076$ told me that you were coming.

02000026_IN__MAIN__11-CBT-.name: It's good to finally see someone reliable so far from $map:52000133$.

02000035_IN__MAIN__0-CBT-.name: $npcName:11003262$, did you notice anything odd about $npcName:11003313$? Perhaps he brought something back from the $map:02000146$? Or was he acting unusual?

02000035_IN__MAIN__1-CBT-.name: Absolutely not. Professor $npcName:11003313$ is beyond reproach!

02000035_IN__MAIN__2-CBT-.name: Something isn't adding up. Aren't you curious why $npcName:11003313$ changed?

02000035_IN__MAIN__3-CBT-.name: Are you implying that $npcName:11003313$ has been tainted by the darkness? Preposterous! All those books you read are rotting your brain.

02000035_IN__MAIN__5-CBT-.name: I'm not the one making wild accusations! Why do I have to apologize? Professor $npcName:11003313$ isn't some lab rat for us to study and dissect.

02000035_IN__MAIN__6-CBT-.name: I'll find the professor myself. Even if you're right, it doesn't change anything.

02000035_IN__MAIN__8-CBT-.name: Let her go, $MyPCName$. She needs some space.

02000072_IN__MAIN__1-CBT-.name: When are we going after him?

02000072_IN__MAIN__2-CBT-.name: We've got the royal guard. We've got to get that wraith before he slips away!

02000072_IN__MAIN__3-CBT-.name: Be patient. We all want to go after him, but it's not yet time.

02000072_IN__MAIN__4-CBT-.name: There's no way I heard you right. You're saying you want to wait?

02000072_IN__MAIN__5-CBT-.name: The enemy has vanished into the shadows. The trail is cold. Believe me, I've already sent my best scouts after them.

02000072_IN__MAIN__6-CBT-.name: This goes beyond $map:02000076$. $map:02000100$ was also attacked. All of Maple World is in danger.

02000072_IN__MAIN__7-CBT-.name: We must report this to the empress. Make a plan. Learn who our enemies are and what they're trying to do.

02000072_IN__MAIN__8-CBT-.name: My dad may never... may never get better. You wanna waste time kissing the empress's feet?!

02000072_IN__MAIN__9-CBT-.name: I've got a better plan. We'll round up the villagers and go. That monster can't have gotten too far!

02000072_IN__MAIN__10-CBT-.name: $npcName:11000015$ is right. We can't win this battle if we go in blind. My men are already preparing to return to $map:02000001$.

02000072_IN__MAIN__11-CBT-.name: Those guys took out one of the Seven Heroes, and you already wanna leave? Are you stupid?!

02000072_IN__MAIN__12-CBT-.name: And what gives you the right to say that? If it weren't for your recklessness, $npcName:11000001$ would still be awake.

02000072_IN__MAIN__14-CBT-.name: Fine. If no one else wants to go, I'll do it myself. I'll avenge my dad!

02000072_IN__MAIN__17-CBT-.name: Long time, no see. How's it going?

02000072_IN__MAIN__18-CBT-.name: Oh man, did something happen? It's really tense in here...

02000224_BF__MAIN__0-Quest2017-.name: Do you know how long I've been looking for you?

02000224_BF__MAIN__2-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11000101$ told me all about your wild exploits. What are you going to do when your dad finds out?

02000224_BF__MAIN__3-Quest2017-.name: I'm trying to make things right! If you aren't gonna help me, then get out of my way.

02000224_BF__MAIN__4-Quest2017-.name: Ugh. You don't even get what's going on around you! When are you going to grow up?

02000224_BF__MAIN__5-Quest2017-.name: Your dad is worried sick. This is all your fault, and you're just making things worse!

02000224_BF__MAIN__6-Quest2017-.name: Even though he's an old man, $npcName:11003239$ still came out to help deal with the monsters in the $map:02000054$.

02000224_BF__MAIN__7-Quest2017-.name: Wait, dad went to the $map:02000054$? Beyond the southwest checkpoint?

02000224_BF__MAIN__8-Quest2017-.name: That's right. That's your patrol route. But you decided to run off, so the old man went there in your place!

02000224_BF__MAIN__9-Quest2017-.name: He's too old to be out there.

02000224_BF__MAIN__10-Quest2017-.name: It's time to prove myself! For real this time!

02000224_BF__MAIN__12-Quest2017-.name: Jeez. I wish $npcName:11003239$ was my dad. I'd be a good kid...

02000224_BF__MAIN__14-Quest2017-.name: $MyPCName$! We didn't have enough manpower after the battle, so the elder decided to chip in.

02000224_BF__MAIN__15-Quest2017-.name: It's not safe for him out there.

02000224_BF__MAIN__16-Quest2017-.name: You're right. Please go to the $map:02000054$ and help out. $npcName:11000547$ should already be there.

02000224_BF__MAIN__17-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11003239$ went with $npcName:11000015$, so he's not completely helpless. I'd better go after $npcName:11003242$...

52000121_QD__MAIN__0-Quest2017-.name: Who are you? What do you want with us?!

52000121_QD__MAIN__1-Quest2017-.name: And what makes you think I have any desire or obligation to answer to you?

52000121_QD__MAIN__2-Quest2017-.name: Were you behind the attack on $map:02000100$?

52000121_QD__MAIN__3-Quest2017-.name: What's this? We have a celebrity in our midst. One of Maple World's greatest heroes, $npcName:11003308$.

52000121_QD__MAIN__4-Quest2017-.name: But you are so old and feeble now. Naught but skin and bones! A shadow of your former self.

52000121_QD__MAIN__5-Quest2017-.name: Silence! The likes of you aren't fit to even talk to him!

52000121_QD__MAIN__6-Quest2017-.name: Do not be offended, elf. I am simply... concerned. The elderly should stay at home, where they can sleep away what little time they have left.

52000121_QD__MAIN__7-Quest2017-.name: Don't you talk to my dad like that!

52000121_QD__MAIN__8-Quest2017-.name: Ah, the son of the hero! I shall destroy you myself.

52000121_QD__MAIN__12-Quest2017-.name: How disappointing. The former hero cannot even save his child's life, let alone his own.

52000121_QD__MAIN__13-Quest2017-.name: In the end, mortal flesh is weak. Such a delicious tragedy.

52000121_QD__MAIN__15-Quest2017-.name: $MyPCName$? How intriguing! Unfortunately, my business here is done.

52000121_QD__MAIN__17-Quest2017-.name: We have to get $npcName:11003308$ to safety. We don't have time for these goons!

52000121_QD__MAIN__19-Quest2017-.name: No... No, I'm not! You said I was useless. Pathetic... Then why did you...?

52000121_QD__MAIN__20-Quest2017-.name: You can't just dive into danger like in the old days! Not for... not for my sake!

52000121_QD__MAIN__21-Quest2017-.name: The only thing I fear in this world... is losing you...

52000121_QD__MAIN__22-Quest2017-.name: I didn't want you to feel trapped under my shadow... So I pushed you to be your best... but all I've done is hurt you...

52000121_QD__MAIN__23-Quest2017-.name: My heart ached as I watched you suffer. But it was all my doing... You are not to blame...

52000121_QD__MAIN__25-Quest2017-.name: I believe in you. You can be great... even without me...

52000132_QD__MAIN__1-Quest2017-.name: And I'm $npcName:11003252$. Pleased to meet ya!

52000132_QD__MAIN__2-Quest2017-.name: Which one of you is the exceptional student $npcName:11003250$ told me about?

52000132_QD__MAIN__3-Quest2017-.name: We're just freshmen, silly! Maybe we'll be exceptional next year.

52000132_QD__MAIN__4-Quest2017-.name: Oh, we will be. I'm gonna be a hero, just like $MyPCName$!

52000132_QD__MAIN__7-Quest2017-.name: Ahem! We're here to take you to her. Follow us!

52000132_QD__MAIN__8-Quest2017-.name: She's waiting for you on the school grounds. The class president herself, $npcName:11003146$.

52000132_QD__MAIN__9-Quest2017-.name: $npcName:11003146$ is the best mage to ever study here, ever. She's the Queen of Ellinel, as smart as she is pretty!

52000132_QD__MAIN__10-Quest2017-.name: She's just some rich brat who clings to $npcName:11000032$'s robe. Being the teacher's pet doesn't make her smart!

52000132_QD__MAIN__12-Quest2017-.name: Anyway, how can I become a great adventurer like you, $MyPCName$? I want $npcName:11000032$ and the headmaster to send me on quests, too!

52000132_QD__MAIN__13-Quest2017-.name: Adventuring is my dream job! Please, tell me!

52000132_QD__MAIN__14-Quest2017-.name: There's not really much to it...

52000132_QD__MAIN__15-Quest2017-.name: Just ignore him. That's what the rest of us do.

52000132_QD__MAIN__17-Quest2017-.name: About $npcName:11003146$. I wouldn't take anything she says personal, if I were you...

52000132_QD__MAIN__18-Quest2017-.name: I'm going to tell $npcName:11003146$ you said that!

52000132_QD__MAIN__20-Quest2017-.name: We're here. Just go through the door.

52000132_QD__MAIN__21-Quest2017-.name: We better get to class. See ya later!

52000133_QD__MAIN__1-Quest2017-.name: How long do you intend to make me wait, exactly?

52000133_QD__MAIN__6-Quest2017-.name: Come with me to the $map:52000134$ and you'll find out.

52000133_QD__MAIN__7-Quest2017-.name: On second thought, I don't actually care. The headmaster is busy and I have more work for you.

52000133_QD__MAIN__8-Quest2017-.name: I'm sure you can take care of whatever it is without my help.

52000133_QD__MAIN__9-Quest2017-.name: I don't have time to deal with those brats. The professor needs my assistance with his very important research!

52000133_QD__MAIN__11-Quest2017-.name: I was just thinking about you.

52000133_QD__MAIN__13-Quest2017-.name: Well... There's one experiment I haven't been able to reproduce. I suspect you know the one I'm talking about.

52000133_QD__MAIN__14-Quest2017-.name: The experiment with the aino crystal?

52000133_QD__MAIN__15-Quest2017-.name: That's right. No matter how hard I try, I can't replicate our results. I'm missing something...

52000133_QD__MAIN__16-Quest2017-.name: Could it be $MyPCName$? $male:He,female:She$ may have some innate trait that tainted the results. Like the spiritual equivalent of sneezing on a Petri dish.

52000133_QD__MAIN__17-Quest2017-.name: Or maybe I forgot to wash my hands before touching the reagents. Who can say? All I know is that I can't concentrate for too long since that experiment. I've even blacked out a few times.

52000133_QD__MAIN__18-Quest2017-.name: Ah, but don't worry about me. One doesn't get into magical research without being prepared for such risks.

52000133_QD__MAIN__19-Quest2017-.name: That's true. Even our freshmen are fearless. Honestly, sneaking into the professor's magical supplies and running off into the wilderness...

52000133_QD__MAIN__20-Quest2017-.name: He said he wanted to be like $MyPCName$. Imagine that! These kids have no sense in their heads.

52000133_QD__MAIN__21-Quest2017-.name: A freshman... took from my supplies...?

52000135_QD__MAIN__0-Quest2017-.name: This is an aino crystal. We used them when we originally sealed away the Land of Darkness.

52000135_QD__MAIN__1-Quest2017-.name: If my hypothesis is correct, then this crystal will react if we place a $item:20000045$ near it.

52000135_QD__MAIN__2-Quest2017-.name: $MyPCName$, would you do the honor? I've got a spare $item:20000045$ if you need it.

52000135_QD__MAIN__3-Quest2017-.name: Look, it's reacting! That means that the mushrooms themselves are aligned with the darkness.

52000135_QD__MAIN__4-Quest2017-.name: After I came up with my little hypothesis, I created a special soil to let me cultivate $itemPlural:20000045$.

52000135_QD__MAIN__5-Quest2017-.name: When cultivated, the mushrooms seemed to attract monsters. Most informative... if annoying.

52000135_QD__MAIN__6-Quest2017-.name: By extracting energy from the $itemPlural:20000045$, I was able to devise a treatment for shadow poisoning. I'm sure you recall the $item:20000016$ I had you make.

52000135_QD__MAIN__7-Quest2017-.name: Normally, shadow poisoning burrows deep into its victim and hides. It's hard enough to detect, let alone treat... and here we have a potential cure in our hands!

52000135_QD__MAIN__8-Quest2017-.name: Impressive. Have you reported this to our allies?

52000135_QD__MAIN__9-Quest2017-.name: Not yet. This is still far too experimental to share.

52000135_QD__MAIN__14-Quest2017-.name: I've never seen the crystal react like this.

52000135_QD__MAIN__15-Quest2017-.name: I didn't do anything. I just...

52000135_QD__MAIN__16-Quest2017-.name: It's good I didn't file my report yet. This only raises more questions...

52000135_QD__MAIN__17-Quest2017-.name: Indeed. If you need any help analyzing the data, please let me know.

52000136_QD__MAIN__0-Quest2017-.name: Huh? Why is it so dark here? And what is this... suffocating shadow magic...?

52000136_QD__MAIN__6-Quest2017-.name: How did you get here? This part of campus should be twisted into a sub-dimension...

52000136_QD__MAIN__7-Quest2017-.name: What happened here? It's so... dark!

52000150_QD__52000150__9-Quest2017_2-.name: The Path to the Cusp of Life

52000150_QD__52000150__1-Quest2017_2-.name: Ah! My ritual is being disrupted... from inside of him...?!

52000150_QD__52000150__2-Quest2017_2-.name: No... Professor Einos wouldn't do that!

52000150_QD__52000150__4-Quest2017_2-.name: Professor Einos... I will protect you.

52000150_QD__52000150__6-Quest2017_2-.name: Professor Jorge, hang on. I'll take care of these monsters!

52000150_QD__52000150__12-Quest2017_2-.name: Professor! It's okay now. We'll protect you.

52000151_QD__52000151__3-Quest2017_2-.name: My name is Pathos. Don't confuse me for the Innocent of Light.

52000151_QD__52000151__4-Quest2017_2-.name: I am the Innocent of Darkness. I wield the true power of this world, finally freed from the hypocrisy of light.

52000151_QD__52000151__6-Quest2017_2-.name: Then my hypothesis was correct. Einos is an Innocent!

52000151_QD__52000151__7-Quest2017_2-.name: But... I thought there could only be one Innocent in any single world.

52000151_QD__52000151__9-Quest2017_2-.name: I don't have time to worry about the details, but I'll tell you this.

52000151_QD__52000151__13-Quest2017_2-.name: The Cusp of Life is in reach. Then, I'll be able to claim his body as my own.

52000151_QD__52000151__14-Quest2017_2-.name: Your time is over, Innocent of Light.

52000151_QD__52000151__15-Quest2017_2-.name: Soon, I will take back the life you stole from me.

52010006_QD__MAIN__10--.name: Hey, you! I don't know who you are, but help me! I can't leave without my necklace!

52010011_QD__ACT01__0--.name: So, you're the one who helped my granddaughter. She has an eye for people...

52010011_QD__ACT01__1--.name: There's something special about you. Did you know that?

52010011_QD__ACT01__2--.name: I'm not here for a reading, but... How so?

52010011_QD__ACT01__3--.name: Even if I were to tell you, you wouldn't understand. It's something you will have to discover for yourself.

52010011_QD__ACT01__4--.name: Now, I understand you're looking for the creature who came seeking the Lumenstone.

52010011_QD__ACT01__6--.name: I don't know where he went, but I do know where he came from. He belongs to a race of dragons called the nova.

52010011_QD__ACT01__7--.name: The goddesses created many worlds beyond Maple World, and the nova come from one such world called Grandis.

52010011_QD__ACT01__9--.name: Indeed. In the past, it was possible to cross between worlds through interdimensional doors.

52010011_QD__ACT01__10--.name: But those doors vanished with the goddesses. How did such a person make it here? That is a mystery.

52010011_QD__ACT01__11--.name: But what does he want? Why come all this way for the Lumenstone?

52010011_QD__ACT01__12--.name: I can't rightly say. He called himself $npcName:11003053$, and as he left, he chanted...

52010011_QD__ACT01__14--.name: I believe that is the protector of the nova royal family. Why would he want to become their guardian?

52010011_QD__ACT01__15--.name: He hungers for power. I could tell that much from the look in his eyes.

52010011_QD__ACT01__16--.name: Trouble! We're in trouble! We found Mika... but so did that monster!

52010011_QD__ACT01__18--.name: In the sanctum of Nazkar Temple! You have to hurry!

52010011_QD__ACT01__20--.name: Will do. I'll leave Mika to you!

99999909__EVENT_01__0--.name: I can sense the remnants of the past here. It rings throughout this area strongly. An extremely wealthy person lived in this manor.

99999909__EVENT_02__1--.name: Well, no matter. I'm sure you're curious about this place as well...

99999909__EVENT_02__2--.name: Can you feel it? These powerful evil spirits... It's rare to come across so many spirits. They must carry a strong grudge.

99999909__EVENT_02__3--.name: Welcome to the Cursed Mansion. I hope you find the answer you seek...

99999909__EVENT_02__4--.name: Countless spirits have appeared in the middle of the hall through the magic seal. Let's search the manor to see if there are other magic seals in this area.

99999911__MAIN__0--.name: Avoid the flying projectiles and survive until the end. That's the rule.

99999925__MAIN__0--.name: I'll transform you. Stealthily defeat the pirates with your changed abilities.

99999949__07_DETECTLIFTABLEOBJECT__0--.name: Choosing between the wooden box and the rock, move the object that meets the conditions to the sparkling area.

DUNGEON__GIVEUP__TIME__0--.name: The party leader may now choose to abandon the dungeon.

02100000_BF__MAIN__0-GuildRaid01-.name:
<font size='60'>$map:02100000$</font>

Can you believe this cold? Even though it's just a simulation, my teeth are chattering! I hope you packed a warm jacket.

Anyway, you'll need a plan to deal with the cold. You see, there's an even bigger problem to take care of...

02100000_BF__MAIN__1-GuildRaid01-.name:
A monster has set up shop at the top of the mountain. I don't know how it got there. It's not part of the program!

I tried to delete it, but the simulation isn't responding to my commands. You'll need to take care of it the old fashioned way.

Good luck!

02100000_BF__MAIN__2-GuildRaid01-.name: Find a way to protect yourself from the cold.

02100000_BF__MAIN__3-GuildRaid01-.name: The entrance will close in 30 seconds.

02100001_BF__01_MAINMISSION__0-GuildRaid.name: <font size='60'>$map:02100001$</font>\n\nIn this desolate wasteland, you must be strong to survive! Can you complete the Rites of the Apeullela and prove your worth?

02100001_BF__01_MAINMISSION__1-GuildRaid.name:
<FONT color='#ffd200'>The test</FONT> involves<FONT color='#ffd200'> gathering five types of energy</FONT> from the nearby area.

Once you pass the test, you will be accepted as a member of the Apeullela. If not... you'll be abandoned to the wilderness!

There's no need to be so serious: this is just good ol' VR!

Ah, I think I hear the chief calling for you. I bid you good luck!

02100001_BF__01_MAINMISSION__2-GuildRaid.name: Gather <FONT color='#ffd200'>five types of energy</FONT> from near our village! Feel free to ask the members of our tribe details about the energy.

02100001_BF__01_MAINMISSION__3-GuildRaid.name: Once you're <FONT color='#ffd200'>full of energy</FONT>, take the energy <FONT color='#ffd200'>and place it in the jars</FONT> you see behind me. If you gather all five types of energy within <FONT color='#ffd200'>five minutes</FONT>, we will welcome you as a friend.

02100001_BF__01_MAINMISSION__5-GuildRaid.name: Oh, you're in for it now!

02100001_BF__01_MAINMISSION__7-GuildRaid.name: Amazing! The Apeullela accept you as one of their own!

02100001_BF__99_BARRICADE__0-GuildRaid01.name: The cage door closes in 30 seconds.

02100002_BF__01_MAINCONTROL__0-GuildRaid.name:
<font size='60'>$map:02100002$</font>

For years slimes have been used for all manner of things. From dyes, potions, and cosmetics to building materials like cement, slimes find their way into everything.

It was only natural that people took to breeding them, and eventually, the large scale manufacture of artificial slimes.

That's right, slimes were even mass-produced in factories!

02100002_BF__01_MAINCONTROL__1-GuildRaid.name:
On the topic of what goes jiggle in the night, perhaps you've heard of the fabled Rainbow Slime?

First described by the ancient philosopher Bearistotle, the Rainbow Slime is said to be a resplendent and beautiful creature whose extract would cure any ailment, and could be used to produce an elixir of eternal youth. Of course, there hasn't been so much as a verifiable sighting in centuries.

Nevertheless many attempted to give life to the fantastical slime by mixing ordinary, colored slimes. However, the practice has long been outlawed. Perhaps it was too dangerous?

02100002_BF__01_MAINCONTROL__2-GuildRaid.name: Ah, but I'm rambling. The purpose of this simulation is to finally determine whether there's any truth to the myth of the Rainbow Slime... By making one!\n\nAs you can see, this factory has two sections a slime mixing facility below, and a melting facility above. Your success in this experiment depends upon your allocating a sufficient number of individuals to each section.

02100002_BF__01_MAINCONTROL__3-GuildRaid.name: The melting facility on the upper floor has <FONT color='#ffd200'>5 slime extruders</font>, which will continuously release slimes once the factory is operational. It is the task of those in the melting facility to lure the colored slimes into the <FONT color='#ffd200'>$npc:34000141$</font>, filling the color meter in the room below. More on that later.\n\nBe warned that the manufacturing process will result in volatile $npcPlural:34000121$. If they are allowed to reach the $npc:34000141$, the results could be catastrophic. Also, note that the individual slime extruders can be turned on and off using the levers on the upper floor.

02100002_BF__01_MAINCONTROL__4-GuildRaid.name: Those within the mixing facility on the lower floor have two main roles. First is supplying dye to the slime extruders. Simply pick up the dye cannisters, and carry them over to the slime extruder of the same color to fill its tank. The more dye in the tank, the larger the slimes that will be extruded above. The larger the slime lured into the $npc:34000141$ above, the faster the color meter will fill. The second role is monitoring the color meter which indicates how many of the required slimes have been melted down. If any color enters the red section of the gauge, you've added too many. The creation of a Rainbow Slime requires bringing all 5 color meters as close to the limit as possible without going over.

02100002_BF__01_MAINCONTROL__5-GuildRaid.name: Move to one of the work rooms.\nThe left portal leads to the Mixing Station.\nThe right portal leads to the Melting Station.

02100002_BF__01_MAINCONTROL__6-GuildRaid.name: Pull the lever in the mixing room to initiate the manufacturing process.

02100002_BF__01_MAINCONTROL__7-GuildRaid.name: The slime extruder has been activated.

02100002_BF__99_BARRICADE__0-GuildRaid01.name: The portals will close in 30 seconds. Once this occurs, you will no longer be able to travel between floors.

02100004_BF__MAIN__0-GuildRaid01-.name:
<font size='60'>$map:02100004$</font>

Do you hear the music? I'm all fired up! This is where the greatest martial artists come to fight.

Two teams fight with all their might in the center! <FONT color='#ffd200'>The team that survives until the end wins!</FONT>

Both teams take their turns one member at a time. <FONT color='#ffd200'>You'll have to wait on the sidelines if you fall out of the ring.</FONT>

02100009_BF__BARRICADE__0-GuildRaid01-.name:
<font size='60'>$map:02100009$</font>

Ah, the Eternal Arena! This underground fighting ring is the Land of Darkness's worst-kept secret.

They say that the twin champions of the arena are among the strongest in the world. They say that the brothers have impenetrable defenses and love to pound humans into jelly.

But you aren't scared, are you?

02100009_BF__BARRICADE__1-GuildRaid01-.name: Go ahead, take your best shot. Just don't let the two beasts get too close to each other. Or too close to you, for that matter!\n\nI'm sure you'll figure it out. Good luck!

02100009_BF__BARRICADE__2-GuildRaid01-.name: The entrance will close in 30 seconds.

61000011_ME__WINNER_IS-UGCMapOX-.name: Wow, you're a quiz master! Congratulations on your win!

61000011_ME__ENVY_IS-UGCMapOX-.name: Everyone, give a cheer for our big winner!

61000011_ME__GAME_END_BY_CANCEL-UGCMapOX.name: The event was canceled by the host.

61000011_ME__GAME_END_BY_ALL_RETIRED-UGC.name: Game ended because there aren't enough survivors.

61000011_ME__MAIN__SUCCESS_IS-UGCMapOX-.name: The OX Quiz event has ended.

02100009_BF__resurrection_1__0-GuildRaid.name: Defeat the other monster before his brother recovers!

02100009_BF__resurrection_2__0-GuildRaid.name: Defeat the other monster before his brother recovers!

02000375_BF__move__0-Kandura-.name: The lever will disappear in 1 minute.

61000010_ME__main__0-MassiveCrazyRunners.name: Reach the finish line before time runs out.

02100009_BF__text__0-GuildRaid01-.name: Hemos and Pamos have both submitted to your power!

80000014_bonus__lever__0-TreasureMap01-.name: The controls for this are in another location.

80000015_bonus__lever__0-TreasureMap01-.name: The controls for this are in another location.

80000015_bonus__lever2__0-TreasureMap01-.name: The controls for this are in another location.

80000015_bonus__main__0-TreasureMap01-.name: Split your party according to the arrows to make your way through the mine's puzzles.

80000014_bonus__main__0-TreasureMap01-.name: Deep within this abandoned maze of a mine \nlurks a monster. Find it and defeat it!

52010038_QD__EVENT__0-FameContents-.name: It's about time! What took you?

52010038_QD__EVENT__1-FameContents-.name: It's about time! What took you?

52010038_QD__EVENT__2-FameContents-.name: Go! I'll take care of this!

52010038_QD__EVENT__3-FameContents-.name: Go! I'll take care of this!

52010038_QD__MAIN__0-FameContents-.name: They've planted explosives around the reactor! Destroy them, before it's too late!

52010038_QD__MAIN__1-FameContents-.name: $MyPCName$! I found something in the facility's storage! If you can activate it, we might turn the tables on this battle!

52010038_QD__MAIN__2-FameContents-.name: I'm sorry, Katvan... I don't want to destroy everything you worked for, but I can't let the ship fall into their hands.

52010039_QD__52010039__0-FameContents-.name: Preparations for take-off are complete! B-but $MyPCName$ and the others are still fighting!

52010039_QD__52010039__2-FameContents-.name: You want to fire the cannon inside the base?

52010039_QD__52010039__3-FameContents-.name: ...This carrier is just a hunk of worthless scrap iron without them.

52010039_QD__52010039__4-FameContents-.name: We have no choice but to use 'that.' We'll hurt them and buy time for our allies.
