52010039_QD__52010039__5-FameContents-.name: Take us up!\nReady the XR-class weapon and wait for my signal!

52010040_QD__52010040__2-FameContents-.name: Pre-flight checks complete. All systems nominal. Awaiting your orders, Captain!

52010040_QD__52010040__4-FameContents-.name: This is the captain. We embark now on a mission of unprecedented importance.

52010040_QD__52010040__5-FameContents-.name: We are the shield of the alliance.

52010040_QD__52010040__6-FameContents-.name: Now and forevermore, we will defend this world from harm!

52010054_QD__52010054_QD__0-FameContents.name: Was it Tristan again? Gah! After all the centuries, that family continues to vex us.

52010054_QD__52010054_QD__1-FameContents.name: We should have delayed the summoning! What if our master awakens in this incomplete form? Gyaahh!

52010054_QD__52010054_QD__2-FameContents.name: ...Brothers, cast away your fears. We will recover the missing component.

52010054_QD__52010054_QD__3-FameContents.name: Yes... And then our master will be unstoppable!

52010054_QD__52010054_QD__4-FameContents.name: Sky Fortress Chapter 1, Fleet's Top Priority Mission

52020036_QD__MAIN__2-FameContents-.name: Remember, this battle is just a ploy! Direct all your efforts into securing our true objective!

52020036_QD__MAIN__3-FameContents-.name: Those fiends dare set foot in my homeland? Unforgivable!

52020036_QD__MAIN__4-FameContents-.name: We've got injured! Bring them to the infirmary, and I'll look after them!

52020036_QD__MAIN__5-FameContents-.name: Foolish humans and their pointless resistance. We have what we came for! Brothers, fall back!

52020036_QD__MAIN__6-FameContents-.name: They're... falling back! Good work, everyone!

52020036_QD__MAIN__7-FameContents-.name: Any longer and we wouldn't have made it.

52020036_QD__MAIN__11-FameContents-.name: Let's go somewhere quiet, we have a lot to discuss.

02020019_BF__02020019_main__0-FameChalle.name: Welcome to my combat simulator! I've loaded it up with all of the latest operations manuals and data from our own battles!

02020019_BF__02020019_main__1-FameChalle.name: This test will be really tough. I hope you're ready!

02020019_BF__02020019_main__2-FameChalle.name: Step into the battle arena below to begin.

02020020_BF__02020020_main__0-FameChalle.name: Welcome to my combat simulator! I've loaded it up with all of the latest operations manuals and data from our own battles!

02020020_BF__02020020_main__1-FameChalle.name: This test will be really tough. I hope you're ready!

02020020_BF__02020020_main__2-FameChalle.name: Step into the battle arena below to begin.

02020021_BF__main__0-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Plenty of Dark Wind rookies came here to train.

02020021_BF__main__1-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Sadly, lots of them didn't survive long enough to be full agents...

02020022_BF__main__0-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Plenty of Dark Wind rookies came here to train.

02020022_BF__main__1-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Sadly, lots of them didn't survive long enough to be full agents...

02020023_BF__main__0-FameChallengeDungeo.name: I won't hold back, and neither should you.

02020023_BF__main__1-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Don't think of me as your captain. Think of me as an enemy who must be defeated.

02020024_BF__main__0-FameChallengeDungeo.name: I won't hold back, and neither should you.

02020024_BF__main__1-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Don't think of me as your captain. Think of me as an enemy who must be defeated.

02020025_BF__main__0-FameChallengeDungeo.name: You really think you can beat me, cadet?

02020025_BF__main__1-FameChallengeDungeo.name: It's not too late to give up.

02020025_BF__main__2-FameChallengeDungeo.name: You better not hold back, you hear?

02020026_BF__main__0-FameChallengeDungeo.name: You really think you can beat me, cadet?

02020026_BF__main__1-FameChallengeDungeo.name: It's not too late to give up.

02020026_BF__main__2-FameChallengeDungeo.name: You better not hold back, you hear?

02020027_BF__main__0-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Are you destined to protect this world? Or fail it?

02020028_BF__main__0-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Are you destined to protect this world? Or fail it?

02020020_BF__02020020_battle__0-FameChal.name: Let's start the test. Since it's your first time, I'll lower the battle parameters.

02020020_BF__02020020_battle__1-FameChal.name: I think this should be a better challenge for you.

02020020_BF__02020020_battle__2-FameChal.name: This is today's last test. Hold out a little longer!

02020020_BF__02020020_battle__3-FameChal.name: Thanks for participating in today's test. I'm expecting you to do even better next time!

52010038_QD__allert__0-FameContents-.name: Protect the engineers so they can get the ship ready to fly!

52010038_QD__event__4-FameContents-.name: $MyPCName$, are you okay?! They must have rigged it to blow...

52010038_QD__gauge__3-FameContents-.name: Launch preparations complete! All hands, board the ship immediately!

52010038_QD__main__4-FameContents-.name: We're not leaving anyone behind! Treat any injured crew you encounter.

52010038_QD__main__5-FameContents-.name: The ship won't fly without a reactor. Stop the bombs before they detonate.

52010038_QD__main__6-FameContents-.name: Phew... the reactor's safe! We could use some more help on the upper levels!

52010038_QD__main__7-FameContents-.name: Ooooh! That's a prototype of the MK 52 Alpha! It was just sitting in storage?

52010038_QD__main__8-FameContents-.name: They're after the pulsejet! Defend it or we're dead in the water!

52020036_QD__main__12-FameContents-.name: There's too many of them! We can't hold out much longer!

52020036_QD__main__13-FameContents-.name: Good work holding the enemy at bay, kid, but you can stand aside. I'll take it from here.

52020036_QD__main__14-FameContents-.name: I'll see to it the injured get the medical attention they need. Perion is in your debt!

52020036_QD__main__15-FameContents-.name: $MyPCName$, we have a fix on your position!

52020036_QD__main__16-FameContents-.name: We're dropping supplies that should help turn the tides on this battle, as we speak!

52020036_QD__main__17-FameContents-.name: Crossbows away! Use them in good health.

52020036_QD__main__18-FameContents-.name: A crossbow? Are you kidding?! Where are the big guns?

52020036_QD__main__19-FameContents-.name: We can't risk bringing Sky Fortress in close while the enemy's ship is in the air!

52020036_QD__main__20-FameContents-.name: Hmph... Fine, I'll do everything myself!

52020036_QD__main__22-FameContents-.name: We've got trouble! Radar is detecting numerous contacts converging on the altar!

52010065_QD__52010065_main__0-FameConten.name: How did you get in here?!

52010065_QD__52010065_main__1-FameConten.name: Making me come to a squalid place like this. Are you happy?

52010065_QD__52010065_main__2-FameConten.name: Hmph, that is as far as you go!

52010065_QD__52010065_main__4-FameConten.name: What a cute and futile effort. Allow me to create a path, master.

52010065_QD__52010065_main__6-FameConten.name: If those would-be heroes keep meddling in my plans...

52010065_QD__52010065_main__7-FameConten.name: I suppose I'll have to send one of my toys up into the sky to deal with them.

52010068_QD__MAIN__2-LapentaFrontierQues.name: I'll go on ahead. Don't be long.

52010056_QD__EventSection__2-FameContent.name: Yes, my brothers... Long have we toiled.

52010056_QD__EventSection__3-FameContent.name: For years we've wandered in search of our true master's blood.

52010056_QD__EventSection__4-FameContent.name: The time of our redemption is at hand!

52010056_QD__EventSection__5-FameContent.name: Soon, our great and terrible master will return!

52010056_QD__EventSection__6-FameContent.name: Alongside $npc:11003821$ we shall burn this world to ash!

52010056_QD__EventSection__7-FameContent.name: Let us unleash an era of terror and destruction that knows no equal!

52010056_QD__EventSection__15-FameConten.name: This place has been twisted by Infernog's evil...

52010056_QD__EventSection__18-FameConten.name: Foolish insect. You've stepped through the gates of hell of your own accord.

52010056_QD__EventSection__20-FameConten.name: Hey, monkey-guy. I don't suppose you could just let me go?

52010056_QD__EventSection__22-FameConten.name: This place will be your grave!

52010056_QD__EventSection__24-FameConten.name: There's only one way out of here...

52010056_QD__EventSection__31-FameConten.name: Not precisely. Just a part of his soul.

52010056_QD__EventSection__32-FameConten.name: Drinking his blood... What a curious decision.

52010056_QD__EventSection__33-FameConten.name: You'll never control me, so stay out of my head, demon!

52010056_QD__EventSection__34-FameConten.name: Control you? Hahaha. That would be too easy. No..

52010056_QD__EventSection__36-FameConten.name: Don't worry, I have no interest in taking over this pathetic body.

52010056_QD__EventSection__37-FameConten.name: It is far more amusing to corrupt than to control...

52010056_QD__EventSection__38-FameConten.name: Let's have some fun, shall we?

52010056_QD__EventSection__39-FameConten.name: Heh. It's been a while since I had any fun!

52010056_QD__EventSection__40-FameConten.name: A fiery power burns within you.

52010056_QD__EventSection__41-FameConten.name: The fire inside you burns hotter.

52010056_QD__EventSection__42-FameConten.name: There's nowhere to run! Prepare to die!

52010056_QD__EventSection__43-FameConten.name: We'll retrieve the master's blood from your battered corpse.

52010056_QD__EventSection__45-FameConten.name: Huh? Is the human suffering some kind of a breakdown?

52010056_QD__EventSection__47-FameConten.name: We've played with them enough. Let's end this.

52010056_QD__EventSection__48-FameConten.name: Is that it? Hah. Time to die!

52010056_QD__EventSection_B__1-FameConte.name: Stop the fleeing $npcName:11003816$ before it calls for backup.

52010063_QD__main__2-FameContents_EP1_02.name: Who are you? How did you reach this place?

52010063_QD__main__3-FameContents_EP1_02.name: Grrr... And you, what were you all doing? How did you allow this pathetic interloper to enter?

52010063_QD__main__6-FameContents_EP1_02.name: You fools. This ritual was already interrupted the moment that meddler arrived.

52010063_QD__main__7-FameContents_EP1_02.name: So long have the insects of his lineage vexed me... Forcing me to go to such lengths to take back what is mine.

52010063_QD__main__8-FameContents_EP1_02.name: No matter... It will be mine again in time. So long as my blood runs within his veins, he belongs to me.

52010063_QD__main__9-FameContents_EP1_02.name: Hear me, loyal servants. I give you the chance to redeem yourselves. Dispatch this interloper.

52010063_QD__main__10-FameContents_EP1_0.name: Carry out my will while I retake what is mine. I will not suffer another failure!

52010063_QD__main__14-FameContents_EP1_0.name: $MyPCName$, I've been monitoring remotely. There may be a solution to our quandary. Return to the carrier with $npcName:11000144$, and join me and the officers in the briefing room.

52010063_QD__main__15-FameContents_EP1_0.name: Are you giving up? You're pathetic! If you can't kill it, keep on hitting it 'til it wishes it were dead! What do you mean I'm too harsh? Let go—*bzzt*

52010062_QD__main__0-FameContents_EP1_02.name: Our master begins to stir. If he awakens now...

52010062_QD__main__1-FameContents_EP1_02.name: It's too soon! ...This is all your fault!

52010062_QD__main__4-FameContents_EP1_02.name: You fools... What have you done?

52010062_QD__main__5-FameContents_EP1_02.name: My power is... incomplete. Explain yourselves!

52010062_QD__main__7-FameContents_EP1_02.name: We collected all of your blood... R-right, brothers?

52010062_QD__main__9-FameContents_EP1_02.name: If what you say is true, then there is only one explanation...

52010062_QD__main__10-FameContents_EP1_0.name: The insects of that accursed family have once more meddled in my affairs...

52010062_QD__main__12-FameContents_EP1_0.name: ...I will take what's mine by force.

52010064_QD__main__1-FameContents_EP1_02.name: Because of me, the Sky Fortress is in danger.

52010064_QD__main__2-FameContents_EP1_02.name: I have to buy them time...

52010064_QD__main__3-FameContents_EP1_02.name: Or else they'll never get to fire the weapon.

52010064_QD__main__4-FameContents_EP1_02.name: That's the only way they'll have a fighting chance.

52010064_QD__main__5-FameContents_EP1_02.name: I know this is reckless, but it's the only shot we've got...

52010061_QD__main__2-FameContents_EP1_02.name: It feels like... the aura of an ancient demon.

52010061_QD__main__3-FameContents_EP1_02.name: $npc:11001567$, we need to locate the source of this evil immediately. If we do not, this world will see a disaster like in days long past.

52010061_QD__main__4-FameContents_EP1_02.name: No, our first priority is sealing the dark energy.

52010061_QD__main__5-FameContents_EP1_02.name: Otherwise our old friend will doubtlessly use it to create a rune of darkness.

52010061_QD__main__7-FameContents_EP1_02.name: Once he has it, the next step is obvious. He'll try awaken the Rune Titan.

52010061_QD__main__8-FameContents_EP1_02.name: This is not a threat we can handle alone.

52010061_QD__main__9-FameContents_EP1_02.name: We need to call on our allies across the sea.

52010055_QD__52010055__0-FameContents-.name: Shield of the skies? It's about to be scrap in the dirt!

52010055_QD__52010055__3-FameContents-.name: I've got reports of the enemy inside the ship! There's too many of them!

52010055_QD__52010055__5-FameContents-.name: Condor, Schatten, and Mason, take care of any enemies who've made it inside!

52010055_QD__52010055__6-FameContents-.name: Piece of cake! Leave it to me!

52010055_QD__52010055__8-FameContents-.name: Deireadh, it’s time to share your pain.

52010055_QD__52010055__9-FameContents-.name: Nairin, your task is to coordinate efforts around the ship and restore order!

52010055_QD__52010055__11-FameContents-.name: $MyPCName$, dispatch the enemies attempting to breach the deck.

52010055_QD__52010055__12-FameContents-.name: All crew with combat experience should engage the enemy boarding party.

52010055_QD__52010055__13-FameContents-.name: But if our entire fighting force is out there, you'll be...

52010055_QD__52010055__14-FameContents-.name: I can take care of myself.

52010055_QD__52010055__15-FameContents-.name: Our foes may be many, but we are strong.

52010055_QD__52010055__18-FameContents-.name: Oh no! I'm detecting a huge group arriving on the deck... I don't think $MyPCName$ can handle them alone...

52010055_QD__52010055__19-FameContents-.name: Oh! The guns are malfunctioning! We'll have to aim them manually.

52010055_QD__52010055__20-FameContents-.name: I will deactivate the hatch lock on the guns! The power of the guns will be immense even with manual control!

52010055_QD__52010055__21-FameContents-.name: Still you resist! Your efforts are futile!

52010055_QD__52010055__26-FameContents-.name: How dare you touch my subordinate!

52010055_QD__52010055__28-FameContents-.name: This isn't over... This world will be engulfed in unending darkness!

52010055_QD__52010055__29-FameContents-.name: Graah! They beat the boss! Flee!

52010055_QD__52010055__31-FameContents-.name: That was was a pretty messy situation, wasn't it?

52010055_QD__52010055__32-FameContents-.name: You performed expertly. Even Deireadh was in awe of your might.

52010055_QD__52010055__33-FameContents-.name: The enemy has retreated! Good job everyone.

52010055_QD__52010055__34-FameContents-.name: Everyone outside the carrier, return to the command center.

52010055_QD__52010055__35-FameContents-.name: Our first priority is restoring order to the ship.

52010055_QD__52010055__36-FameContents-.name: Med teams! Go deck by deck and treat our injured. Engineering teams, restore all critical ship functions!

02020019_BF__02020019_battle__0-FameChal.name: Combat parameters locked in! Shall we start the simulation?

02020019_BF__02020019_battle__1-FameChal.name: This next wave should be tougher!

02020019_BF__02020019_battle__2-FameChal.name: Looks like that was too easy for you. Let's turn up the settings!

02020019_BF__02020019_battle__3-FameChal.name: You're doing better than I expected. I'll increase their combat level.

02020019_BF__02020019_battle__4-FameChal.name: Not many people make it this far.

02020019_BF__02020019_main__5-FameChalle.name: The test will end when you're knocked out. Good luck!

02020019_BF__02020019_main__7-FameChalle.name: This is invaluable data. Thanks for participating!

02020021_BF__battle__0-FameChallengeDung.name: The battle's just begun. Don't get cocky!

02020021_BF__battle__1-FameChallengeDung.name: I bet I can make you sweat.

02020021_BF__battle__2-FameChallengeDung.name: Don't be above cheap tricks. On the battlefield, defeat means death!

02020021_BF__main__7-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Amazing! You definitely have what it takes to join the Shadow Walkers!

02020021_BF__main__8-FameChallengeDungeo.name: I really was hoping you would last longer...

02020023_BF__battle__0-FameChallengeDung.name: That's enough sparring for one day.

02020023_BF__main__5-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Fight for as long as you can stay on your feet.

02020023_BF__main__6-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Keep moving if you want to survive!

02020023_BF__main__7-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Excellent. It's seems I have quite the capable crewman on my hands.

02020023_BF__main__8-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Your form isn't bad, but you need more training.

02020025_BF__main__5-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Isn't this the Royal Guard's training yard?

02020025_BF__main__6-FameChallengeDungeo.name: I know I can, old man!

02020025_BF__main__7-FameChallengeDungeo.name: You only get one shot at this. Here I come!

02020025_BF__main__8-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Huff... I was going easy on you. Didn't know I was such a nice guy, did you?

02020025_BF__main__9-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Bahaha! Did you really think you could defeat me, Condor?

02020027_BF__02020027_battle__0-FameChal.name: That will be enough for today.

02020027_BF__battle_1__0-FameChallengeDu.name: Mason is preparing a powerful attack. Defeat the Lumiknight phantoms to stop him.

02020027_BF__main__6-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Now, show me your true strength.

02020027_BF__main__7-FameChallengeDungeo.name: Hmm... Well, you show great promise.

02000410_BF__Event01__0-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: We've taken out the cannons on their port and starboard sides! They're swinging around to fire the main guns!

02000410_BF__Event01__1-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: Quickly, man the cannons at the front of the ship!

02000410_BF__Event01__2-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: We've disabled the enemy's weapons! I think they're backing off...

02000410_BF__Event01__3-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: ...Wait! I'm detecting a huge energy spike from inside their ship!

02000410_BF__Event01__4-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: ...Infernog. So you've decided to show yourself. Now the real battle begins.

02000410_BF__Event01__5-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: Analyzing sensor readings... There seems to be some kind of magical barrier around Infernog!

02000410_BF__Event01__6-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: Unless we destroy that shield, it won't matter if we hit him with the cannon!

02000410_BF__Event01__7-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: $MyPCName$, I believe in you. Break through Infernog's defenses so we can end this threat for good!

02000410_BF__Event01__8-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: Analyzing sensor readings... Infernog seems to be more powerful than we thought!

02000410_BF__Event01__9-CrimsonBalrog01-.name: Unless we first weaken Infernog, it won't matter if we hit him with the cannon!

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__0-CrimsonBalro.name: All hands, prepare the cannon to fire while $MyPCName$ keeps Infernog distracted.

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__1-CrimsonBalro.name: Aye, captain! Connecting cannon to main reactor!

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__2-CrimsonBalro.name: You fools seek to challenge Infernog, the immortal demon lord? MWAHAHAHA!

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__3-CrimsonBalro.name: Go, my minions! Crush the humans and their puny ship while I rally my strength!

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__4-CrimsonBalro.name: Hmph! We won't go down so easy! $MyPCName$, I'll keep the ship steady. Deal with Infernog and his battleship!

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__5-CrimsonBalro.name: The Big Gun is in position!

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__7-CrimsonBalro.name: The Magitron reactor is at 90% capacity!

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__8-CrimsonBalro.name: Do we have a firing solution on Infernog?

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__9-CrimsonBalro.name: It's not that easy to lock onto a moving target!

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__10-CrimsonBalr.name: $MyPCName$, we need more time. I'm counting on you!

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__11-CrimsonBalr.name: Analyzing enemy movement and calculating predicted targeting correction!

02000410_BF__PopUpCinema__12-CrimsonBalr.name: We're only a few minutes from a targeting lock! The fate of the world is in your hands, just hold out a little longer!

02000410_BF__ClearCheck__0-CrimsonBalrog.name: No! You can't give up now! Get back on your feet!

02000410_BF__ClearCheck__1-CrimsonBalrog.name: There's not enough time! Abort the targeting sequence and sound the retreat, before Infernog turns his attention to us!

02000410_BF__ClearCheck__7-CrimsonBalrog.name: Gah! This is but a flesh wound... You only delay the inevitable. All will kneel before me, or burn in hellfire!

02000410_BF__ClearCheck__8-CrimsonBalrog.name: ...D-did it work? Wait... No! I'm still detecting Infernog on radar!

02000410_BF__ClearCheck__9-CrimsonBalrog.name: ...I'm afraid we've failed. Infernog's shield was too powerful. $MyPCName$, return to the ship and we'll revisit our plan.

02000410_BF__ClearCheck__10-CrimsonBalro.name: We can't go on like this! The ship can't hold out against their cannons!

02000410_BF__ClearCheck__11-CrimsonBalro.name: D-did it work? Wait... No! I'm still detecting Infernog on radar!

02000410_BF__ClearCheck__12-CrimsonBalro.name: It seems Infernog got away... $MyPCName$, return to the ship for now.

02020098_BF__PopUpCinema__0-Kritias_Infe.name: Can you survive the curse of my gaze? Mwahaha!

52010052_QD__ACT01__0-FameContents-.name: With this power... I don't need your help. I'll stop $npcName:11003795$ on my own!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__0-Surviv.name: Ohoho! Welcome to Mushking Royale hosted by yours truly, the magnanimous Mushking!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__1-Surviv.name: Prove your might by defeating all other participants!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__2-Surviv.name: It seems like not everyone is here yet. Let's wait a bit longer.

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__3-Surviv.name: Aww you're all so cute with your tiny little heads. If you were bigger than me, I'd have to eat you to gain your power. Ohoho!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__4-Surviv.name: Isn't Mushtopia beautiful? Although I'm curious to learn more about this 'Victoria Island'...

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__5-Surviv.name: Ugh! How long must I wait? Everymush has their limits!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__6-Surviv.name: You may have noticed that I've used my mushnificent power to return you to the sad and squishy forms of your youth. Best way to ensure a fair fight!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__7-Surviv.name: However, I have prepared several useful items to spice things up. You will find them in chests or on mushrooms. Use them well!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__8-Surviv.name: My Sleepy Spores will cover more and more of the battlefield as time goes on.

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__9-Surviv.name: I wouldn't breathe those spores in if I were you. At least, not if you want to win. Ohohoho!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__10-Survi.name: The Mushroom Towers throughout the map will reveal your position to others. Be wary!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__11-Survi.name: Alright, shall we move to the starting point?

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__12-Survi.name: Hop aboard my hot-mush balloon to find a good starting spot.

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__13-Survi.name: The winner will receive my favor, and the losers get nothing! Ohohoho!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__15-Survi.name: What? Is this everyone? We can't hold a match with turnout this poor!

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__16-Survi.name: Regrettably, I'll have to cancel the match. Head on back, and we'll try this again later.

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__17-Survi.name: Ahem, I suppose there are enough of you here. Good! Now let's begin.

82000012_survival__01_SURVIVAL__18-Survi.name: You will be returned to your previous location momentarily.

82000012_survival__05_RAREBOX__0-Surviva.name: I've placed a golden mushroom chest near a Mushroom Tower. Go and find it!

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__0-Surviv.name: Ohoho! Welcome to Mushking Royale hosted by yours truly, the magnanimous Mushking!

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__1-Surviv.name: Prove your might by defeating all other participants!

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__2-Surviv.name: It seems like not everyone is here yet. Let's wait a bit longer.

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__3-Surviv.name: Aww you're all so cute with your tiny little heads. If you were bigger than me, I'd have to eat you to gain your power. Ohoho!

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__4-Surviv.name: Isn't Mushtopia beautiful? Although I'm curious to learn more about this 'Victoria Island'...

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__5-Surviv.name: Ugh! How long must I wait? Everymush has their limits!

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__6-Surviv.name: You may have noticed that I've used my mushnificent power to return you to the sad and squishy forms of your youth. Best way to ensure a fair fight!

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__7-Surviv.name: However, I have prepared several useful items to spice things up. You will find them in chests or on mushrooms. Use them well!

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__8-Surviv.name: My Sleepy Spores will cover more and more of the battlefield as time goes on.

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__9-Surviv.name: I wouldn't breathe those spores in if I were you. At least, not if you want to win. Ohohoho!

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__10-Survi.name: The Mushroom Towers throughout the map will reveal your position to others. Be wary!

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__11-Survi.name: Alright, shall we move to the starting point?

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__12-Survi.name: Want to head somewhere far away? Hop aboard my hot-mush balloon. Choosing a starting location is an important part of battle strategy.

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__13-Survi.name: The winner will receive my favor, and the losers get nothing! Ohohoho!

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__15-Survi.name: What? Is this everyone? We can't hold a match with turnout this poor!

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__16-Survi.name: Regrettably, I'll have to cancel the match. Head on back, and we'll try this again later.

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__17-Survi.name: Ahem, I suppose there are enough of you here. Good! Now let's begin.

82000006_survival__01_SURVIVAL__18-Survi.name: You will be returned to your previous location momentarily.

82000006_survival__05_RAREBOX__0-Surviva.name: I've placed a golden mushroom chest near a Mushroom Tower. Go and find it!

52000086_QD__50001540__1-LapentaFrontier.name: You're alive...! I've missed you so much.

52000086_QD__50001540__2-LapentaFrontier.name: Your majesty! I never thought I'd see you again... Thank goodness you're unharmed!

52000086_QD__50001540__3-LapentaFrontier.name: My beloved, $npcName:11003074$... We are finally reunited at last. Oh how I've longed for this day.

52000086_QD__50001540__4-LapentaFrontier.name: Your Majesties! I hate to interrupt your reunion, but I have to tell you... The frozen crystal's seal is unstable.

52000086_QD__50001540__5-LapentaFrontier.name: We'd better get out of here and seal the path.

52000086_QD__50001540__8-LapentaFrontier.name: Leave? After how long I've waited for this day? That's absurd...

52000086_QD__50001540__10-LapentaFrontie.name: It's time to begin the ritual! Anyone who seeks to interfere will face death.

52000086_QD__50001540__11-LapentaFrontie.name: $npcName:11000004$... Your injuries are serious. You need treatment immediately.

52000086_QD__50001540__12-LapentaFrontie.name: Adventurer, I have a request. Please follow $npcName:11003075$. I'll catch up after I've tended to $npcName:11000004$'s wounds.

52000086_QD__50001540__13-LapentaFrontie.name: You are either very brave or very stupid to ignore my warning, human.

52000086_QD__50001540__14-LapentaFrontie.name: With this power, I am stronger than ever. I can finally restore my kingdom.

52000086_QD__HP50__0-LapentaFrontierQues.name: $npcName:11003075$... What really happened? We waited day and night for you and our missing countrymen to return...

52000086_QD__HP50__1-LapentaFrontierQues.name: $npcName:11003074$, my love... Now that we are together again, we can start anew.

52000086_QD__HP50__2-LapentaFrontierQues.name: All that remains is to begin the ritual.

52000086_QD__HP50__3-LapentaFrontierQues.name: ...$npcName:11003075$. This place seethes with darkness. What is this "ritual" you speak of...?

52000086_QD__HP50__4-LapentaFrontierQues.name: A mysterious benefactor gifted me the 'Power of Darkness' so that together, you and I can unseal the frozen crystal.

52000086_QD__HP50__5-LapentaFrontierQues.name: Come, take my hand. Let us use this power to free the crystal, and build a kingdom that shall live on for eternity.

52000086_QD__HP50__6-LapentaFrontierQues.name: $npcName:11003075$, have you forgotten why our ancestors sealed the crystal and this temple away?

52000086_QD__HP50__7-LapentaFrontierQues.name: If the crystal overloads, the entire world will be buried in ice. Innumerable lives will be lost in the cold!

52000086_QD__HP50__8-LapentaFrontierQues.name: What concern is that to us?

52000086_QD__HP50__10-LapentaFrontierQue.name: This world was built upon the sacrifices we have made, yet it teeters on the edge of chaos. There is nothing here worth saving.

52000086_QD__HP50__11-LapentaFrontierQue.name: It is time to restore our kingdom. My dear, sweet $npcName:11003074$...

52000086_QD__HP50__12-LapentaFrontierQue.name: Let us blanket this world in unending snow, and rebuild our kingdom such that it may never fall again.

52000086_QD__HP50__15-LapentaFrontierQue.name: For days beyond counting my heart has ached for your return... But the man for whom I've waited is not the man who stands before me.

52000086_QD__HP50__16-LapentaFrontierQue.name: This world is theirs now. Our time has ended.

52000086_QD__HP50__17-LapentaFrontierQue.name: You have not seen the beauty of their world... the colors of spring, of life. This frozen world of ours, despite its beauty, pales in comparison.

52000086_QD__HP50__18-LapentaFrontierQue.name: Our world has no more right to exist than theirs... In making that exchange, you would be no different than those who brought ruin to our kingdom.

52000086_QD__HP50__19-LapentaFrontierQue.name: I will not let you unseal the frozen crystal!

52000086_QD__HP50__20-LapentaFrontierQue.name: I will defend the crystal, and this world! Just as you and I defended our land so long ago!

52000086_QD__HP50__21-LapentaFrontierQue.name: The darkness is receding... Open your eyes, $npcName:11003075$!

52000086_QD__HP50__22-LapentaFrontierQue.name: So even the darkness has abandoned me... Hah. Hahaha...

52000086_QD__HP50__24-LapentaFrontierQue.name: So long was I lost within the depths of darkness in this forsaken land. Without you, the dark was my only companion.

52000086_QD__HP50__25-LapentaFrontierQue.name: And yet in all that time, my thoughts were only of you.

52000086_QD__HP50__26-LapentaFrontierQue.name: I never imagined that you, out of everyone, would abandon me.

52000086_QD__HP50__28-LapentaFrontierQue.name: Listen carefully, $npcName:11003074$. I will never give up on my dream. When I return, I will usher in the dawn of a new world.

52000086_QD__HP50__33-LapentaFrontierQue.name: I have foolishly endangered my friends, all to rescue a man better left dead...

52000099_QD__MAIN__15-LapentaFrontierQue.name: I think our luck's run out...

52000099_QD__MAIN__16-LapentaFrontierQue.name: Well... At least I get to go down fighting with someone like you by my side...

52000099_QD__MAIN__17-LapentaFrontierQue.name: Though, it's a shame I wasn't able to unravel the secret of the dragons.

52000099_QD__MAIN__18-LapentaFrontierQue.name: Tch... I can't believe I'm thinking about that 'fool'...

52000099_QD__MAIN__19-LapentaFrontierQue.name: Well, they're not taking us down without a fight!

52000099_QD__MAIN__33-LapentaFrontierQue.name: Lucky for you, teleportation is within the purview of spatial magic!

52010068_QD__MAIN__3-LapentaFrontierQues.name: Grr... My fortress... My beautiful fortress...

52010068_QD__MAIN__4-LapentaFrontierQues.name: You... insects! I won't forgive you for this!

52010068_QD__MAIN__5-LapentaFrontierQues.name: But I can't face the $npc:11003894$ like this...

52010068_QD__MAIN__6-LapentaFrontierQues.name: There'll be no end to his scolding. No—this time, he might not forgive me at all.

52010068_QD__MAIN__7-LapentaFrontierQues.name: Luka! Let's get out of here, just you and me.

52010068_QD__MAIN__8-LapentaFrontierQues.name: If we face the $npc:11003894$ after losing Madrakan and the dark crystal to the servants of light, there's no doubt he'll kill us. No! I've suffered enough!

52010068_QD__MAIN__9-LapentaFrontierQues.name: But to surrender to the servants of light... I'd rather kill myself!

52010068_QD__MAIN__10-LapentaFrontierQue.name: So... Why don't we just run away? You'll come with me, won't you?

52010068_QD__MAIN__11-LapentaFrontierQue.name: $npc:11003144$, you're all I need... As long as I'm with you, I can go anywhere!

52010068_QD__MAIN__13-LapentaFrontierQue.name: And when the time comes... We'll find a way to have our revenge on the servants of light!

52010068_QD__MAIN__14-LapentaFrontierQue.name: Then the $npc:11003894$ will be sure to forgive us! He'll take us back!

52100011_QD__MAIN__2-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: How dare they block our path!

52100011_QD__MAIN__3-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: Calm down, $npcName:11003085$. We need to find $npcName:11003086$.

52100011_QD__MAIN__17-ChronicleDungeon60.name: You've got to commandeer the ship!

52100011_QD__MAIN__19-ChronicleDungeon60.name: You've got to raise the anchors if this ship is going anywhere.

52100012_QD__MAIN__5-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: Defeat the pirates still aboard the ship!

52100012_QD__MAIN__10-ChronicleDungeon60.name: I'll not stand this any longer!

52100012_QD__MAIN__11-ChronicleDungeon60.name: Take your pollution and leave, landwalkers!

52100012_QD__MAIN__16-ChronicleDungeon60.name: It's too early to give up. Let's dive down and find $npcName:11003086$.

52100012_QD__MAIN__17-ChronicleDungeon60.name: These baby whales will give you a lift! Mount up!

52100013_QD__AI__4-ChronicleDungeon60_01.name: Have you come to your senses?

52100013_QD__AI__5-ChronicleDungeon60_01.name: What made you behave that way?

52100013_QD__MAIN__0-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: Watch your tail, landwalker. $npcName:11003086$ is furious!

52100013_QD__SUMMON__0-ChronicleDungeon6.name: Look out, those baby whales have gone feral!

52100031_QD__FACTION_01__0-ChronicleDung.name: You have to destroy the turrets before we can take the bridge!

52100031_QD__FACTION_02__0-ChronicleDung.name: Royal Guards, charge! Do your part!

52100031_QD__FACTION_03__0-ChronicleDung.name: We can't let them have all the fun! Show them the might of Taliskar!

52100031_QD__MADRICANSIEGE__0-ChronicleD.name: All right, let's clear a path!

52100031_QD__MADRICANSIEGE__2-ChronicleD.name: It seems we've found a hidden passage. This'll be perfect for entering undetected.

52100031_QD__MADRICANSIEGE__3-ChronicleD.name: There's no room for a large group to maneuver. We'll need to send a small party ahead.

52100031_QD__MADRICANSIEGE__4-ChronicleD.name: Join us in the search once you've finished here.

52100041_QD__EVENT_01__0-ChronicleDungeo.name: An old mansion lies dusty and forgotten, haunted by visions of the past.

52100041_QD__EVENT_02__0-ChronicleDungeo.name: Ah, I see we have unexpected guests.

52100041_QD__EVENT_02__1-ChronicleDungeo.name: Perhaps you are curious about this place as well...

52100041_QD__EVENT_02__2-ChronicleDungeo.name: Do you sense the lingering specters of the past? A powerful grudge must hold them here.

52100041_QD__EVENT_02__3-ChronicleDungeo.name: Welcome to this accursed manor. I hope you find the answers you seek...

52100041_QD__EVENT_02__5-ChronicleDungeo.name: I will make this place sparkle!

52100041_QD__EVENT_02__6-ChronicleDungeo.name: I'm so happy to work here!

52100041_QD__EVENT_02__7-ChronicleDungeo.name: Mistress hates bugs. I've got to keep things clean.

52100041_QD__MAGIC_01__1-ChronicleDungeo.name: Cough... I think I'm coming down with something...

52100041_QD__MAGIC_02__0-ChronicleDungeo.name: ...The master did not eat today, either.

52100041_QD__MAGIC_02__1-ChronicleDungeo.name: Our lady is very sick. He must be too worried to eat...

52100041_QD__MAGIC_03__1-ChronicleDungeo.name: ...The fever is not going down... This is bad.

52100041_QD__MAGIC_04__1-ChronicleDungeo.name: What's a good book to read to my daughter?

52100041_QD__MAGIC_05__3-ChronicleDungeo.name: We must cure her, no matter the cost!

52100041_QD__MAGIC_06__0-ChronicleDungeo.name: Can... can we cure this illness...?!

52100041_QD__MAGIC_06__1-ChronicleDungeo.name: Right now, $npcName:11001812$ is working on his research as best he can.

52100041_QD__MAGIC_06__2-ChronicleDungeo.name: Minister, you must persuade the empress not to abandon her realm!

52100041_QD__MAGIC_06__4-ChronicleDungeo.name: This land is already lost, we cannot throw our lives away. We must focus on saving what we still can.

52100041_QD__MAGIC_06__6-ChronicleDungeo.name: We're leaving, $npcName:11000525$. Put this place out of your mind.

52100041_QD__MAGIC_06__7-ChronicleDungeo.name: But... but I made a promise to the lady!

52100041_QD__MAGIC_06__8-ChronicleDungeo.name: Enough whining. You're acting like a child.

52100041_QD__MAIN__0-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: A malevolent aura radiates from the center of the hall.

52100043_QD__ENDING__0-ChronicleDungeon6.name: So this is a blackshard... Was it truly refined by a dragon's power?

52100043_QD__ENDING__1-ChronicleDungeon6.name: Destroying this will end the threat of the Rune Giant's awakening, will it not?

52100043_QD__ENDING__2-ChronicleDungeon6.name: Wait... Do you feel that? Such incredibly energy...

52100043_QD__ENDING__6-ChronicleDungeon6.name: Not you... You're our last hope!

52100051_QD__01_ENTER__0-ChronicleDungeo.name: So far, so good. Let's press on.

52100051_QD__01_ENTER__1-ChronicleDungeo.name: The bulk of their forces will be inside. We need to reach Ishura without being discovered...

52100052_QD__01_ENTERTHEHALL__0-Chronicl.name: You made it through the tunnels?

52100052_QD__01_ENTERTHEHALL__5-Chronicl.name: This is bad... We'll have to deal with them!

52100052_QD__01_ENTERTHEHALL__7-Chronicl.name: We've made too much of a commotion here. Let's find a better way past their patrols.

52100052_QD__01_ENTERTHEHALL__8-Chronicl.name: Keep looking for a way further into the castle.

52100052_QD__01_ENTERTHEHALL__9-Chronicl.name: We can't stop here. Find a way up.

52100052_QD__01_ENTERTHEHALL__10-Chronic.name: We must find a way through that avoids as many enemies as possible. Otherwise, we'll be overwhelmed.

52100052_QD__01_ENTERTHEHALL__11-Chronic.name: We can't afford to keep getting into scraps like that!

52100052_QD__01_ENTERTHEHALL__12-Chronic.name: We're too out in the open. Find a way forward.

52100052_QD__04_RANDOMPORTAL__0-Chronicl.name: Scale the wall up to the balcony. I'll make my own way from here. Be careful!

52100052_QD__04_RANDOMPORTAL__1-Chronicl.name: You've discovered the path to another chamber.

52100052_QD__04_RANDOMPORTAL__2-Chronicl.name: There are many secret passageways inside the castle. We should split up. I'll take another path. Move quickly.

52100052_QD__04_RANDOMPORTAL__3-Chronicl.name: You've discovered a path leading up.

52100052_QD__04_RANDOMPORTAL__4-Chronicl.name: You should be able to move from one watchtower to the next by scaling the castle walls. I will find another path. There's no telling what sort of resistance we'll encounter... Good luck.

52100053_QD__04_HALLWAYBATTLE__0-Chronic.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

52100053_QD__04_HALLWAYBATTLE__1-Chronic.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

52100053_QD__04_HALLWAYBATTLE__2-Chronic.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

52100054_QD__01_CLIMBTHEWALL__0-Chronicl.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

52100054_QD__01_CLIMBTHEWALL__1-Chronicl.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

52100054_QD__01_CLIMBTHEWALL__2-Chronicl.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

52100055_QD__01_ABOVEWALL__0-ChronicleDu.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

52100055_QD__01_ABOVEWALL__1-ChronicleDu.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

52100055_QD__01_ABOVEWALL__2-ChronicleDu.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

52100060_QD__MAIN__1-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: You could say I wanted some time alone with you.

52100060_QD__MAIN__2-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: We can't have you spouting your nonsense and causing trouble before our great work is complete.

52100060_QD__MAIN__3-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: I think you've selected a fine place for your grave.

52100060_QD__MAIN__4-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: The only one dying here will be you.

52100060_QD__MAIN__5-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: I'm not your feeble old master. You won't hurt me with that blade.

52100060_QD__MAIN__8-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: Hah. That hideous mask suits you far more than that pretty face.

52100060_QD__MAIN__9-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: Well then, traitor. Time to die.

52100060_QD__MAIN__10-ChronicleDungeon60.name: I'll fight you with all that I have. You won't escape me this time!

52100021_QD__1122330_FINDWAY__0-Chronicl.name: Hurry, we've gotta climb!. $npcName:11003074$ the Snow Queen should be in the Secret Shrine hidden high upon this mountain.

82000000_survival__01_SURVIVAL__0-Surviv.name: It seems like not everyone is here yet. Let's wait a bit longer.

82000000_survival__01_SURVIVAL__1-Surviv.name: Prove your might by eliminating the competition in Mushking Royale!

82000000_survival__01_SURVIVAL__2-Surviv.name: Ugh! How long must I wait? Everymush has their limits!

82000000_survival__01_SURVIVAL__3-Surviv.name: Ohoho! Welcome to Mushking Royale hosted by yours truly, the magnanimous Mushking!

82000000_survival__01_SURVIVAL__4-Surviv.name: I've hidden all kinds of powerful goodies in the chests of Mushtopia. Do try to keep me entertained!

82000000_survival__01_SURVIVAL__5-Surviv.name: My Sleepy Spores will cover more and more of the battlefield as time goes on.

82000000_survival__01_SURVIVAL__6-Surviv.name: I wouldn't breathe those spores in if I were you. At least, not if you want to win. Ohohoho!

82000000_survival__01_SURVIVAL__7-Surviv.name: Hop aboard my hot-mush balloon and soar on a paper airplane to find a good starting spot.

82000000_survival__01_SURVIVAL__8-Surviv.name: The winner will receive my favor, and the losers get nothing! Ohohoho!

82000000_survival__01_SURVIVAL__9-Surviv.name: Let's start the match. The balloon is lifting off!

82000000_survival__01_SURVIVAL__10-Survi.name: The battle is about to start!

82000000_survival__01_SURVIVAL__11-Survi.name: What? Is this everyone? We can't hold a match with turnout this poor!

82000000_survival__01_SURVIVAL__12-Survi.name: Regrettably, I'll have to cancel the match. Head on back, and we'll try this again later.

82000000_survival__01_SURVIVAL__13-Survi.name: You will be returned to your previous location momentarily.

82000000_survival__05_RAREBOX__0-Surviva.name: I've placed a golden mushroom chest near a Mushroom Tower. Go and find it!

82000000_survival__10_RIDINGBATTLE__0-Su.name: Who wants a giant robot? I've put them near the towers. Find them... before your enemies do!

82000002_survival__01_SURVIVAL__14-Survi.name: If you joined as a squad, use emotes near your teammates to remove debuffs on them.

82000002_survival__05_RAREBOX__0-Surviva.name: I've placed a golden mushroom chest near a Mushroom Tower. Go and find it!

82000002_survival__16_ExtraEvent__5-Surv.name: My items! My precious items! If you're gonna be that way, it's time for me to stir the pot!

82000002_survival__16_ExtraEvent__6-Surv.name: You slowpokes! Hurry up and fight!

82000002_survival__16_ExtraEvent__7-Surv.name: There's nowhere left to hide! I've revealed you all <FONT color='#FFD400'>on the minimap!</font>

82000002_survival__16_ExtraEvent__8-Surv.name: Who wants a giant robot? Better find one of the <FONT color='#FFD400'>MK 52 Prototypes</font> before your enemies do!

82000002_survival__16_ExtraEvent__9-Surv.name: Don't hold back! That shiny super item you're sitting on won't help you <FONT color='#FFD400'>if you get tombstoned!</font>

82000002_survival__16_ExtraEvent__10-Sur.name: I'm taking <FONT color='#FFD400'>all the items here...</font> except for yours, of course!

82000002_survival__17_NoticeExtraEvent__.name: Heheh! What're you doing here? Getting up to trouble?

02000451_BF__1122330_FINDWAY__0-Chronicl.name: Hurry, we've gotta climb!. $npcName:11003074$ the Snow Queen should be in the Secret Shrine hidden high upon this mountain.

02000452_BF__01_BOSSBATTLE__1-ChronicleD.name: I'm sorry, but I have to find him. I won't forgive anyone who stands in my way!

02000452_BF__01_BOSSBATTLE__3-ChronicleD.name: I'm sorry, but I have to find him. I won't forgive anyone who stands in my way!

02000452_BF__01_BOSSBATTLE__5-ChronicleD.name: I'm sorry, but I have to find him. I won't forgive anyone who stands in my way!

02000471_BF__EVENT_01__0-ChronicleDungeo.name: An old mansion lies dusty and forgotten, haunted by visions of the past.

02000471_BF__EVENT_02__0-ChronicleDungeo.name: Ah, I see we have unexpected guests.

02000471_BF__EVENT_02__1-ChronicleDungeo.name: Perhaps you are curious about this place as well...

02000471_BF__EVENT_02__2-ChronicleDungeo.name: Do you sense the lingering specters of the past? A powerful grudge must hold them here.

02000471_BF__EVENT_02__3-ChronicleDungeo.name: Welcome to this accursed manor. I hope you find the answers you seek...

02000471_BF__EVENT_02__4-ChronicleDungeo.name: Evil spirits issue forth from the magic circle in the center of the hall.\nDefeat them to purify the mansion.

02000471_BF__EVENT_02__5-ChronicleDungeo.name: I will make this place sparkle!

02000471_BF__EVENT_02__6-ChronicleDungeo.name: I'm so happy to work here!

02000471_BF__EVENT_02__7-ChronicleDungeo.name: Mistress hates bugs. I've got to keep things clean.

02000471_BF__MAGIC_01__1-ChronicleDungeo.name: Cough... I think I'm coming down with something...

02000471_BF__MAGIC_02__1-ChronicleDungeo.name: Our lady is very sick. He must be too worried to eat...

02000471_BF__MAGIC_03__1-ChronicleDungeo.name: ...The fever is not going down... This is bad.

02000471_BF__MAGIC_04__1-ChronicleDungeo.name: What's a good book to read to my daughter?

02000471_BF__MAGIC_05__3-ChronicleDungeo.name: We must cure her, no matter the cost!

02000471_BF__MAGIC_06__0-ChronicleDungeo.name: Can... can we cure this illness...?!

02000471_BF__MAGIC_06__1-ChronicleDungeo.name: Right now, $npcName:11001812$ is working on his research as best he can.

02000471_BF__MAGIC_06__2-ChronicleDungeo.name: Minister, you must persuade the empress not to abandon her realm!

02000471_BF__MAGIC_06__4-ChronicleDungeo.name: This land is already lost, we cannot throw our lives away. We must focus on saving what we still can.

02000471_BF__MAGIC_06__6-ChronicleDungeo.name: We're leaving, $npcName:11000525$. Put this place out of your mind.

02000471_BF__MAGIC_06__7-ChronicleDungeo.name: But... but I made a promise to the lady!

02000471_BF__MAGIC_06__8-ChronicleDungeo.name: Enough whining. You're acting like a child.

02000471_BF__MAIN__0-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: A malevolent aura radiates from the center of the hall.

02000471_BF__TIMER__0-ChronicleDungeon60.name: Evil spirits issue forth from the magic circle in the center of the hall. Purify them before time runs out.

02000471_BF__WARPCHECK__0-ChronicleDunge.name: You are afflicted by a malevolent curse. If you don't break it soon, the consequences could be dire.

02000471_BF__WARPCHECK__2-ChronicleDunge.name: You are afflicted by a malevolent curse. If you don't break it soon, the consequences could be dire.

52100070_QD__52100070__0-LapentaFrontier.name: Meanwhile... At the center of the blast...

52100043_QD__ENDING__7-ChronicleDungeon6.name: You were knocked unconscious by the explosion of the dark crystal.

52100043_QD__ENDING__8-ChronicleDungeon6.name: The last thing you can recall is $npcName:11001568$ diving to save you.

52100043_QD__ENDING__9-ChronicleDungeon6.name: After the enormous blast, you were pulled from the wreckage.

52100043_QD__ENDING__10-ChronicleDungeon.name: When you awakened at the Frontier Foundation headquarters, everyone was happy to see you. But you could tell by the look on their faces... your Runeblade allies were gone.

52100043_QD__ENDING__12-ChronicleDungeon.name: There were accounts by expedition members of shadows moving near the site of the explosion.

52000099_QD__MAIN__20-DarkCastle-.name: There's more of them than I anticipated...

52000099_QD__MAIN__24-DarkCastle-.name: I'll show you the true strength of a Master Wizard!

52000099_QD__MAIN__27-DarkCastle-.name: I think our luck's run out...

52000099_QD__MAIN__28-DarkCastle-.name: Well... At least I get to go down fighting with someone like you by my side...

52000099_QD__MAIN__29-DarkCastle-.name: You've done well. We'll take it from here.

52000099_QD__MAIN__30-DarkCastle-.name: It's time to save the world! And I suppose you two, if I absolutely must.

52000099_QD__MAIN__32-DarkCastle-.name: Charge! Give it everything you've got!

02000461_BF__MADRICANSIEGE__0-ChronicleD.name: The turret seems to be affecting $npc:21420401$.

02000431_BF__BARRICADE__0-ChronicleDunge.name: The entrance will close in 30 seconds.

02000431_BF__MAIN__0-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: Where be she, my bonnie lass?

02000431_BF__MAIN__1-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: There! The most beautiful fish in the sea!

02000431_BF__MAIN__2-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: No more will ye spurn my love! You're comin' with me, one way or t'other!

02000431_BF__MAIN__3-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: Ugh. How many times do I have to tell you? I don't date pirates.

02000431_BF__MAIN__6-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: ♬ O magicked waves, reveal my cave! ♬

02000431_BF__MAIN__7-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: That oaf will never find me here...

02000431_BF__MAIN__8-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: Aaak! Where be my scaly maiden fair?

02000431_BF__MAIN__9-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: Find her, or I'll boil the lot of ye!

02000432_BF__MAIN__0-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: What...?! Ugh...You're tough for a pirate...!

02000432_BF__MAIN__2-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: $npcName:11000444$ the explorer said you could help us.

02000432_BF__MAIN__3-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: Here, proof that he sent us.

02000432_BF__MAIN__4-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: Oh... I guess you're not a pirate.

02000432_BF__MAIN__5-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: I'm really sorry about the misunderstanding.

02000432_BF__MAIN__6-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: Sorry, we've had a lot of pirate trouble lately...

02000432_BF__MAIN__7-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: So why have you come here?

02000432_BF__MAIN__8-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: $npcName:11003086$, Guardian of the Seas, says the same.

02000432_BF__MAIN__9-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: It'd be best if you spoke with him in merson.

02000432_BF__MAIN__10-ChronicleDungeon60.name: Perhaps we can convince him to grant you an audience!

02000432_BF__MAIN__11-ChronicleDungeon60.name: $npcName:11000444$...? $npcName:11003084$, I thought I told you not to see that human again!

02000432_BF__MAIN__12-ChronicleDungeon60.name: $npcName:11000444$ claims this world is on the brink of disaster.

02000432_BF__SUMMON__1-ChronicleDungeon6.name: $npcName:11003084$! Landwalker, I will not forgive you!

02000441_BF__BARRICADE__0-ChronicleDunge.name: The entrance will close in 30 seconds.

02000441_BF__MAIN__2-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: How dare they block our path!

02000441_BF__MAIN__16-ChronicleDungeon60.name: You've got to commandeer the ship!

02000441_BF__MAIN__18-ChronicleDungeon60.name: You've got to raise the anchors if this ship is going anywhere.

02000441_BF__MAIN__19-ChronicleDungeon60.name: Calm down, $npcName:11003085$. We need to find $npcName:11003086$.

02000442_BF__MAIN__5-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: Defeat the pirates still aboard the ship!

02000442_BF__MAIN__9-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: I'll not stand this any longer!

02000442_BF__MAIN__10-ChronicleDungeon60.name: Take your pollution and leave, landwalkers!

02000442_BF__MAIN__14-ChronicleDungeon60.name: It's too early to give up. Let's dive down and find $npcName:11003086$.

02000442_BF__MAIN__15-ChronicleDungeon60.name: These baby whales will give you a lift! Mount up!

02000443_BF__AI__2-ChronicleDungeon60_01.name: Landwalkers... All they bring is destruction...

02000443_BF__AI__4-ChronicleDungeon60_01.name: I don't understand. Please explain it to us!

02000443_BF__AI__5-ChronicleDungeon60_01.name: I will not speak with such foolish creatures...

02000443_BF__MAIN__0-ChronicleDungeon60_.name: Watch your tail, landwalker. $npcName:11003086$ is furious!

02000481_BF__01_ENTER__0-ChronicleDungeo.name: So far, so good. Let's press on.

02000481_BF__01_ENTER__1-ChronicleDungeo.name: The bulk of their forces will be inside. Let us try to reach $npcName:11001698$ without being discovered.

02000481_BF__BARRICADE__0-ChronicleDunge.name: The entrance will close in 30 seconds.

02000482_BF__01_ENTERTHEHALL__0-Chronicl.name: You made it through the tunnels?

02000482_BF__01_ENTERTHEHALL__1-Chronicl.name: If we don't keep a low profile, we're done for.

02000482_BF__01_ENTERTHEHALL__5-Chronicl.name: This is bad... We'll have to deal with them!

02000482_BF__01_ENTERTHEHALL__7-Chronicl.name: We've made too much of a commotion here. Let's find a better way past their patrols.

02000482_BF__01_ENTERTHEHALL__8-Chronicl.name: Keep looking for a way further into the castle.

02000482_BF__01_ENTERTHEHALL__9-Chronicl.name: We can't stop here. Find a way up.

02000482_BF__01_ENTERTHEHALL__10-Chronic.name: We must find a way through that avoids as many enemies as possible. Otherwise, we'll be overwhelmed.

02000482_BF__01_ENTERTHEHALL__11-Chronic.name: We can't afford to keep getting into scraps like that!

02000482_BF__01_ENTERTHEHALL__12-Chronic.name: We're too out in the open. Find a way forward.

02000482_BF__04_RANDOMPORTAL__0-Chronicl.name: You found a way to the balcony

02000482_BF__04_RANDOMPORTAL__1-Chronicl.name: Scale the wall up to the balcony. I'll make my own way from here. Be careful!

02000482_BF__04_RANDOMPORTAL__2-Chronicl.name: You opened the way to another room

02000482_BF__04_RANDOMPORTAL__3-Chronicl.name: This castle is full of secret passages. Let's use them to our advantage. I'll scout for enemies. You hurry on ahead.

02000482_BF__04_RANDOMPORTAL__4-Chronicl.name: You discovered a path to the top

02000482_BF__04_RANDOMPORTAL__5-Chronicl.name: You can scale the walls from watchtower to watchtower, but there's no telling how many enemies are stationed at each. Good luck.

02000483_BF__04_HALLWAYBATTLE__0-Chronic.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

02000483_BF__04_HALLWAYBATTLE__1-Chronic.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

02000483_BF__04_HALLWAYBATTLE__2-Chronic.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

02000484_BF__01_CLIMBTHEWALL__0-Chronicl.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

02000484_BF__01_CLIMBTHEWALL__1-Chronicl.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

02000484_BF__01_CLIMBTHEWALL__2-Chronicl.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

02000485_BF__01_ABOVEWALL__0-ChronicleDu.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

02000485_BF__01_ABOVEWALL__1-ChronicleDu.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

02000485_BF__01_ABOVEWALL__2-ChronicleDu.name: Did you think you'd gotten away?!

02000486_BF__103_TIMER__0-ChronicleDunge.name: Defeat the enemies before time's up or they'll become enraged.

02000486_BF__107_TEXT__0-ChronicleDungeo.name: Defeat the enemies in quick succession or they will become outraged and empowered.

02000471_BF__EVENT_02__9-ChronicleDungeo.name: Similar circles throughout the manor must also be purified.

52000153_QD__52000153__0-LapentaFrontier.name: Not long after, on the final day of training

52000159_QD__52000159__3-LapentaFrontier.name: It's on fire... I need to get out. of here!

52000163_QD__52000163__0-LapentaFrontier.name: Soon after destroying all the ice floes

52000165_QD__52000165__0-LapentaFrontier.name: Several days later, on the day of the final test

52000176_QD__52000176__1-LapentaFrontier.name: Deep in the Forests of Henesys

52000177_QD__52000177__0-LapentaFrontier.name: Shortly after, at the end of Haster's lesson

52000182_QD__52000182__2-LapentaFrontier.name: The soldiers... There's so many of them...!

52000187_QD__TUTORIAL__0-SurvivalTutoria.name: Ohoho! Welcome to Royale Park! I have a special gift for you. Open it!

52000187_QD__TUTORIAL__1-SurvivalTutoria.name: Huh? Why is it empty? Servant? Servant!

52000187_QD__TUTORIAL__2-SurvivalTutoria.name: Argh... Where's my retinue when I need them?

52000187_QD__TUTORIAL__3-SurvivalTutoria.name: As reparations for their mistake, allow me to offer you a special training before you enter Royale Park.

52000187_QD__TUTORIAL__6-SurvivalTutoria.name: Ahem. Ready? I'll show you my tremendous might! Fight well!

02020100_BF__MAIN__0-LapentaDungeon-.name: Pick up the seed and find somewhere to plant it.

02020100_BF__MAIN__1-LapentaDungeon-.name: $npc:21430002$ attacks will make the seed explode. Don't let the seed-bearer get hit!

02020112_BF__ROOM1__1-LapentaDungeon-.name: Destroy the lapentas to save your allies.

02020112_BF__ROOM2__1-LapentaDungeon-.name: Destroy the lapentas to save your allies.

02020112_BF__ROOM3__1-LapentaDungeon-.name: Destroy the lapentas to save your allies.

02020112_BF__SAFEZONE1__0-LapentaDungeon.name: Platforms have been activated up ahead.

02020112_BF__SAFEZONE2__0-LapentaDungeon.name: Platforms have been activated up ahead.

52010069_QD__52010069__2-EyeOfLapentaQue.name: I've never seen anything like it.

52010070_QD__52010070__1-EyeOfLapentaQue.name: Do you finally see the truth?

52010071_QD__52010071__1-EyeOfLapentaQue.name: A fool has gotten in the way of my plans.

52010071_QD__52010071__2-EyeOfLapentaQue.name: With Madrakan destroyed, mass-producing blackshards is out of the question.

52010071_QD__52010071__3-EyeOfLapentaQue.name: The perfect opportunity to steer the world in such a way as to minimize unnecessary damage, gone...

52010071_QD__52010071__4-EyeOfLapentaQue.name: Surely you can see... There's one slippery pest muddying the waters.

52010071_QD__52010071__6-EyeOfLapentaQue.name: Some of the blackshards remain intact.

52010071_QD__52010071__7-EyeOfLapentaQue.name: Why not use them to summon that ancient city of madness to this world?

52010071_QD__52010071__9-EyeOfLapentaQue.name: Don't forget, little time remains before the destruction by light is upon us.

52010071_QD__52010071__10-EyeOfLapentaQu.name: Any variables we cannot control must be eliminated.

52010071_QD__52010071__12-EyeOfLapentaQu.name: Any rats who would interfere with my grand designs, you will deal with.

52010071_QD__52010071__13-EyeOfLapentaQu.name: Let them play into the palms of our hands...

52010071_QD__52010071__15-EyeOfLapentaQu.name: As long as $MyPCName$ is alive, $male:he,female:she$ will surely interfere with our plans.

02020101_BF__DEATHFLOWERNOTICE__0-Lapent.name: You need to free an ally from the grasp of the Death Flower!

02020101_BF__GIMMICK2__0-LapentaDungeon-.name: Defeat the $npcPlural:21430002$, then plant the seed that appears to lift the curse.

02020101_BF__MAIN__0-LapentaDungeon-.name: You've reached the end… of your life…

02020101_BF__MAIN__1-LapentaDungeon-.name: Give yourself to me. Then I shall take your life!

02020111_BF__MAIN__0-LapentaDungeon-.name: Finally here? This place will be your grave!

02020111_BF__MAIN__1-LapentaDungeon-.name: You little... I'll see you next time!

02020111_BF__MOVEMENT_01__0-LapentaDunge.name: The darkness shields Landevian. Survive until the light returns.

02020111_BF__MOVEMENT_01__1-LapentaDunge.name: Not bad. But how long can you keep this up?

02020111_BF__MOVEMENT_01__3-LapentaDunge.name: Got what it takes to survive?!

02020111_BF__MOVEMENT_01__4-LapentaDunge.name: Got what it takes to survive?!

02020111_BF__SUMMON_01__0-LapentaDungeon.name: Destroy the Blue Lapenta to stop the explosion.

02020111_BF__SUMMON_01_2__0-LapentaDunge.name: Destroy the Blue Lapenta to stop the explosion.

02020120_BF__BOSSSPAWN__1-LapentaDungeon.name: I've trapped you in my time loop.

02020120_BF__BOSSSPAWN__2-LapentaDungeon.name: Not bad. I look forward to our next battle.

02020130_BF__BARRICADE__0-LapentaDungeon.name: The entrance will close in 30 seconds. Make sure you're equipped with the right gear to shield yourself from the enemies' curses!

02020111_BF__MESSAGE__0-LapentaDungeon-.name: Landevian is drawing power from the Blue Lapentas! Destroy them before he wipes you out!

63000069_CS__63000069_MAIN__0-Season1-.name: I was right. Papa's friend did come here!

63000069_CS__63000069_MAIN__1-Season1-.name: Papa's friend was gonna tell something to me and Mr. Hotelier. But... he went away.

63000069_CS__63000069_MAIN__2-Season1-.name: I have no one. Not papa, not papa's friend...

63000069_CS__63000069_MAIN__5-Season1-.name: I saw someone come out of his room. She had a really important-looking paper. I saw her go into Room 666...

63000069_CS__63000069_MAIN__6-Season1-.name: Tell Mr. Hotelier what I told you...

63000070_CS__63000070_MAIN__0-Season1-.name: This world is filled with fools. Fools who break their back and get nothing to show for it.

63000070_CS__63000070_MAIN__1-Season1-.name: Fools like that child. Fools who think they'll find the will and live.

63000070_CS__63000070_MAIN__2-Season1-.name: Do you really think you can stop this?

63000070_CS__63000070_MAIN__3-Season1-.name: Fool! There's nothing you can do!

63000070_CS__63000070_MAIN__4-Season1-.name: Still, you've made it pretty far. Why don't we make a deal?

63000070_CS__63000070_MAIN__5-Season1-.name: This is what you're looking for. Come take it... if you can.

63000070_CS__63000070_MAIN__6-Season1-.name: It's right in front of your eyes, but you'll never lay a finger on it.

63000070_CS__63000070_MAIN__8-Season1-.name: Because you aren't leaving this room alive!

63000070_CS__63000070_MAIN__9-Season1-.name: You came! Thank you so much.

63000070_CS__63000070_MAIN__13-Season1-.name: Papa was going to leave me with Mr. Hotelier until I was old enough to take over the hotel.

63000070_CS__63000070_MAIN__14-Season1-.name: Please, there's one more thing I need you to do. Meet me in the lobby.

63000071_CS__63000071_MAIN__1-Season1-.name: My girl... Where is my girl?

63000071_CS__63000071_MAIN__3-Season1-.name: This is wrong! I won't allow it!

63000071_CS__63000071_MAIN__12-Season1-.name: I'm so sorry I left you all alone, my dear.

63000071_CS__63000071_MAIN__13-Season1-.name: If only my heart weren't so weak...

63000071_CS__63000071_MAIN__14-Season1-.name: It's okay, Papa. It's all over now.

63000071_CS__63000071_MAIN__15-Season1-.name: Thanks so much! That bad lady was stopped, thanks to you. And Mr. Hotelier can have the hotel now.

63000071_CS__63000071_MAIN__16-Season1-.name: Papa. We don't belong here anymore.

63000071_CS__63000071_MAIN__17-Season1-.name: It's time for us to move on.

63000066_CS__63000066_MAIN__2-Season1-.name: This place is dark... and so cold...

63000067_CS__63000067_MAIN__0-Season1-.name: Wh-why are you still here? Run away! I'm a ghost!

63000067_CS__63000067_MAIN__1-Season1-.name: That teddy bear... Papa brought it home for me after a trip to $map:02000001$...

63000067_CS__63000067_MAIN__2-Season1-.name: Mr. Hotelier always treated me nice, but this teddy kept me company when papa...

63000067_CS__63000067_MAIN__4-Season1-.name: They locked me up... And... and...

63000068_CS__63000068_MAIN__0-Season1-.name: I know who that man was.

63000068_CS__63000068_MAIN__1-Season1-.name: He used to visit papa. They were friends.

63000068_CS__63000068_MAIN__2-Season1-.name: They used all these fancy words, like "will" and "inheritance"...

63000068_CS__63000068_MAIN__3-Season1-.name: The key to his room is in there.

63000068_CS__63000068_MAIN__4-Season1-.name: But there are so many monsters. I don't want anything bad to happen to you!

63000068_CS__63000068_MAIN__6-Season1-.name: You found it! I'll give it to $npcName:11004291$...

63000068_CS__63000068_MAIN__7-Season1-.name: You know, something... something scary happened in that suite...

63000068_CS__63000068_MAIN__8-Season1-.name: I wonder if he was locked up like me...

63000073_CS__63000073_MAIN__0-Season1-.name: Bobo put you with books... Bobo make you happy...

63000073_CS__63000073_MAIN__1-Season1-.name: Ooh... I feel like someone closed a dictionary on my head...

63000073_CS__63000073_MAIN__3-Season1-.name: Your sister $npcName:11004354$ is back in the village. Your parents are missing and she needs your help.

63000073_CS__63000073_MAIN__4-Season1-.name: Wait, it wasn't just me that got grabbed?

63000073_CS__63000073_MAIN__5-Season1-.name: I've got to get back to $npcName:11004354$... I'll see you in the village.

63000074_CS__63000074_MAIN__0-Season1-.name:
<FONT color='#ffd200'>$npcName:11004345$'s Diary</FONT>

$npcName:11004346$ was furious today just because I dog-eared a page in his book.
How else was I supposed to remember my place? 
That anti-social bookworm acted like I was some kind of monster! He's so mean! I wish he would just go live with his books and leave me alone.

63000074_CS__63000074_MAIN__1-Season1-.name: It's so much easier to be happy when you're younger... Isn't it, Bo—

63000074_CS__63000074_MAIN__2-Season1-.name: ...Sigh. What am I even doing? Talking to a fairfolk I probably dreamed up...

63000074_CS__63000074_MAIN__3-Season1-.name: But... I'm so lonely. I just don't want to be lonely for the holidays anymore.

63000074_CS__63000074_MAIN__6-Season1-.name: $npcName:11004345$'s wish... Make true. Make $npcName:11004345$ happy! Then... be reindeer!

63000076_CS__63000076_CHAT_702__2-Season.name: I bet he did! $npcName:11004372$ is so kind.

63000076_CS__63000076_CHAT_704__1-Season.name: Thanks, I've been hitting the sauna.

63000076_CS__63000076_CHAT_705__0-Season.name: It makes a sound if you press this.

63000076_CS__63000076_MAIN__15-Season1-.name: $npcName:11004372$ is so nice! That was so good!

63000076_CS__63000076_MAIN__17-Season1-.name: The fairfolk ate the cakes in the blink of an eye.\nThen they all vanished, leaving just a single woman behind...

63000076_CS__63000076_MAIN__19-Season1-.name: But... You got wish! You got in cake.

63000076_CS__63000076_MAIN__21-Season1-.name: ...Ugh, that furry brute. What is all this?

63000076_CS__63000076_MAIN__24-Season1-.name: I've been looking for you. $npcName:11004354$ and $npcName:11004359$ wanted me to find you.

63000076_CS__63000076_MAIN__25-Season1-.name: Ah, my children! Are they safe?

63000076_CS__63000076_MAIN__26-Season1-.name: They're fine. They're waiting for you in the living room.

63000076_CS__63000076_MAIN__27-Season1-.name: Thank goodness. I'll meet you there, then.

63000077_CS__63000077_MAIN__0-Season1-.name: Sorry... Need to make wishes true. Bobo let you down when Bobo is reindeer.

63000077_CS__63000077_MAIN__2-Season1-.name: Hey, what's the big idea? Let him go!

63000077_CS__63000077_MAIN__3-Season1-.name: Huh? What wrong? Bobo make wish come true. $npcName:11004356$ wish.

63000077_CS__63000077_MAIN__4-Season1-.name: That's not $npcName:11004356$'s wish! $npcName:11004356$ wants to be with her father, $npcName:11004368$! So put him down now!

63000077_CS__63000077_MAIN__9-Season1-.name: $npcName:11004373$ do good deeds so Santa like $npcName:11004373$.

63000077_CS__63000077_MAIN__10-Season1-.name: Bobo be so happy when reindeer. Bobo play with $npcName:11004356$, too.

63000077_CS__63000077_MAIN__13-Season1-.name: Ah, you've saved me. Much appreciated!

63000077_CS__63000077_MAIN__15-Season1-.name: <FONT color='#ffd200'>Diary Page 52</FONT>\nI hate dad. How could he get on me because of some stupid flowers? If flowers are more precious than me, then you should just stay in your dumb garden forever! Mr. $npcName:11004368$!

63000077_CS__63000077_MAIN__16-Season1-.name: It's true that I hurt $npcName:11004356$'s feelings... And this is $npcName:11004373$'s attempt to help $npcName:11004356$...

63000077_CS__63000077_MAIN__17-Season1-.name: I figured I could spend some time up my beloved tree for that.

63000077_CS__63000077_MAIN__19-Season1-.name: I was just complaining. That wasn't my wish!

63000077_CS__63000077_MAIN__22-Season1-.name: Bobo... It really was you who heard me that night.

63000077_CS__63000077_MAIN__23-Season1-.name: Sorry... So sorry! Bobo want make happy. Make wishes!

63000077_CS__63000077_MAIN__25-Season1-.name: It's okay, fuzzy. Your heart was in the right place, I guess. But $npcName:11004356$'s wish is something else.

63000077_CS__63000077_MAIN__26-Season1-.name: Yes. When she tells you her real wish, make that one come true.

63000077_CS__63000077_MAIN__28-Season1-.name: I'm sorry, everyone. It's my fault this all happened.

63000077_CS__63000077_MAIN__30-Season1-.name: Now I can finally have the happy holiday party I wanted. With my family!

02020006_BF__1000051_NPCTALK__0-Kritias_.name: Hmph! Young people these days have no respect!

02020006_BF__1000052_NPCTALK__0-Kritias_.name: What're ya lookin' at, uggo? If you spoke Poing, I'd tell you to crawl away, human!

02020061_BF__BATTLE_1__2-Fieldwar01-.name: My sensors are going haywire! Beginning analysis.

02020061_BF__BATTLE_2__0-Fieldwar01-.name: Not bad. Let me show you the power of darkness!

02020061_BF__BATTLE_2__1-Fieldwar01-.name: Analysis complete! The power is coming from the summoned aetherine.

02020061_BF__BATTLE_2__2-Fieldwar01-.name: Everyone, find the aetherine that's emitting dark power!

02020061_BF__BATTLE_3__1-Fieldwar01-.name: Destroy the aetherine and remove the commander's barrier.

02020051_BF__101_MAIN__0-Gigantica01-.name: There's a strange machine showing up on radar. Is this... Gigantica?!

02020051_BF__102_TIMMER__0-Gigantica01-.name: Gigantica got away? Ah well. Can't win 'em all!

02020051_BF__104_END_1__0-Gigantica01-.name: The longer we wait, the stronger Gigantica gets. Find a way to stop it!

02020051_BF__107_TEXT__0-Gigantica01-.name: Gigantica's poison is no joke! If it gets you, beat up nearby enemies to get an antidote.

52020040_QD__52020040__1-Kritias_Epic01-.name: We're on course, and all systems are operational!

52020040_QD__52020040__2-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Good. Stay alert, there's no telling what awaits us.

52020040_QD__52020040__4-Kritias_Epic01-.name: A brand new continent! Think they'll have exotic torture devices?

52020040_QD__52020040__5-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I'm more interested in as yet undiscovered schools of magic.

52020040_QD__52020040__6-Kritias_Epic01-.name: You two need to get your priorities straight. We have foreign cuisines to sample—

52020040_QD__52020040__9-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Captain! We have an unidentified radar contact!

52020040_QD__52020040__11-Kritias_Epic01.name: Two kilometers off the starboard bow, approaching at high speed!

52020040_QD__52020040__13-Kritias_Epic01.name: It's moving too fast, there's no time for evasive maneuvers!

52020040_QD__52020040__14-Kritias_Epic01.name: All hands, secure your stations and brace for impact!

52020040_QD__52020040__22-Kritias_Epic01.name: The unidentified object has vanished from radar.

52020040_QD__52020040__25-Kritias_Epic01.name: Based on these energy readings, it seems it detonated before impact.

52020040_QD__52020040__27-Kritias_Epic01.name: So are we going to talk about Condor screaming like a little girl...?

52020040_QD__52020040__28-Kritias_Epic01.name: What?! We're in the middle of a crisis here!

52020040_QD__52020040__29-Kritias_Epic01.name: He's right. Our priority is identifying the source of the attack.

52020040_QD__52020040__31-Kritias_Epic01.name: Our first priority is finding a safe place for Sky Fortress to land.

52020040_QD__52020040__32-Kritias_Epic01.name: Our mystery assailants may be long gone by then.

52020040_QD__52020040__36-Kritias_Epic01.name: I'll go down and find out who attacked us.

52020040_QD__52020040__37-Kritias_Epic01.name: I don't think venturing off to some uncharted continent alone is such a good idea, Kitten.

52020040_QD__52020040__38-Kritias_Epic01.name: I agree. It's just too dangerous, $MyPCName$.

52020040_QD__52020040__39-Kritias_Epic01.name: But if we don't act now, we may never get answers.

52020040_QD__52020040__42-Kritias_Epic01.name: You may go under one condition.

02020200_BF__11_BALLOONTALK__0-Kritias_P.name: Protect the altar. Don't let the aetherine condenser get destroyed!

02020200_BF__11_BALLOONTALK__2-Kritias_P.name: This won't survive a hit from that guy's hammer.

02020200_BF__11_BALLOONTALK__3-Kritias_P.name: Fools... Didn't I tell you to be careful?

02020201_BF__MAIN__1-Kritias_Paika01-.name: Why do you stand in my way?!

52100101_QD__52100101__1-Kritias_Epic01-.name: If they set up the missile batteries they used to attack Sky Fortress, they had to have known we were coming.

52100101_QD__52100101__2-Kritias_Epic01-.name: But who took them all out?

52100101_QD__52100101__4-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I guess you were really hungry...

52100101_QD__52100101__7-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Are you with those cloaked monsters?

52100101_QD__52100101__9-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I came here to find them. They attacked my ship.

52100101_QD__52100101__10-Kritias_Epic01.name: Amazing. You did this all on your own?

52100101_QD__52100101__12-Kritias_Epic01.name: Can you tell me what the forces of darkness are doing here?

52100101_QD__52100101__13-Kritias_Epic01.name: You mean the Daemon Army? Their ship landed in the forest outskirts. Our patrols are en route to engage them.

52100101_QD__52100101__14-Kritias_Epic01.name: Protocol says to bring you both in for questioning... But I suspect you'd put up quite the fight.

52100101_QD__52100101__15-Kritias_Epic01.name: I'm afraid I've got my own mission to complete. However, this woman is in need of medical attention.

52100101_QD__52100101__16-Kritias_Epic01.name: She must be an exile. We'll take her back to base.

52100101_QD__52100101__17-Kritias_Epic01.name: Tread lightly, outlander. The $map:02020029$ is not a welcoming place to strangers.

52100105_QD__52100105_01__0-Kritias_Epic.name: What happened to the Blue Lapenta fragment after the sealing?

52100105_QD__52100105_01__1-Kritias_Epic.name: Did it get absorbed into your body?

52100105_QD__52100105_01__2-Kritias_Epic.name: If so, it seems you've yet to unlock its power.

52100105_QD__52100105_01__3-Kritias_Epic.name: I don't know what you're talking about... I can't remember anything...

52100105_QD__52100105_01__4-Kritias_Epic.name: I can't even remember who I am...

52100105_QD__52100105_01__5-Kritias_Epic.name: You lost your memory sealing Kritias? Preposterous.

52100105_QD__52100105_01__6-Kritias_Epic.name: No matter. The power of the Blue Lapenta will be ours, as soon as we extract it from your body!

52100105_QD__52100105_03__0-Kritias_Epic.name: What?! How did you— I see. You used us to awaken the lapenta power inside you...

52100105_QD__52100105_03__1-Kritias_Epic.name: So when did your memory return? Or perhaps you never lost it...

52100105_QD__52100105_03__2-Kritias_Epic.name: I remembered everything the moment I glimpsed the face underneath that facade you wear.

52100105_QD__52100105_03__3-Kritias_Epic.name: When I realized what you were, I knew you'd stop at nothing to take the lapenta from me.

52100105_QD__52100105_03__4-Kritias_Epic.name: Hahahah. You're right about that. Seize her!

52100105_QD__52100105_03__5-Kritias_Epic.name: Ugh... The Blue Lapenta did this?

52100105_QD__52100105_03__6-Kritias_Epic.name: Grr... Don't think that this is over!

52100102_QD__MAIN__3-Kritias_Epic01-.name: So, not talking? You think you're so tough?

52100102_QD__MAIN__4-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I'll ask you one last time. Where is the woman?

52100102_QD__MAIN__5-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Woman? What woman? The heck are you talking about?

52100102_QD__MAIN__9-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Are you still bickering with these insects?

52100102_QD__MAIN__12-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Ugh... What now? I'll tell what I told your slightly less ugly friends. We don't know who you're looking for!

52100102_QD__MAIN__13-Kritias_Epic01-.name: You don't know anything? Are you sure?

52100102_QD__MAIN__16-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I will not ask again. Where have you hidden her?

52100102_QD__MAIN__17-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Who?! Who is this woman you're so obsessed with?!

52100102_QD__MAIN__18-Kritias_Epic01-.name: You really don't know, do you? Then you are useless to me. Join your fellow insects in the dirt.

52100102_QD__MAIN__20-Kritias_Epic01-.name: We are running out of time...

52100103_QD__MAIN__0-Kritias_Epic01-.name: I sense an dark aura approaching...

52100103_QD__MAIN__1-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Don't worry. This place is well defended.

52100103_QD__MAIN__4-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Fools... Have you finally figured it out?

52100103_QD__MAIN__5-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Who are you? How dare you trespass here!

52100103_QD__MAIN__6-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Hmm? So you're here as well...

52100103_QD__MAIN__7-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Turka! I'm going to put an end to your madness.

52100103_QD__MAIN__8-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Hand over the girl and we'll be on our way.

52100103_QD__MAIN__9-Kritias_Epic01-.name: If you want her, you'll have to go through us!

52100103_QD__MAIN__10-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Curious that one in charge of so much could be so oblivious. If I've made it here so easily, think what that means for your little town.

52100103_QD__MAIN__12-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Think how much your people have suffered. Is protecting her really worth all this?

52100103_QD__MAIN__14-Kritias_Epic01-.name: No one else will suffer on my behalf.

52100103_QD__MAIN__18-Kritias_Epic01-.name: Heheheh... You've made a wise decision. Now, move!

02020201_BF__MAIN__2-Kritias_Paika01-.name: Such great power was right before our eyes... Turka...

52100108_QD__MAIN__0-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This must be the control room.

52100108_QD__MAIN__1-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Now, where are those primary controls?

02020063_BF__BATTLE_1__0-Fieldwar02-.name: We've located the missing spectrometer. Recover it!

02020063_BF__BATTLE_1__2-Fieldwar02-.name: Keep your eyes open! We've detected a large number of enemies.

02020063_BF__BATTLE_2__0-Fieldwar02-.name: I've had enough! Let me show you the Daemon Army's newest weapon!

02020063_BF__BATTLE_2__1-Fieldwar02-.name: There's a powerful barrier around that missile turret.

02020063_BF__BATTLE_2__2-Fieldwar02-.name: Get those supplies to our agents!
