02020063_BF__BATTLE_3__0-Fieldwar02-.name: Defeat the commander of the Daemon Army.

02020063_BF__BATTLE_3__1-Fieldwar02-.name: Use the supply box to destroy the enemy's barrier.

02020063_BF__BATTLE_3__2-Fieldwar02-.name: We've encountered this magic pattern before.

02020063_BF__BATTLE_3__3-Fieldwar02-.name: Some people never learn. Get that supply box!

51000004_DG__51000004_MAIN__0-Event-.name: I'm Pink Bean and I love games. Let's play a game now!

51000004_DG__51000004_MAIN__1-Event-.name: Choose a different direction from me, and you win. But if you choose the same direction, you lose!

51000004_DG__51000004_MAIN__2-Event-.name: Lose five times and it's game over. How long can you last?

51000004_DG__51000004_MAIN__3-Event-.name: Get a high score and I'll give you a prize. Are you ready?

51000004_DG__51000004_MAIN__6-Event-.name: I can't believe I lost to this squirt!

83000002_COLOSSEUM__ROUND1__3-Colosseum0.name: I can't believe I lost to a rookie like you...

83000002_COLOSSEUM__ROUND1__5-Colosseum0.name: Oh no, you ran away! This match is over.

83000002_COLOSSEUM__ROUND2__0-Colosseum0.name: The next challenger really knows how to cook in the kitchen... and in the ring. It's Startz!

83000002_COLOSSEUM__ROUND2__3-Colosseum0.name: The special for today is roast $MyPCName$!

83000002_COLOSSEUM__ROUND2__4-Colosseum0.name: I should have stayed at the restaurant...

83000002_COLOSSEUM__ROUND4__3-Colosseum0.name: I shall not hold back. Behold, the spirit of a true knight!

83000002_COLOSSEUM__ROUND6__1-Colosseum0.name: So sorry, but you don't meet the requirements for the next match. Try again later!

83000002_COLOSSEUM__ROUND6__3-Colosseum0.name: This hammer isn't for show, you know!

83000002_COLOSSEUM__ROUND6__4-Colosseum0.name: No use crying over busted enchantments.

83000002_COLOSSEUM__ROUND6__6-Colosseum0.name: Oh no, you ran away! This match is over.

83000002_COLOSSEUM__ROUND6__7-Colosseum0.name: You put up a good fight. Try again when you have better gear!

83000002_COLOSSEUM__ROUND6__10-Colosseum.name: Good fight! But even bigger challenges are up ahead!

83000002_COLOSSEUM__ROUND8__0-Colosseum0.name: Oh oh, I'm getting goosebumps! It's the Innocent of Darkness himself, Pathos!

83000002_COLOSSEUM__ROUND8__1-Colosseum0.name: So sorry, but you don't meet the requirements for the next match. Try again later!

83000002_COLOSSEUM__ROUND8__3-Colosseum0.name: Bored, are you? Don't worry your little head. Your benevolent queen has prepared a fun diversion for you!

83000002_COLOSSEUM__ROUND8__4-Colosseum0.name: Bored, are you? Don't worry your little head. Your benevolent queen has prepared a fun diversion for you!

83000002_COLOSSEUM__ROUND8__8-Colosseum0.name: Oh no, you ran away! This match is over.

83000002_COLOSSEUM__ROUND8__9-Colosseum0.name: You put up a good fight. Try again when you have better gear!

83000002_COLOSSEUM__ROUND8__12-Colosseum.name: You won! Wow. Your next opponent will be in a whole other class. Brace yourself!

83000002_COLOSSEUM__ROUND9__0-Colosseum0.name: Now here's a contender. Blackstar's right-hand man. Champion of illegal fighting rings everywhere. The one! The only! Vasara Chen!

51000005_DG__51000005_MAIN__0-Event-.name: That's right, it's me. Blake. The man of your dreams.

51000005_DG__51000005_MAIN__1-Event-.name: Choose a different direction from me, and you win. But if you choose the same direction, you lose!

51000005_DG__51000005_MAIN__2-Event-.name: Lose five times and it's game over. How long can you last?

51000005_DG__51000005_MAIN__3-Event-.name: Get a high rank and win a prize. Shall we begin?

61000023_ME__61000023_MAIN__0-MassiveHid.name: Selecting teams.\nYou will be assigned to either the Hider or Seeker teams.

61000023_ME__61000023_MAIN__1-MassiveHid.name:
Welcome to the game of Hide-and-Seek.
Hiders will be transformed into objects and must do their best to blend in with the map.
Seekers' jobs are to locate these objects!
Team selection will begin soon.

61000023_ME__61000023_MAIN__2-MassiveHid.name: The seekers will appear in 30 seconds.\nFind a safe place to hide!\nYou can press CTRL with a directional key to rotate in place.

61000023_ME__61000023_MAIN__3-MassiveHid.name: Hide-and-Seek will start in 30 seconds.\nLook around carefully to determine which objects disappeared!

61000023_ME__61000023_MAIN__4-MassiveHid.name: Hide-and-Seek has ended.\nYou'll be sent back to your previous location.

61000023_ME__61000023_MAIN__5-MassiveHid.name: There were not enough players to start the game.\nPlease try again later.

61000023_ME__61000023_MAIN__6-MassiveHid.name: The seeker team is now invincible.\nThey will not lose any lives for attacking non-Hider objects.

84000006_WD__84000006_WD_MAIN__4-Wedding.name: I hate... every single one of you...

84000006_WD__84000006_WD_MAIN__5-Wedding.name: Ah, crap! It's the evil spirit of Lith Harbor!

84000006_WD__84000006_WD_MAIN__6-Wedding.name: It's soaking into my cute pinata...!

84000006_WD__84000006_WD_MAIN__7-Wedding.name: That guy has a very strong appetite.

84000006_WD__84000006_WD_MAIN__8-Wedding.name: Steal the party food to attract the evil spirit's attention.

84000006_WD__84000006_WD_MAIN__9-Wedding.name: Buy me some time while I find a solution.

84000006_WD__84000006_WD_MAIN__10-Weddin.name: Let's buy some time by stealing food!

84000006_WD__84000006_WD_MAIN__12-Weddin.name: Come on now! Rainbow snail attack!

84000006_WD__84000006_WD_MAIN__13-Weddin.name: Toss rainbow snails to attack the evil spirit!

84000006_WD__84000006_WD_MAIN__15-Weddin.name: First of all... let's back off...

84000006_WD__84000006_WD_MAIN__17-Weddin.name: Anyway, the evil spirit was cast out!

84000006_WD__84000006_WD_MAIN__18-Weddin.name: Thank you for saving me!\nCongratulations on your wedding!

84000006_WD__84000006_WD_MAIN__21-Weddin.name: Anyway, the evil spirit was cast out!

84000006_WD__84000006_WD_MAIN__22-Weddin.name: Thank you for saving me!\nCongratulations on your wedding!

84000006_WD__84000006_WD_MAIN__24-Weddin.name: The after-party will end in a moment.

84000006_WD__84000006_WD_MAIN__25-Weddin.name: For now, enjoy the rest of your time with your friends!

84000006_WD__84000006_WD_MAIN__26-Weddin.name: Now! Enjoy the rest of your time!

84000006_WD__84000006_WD_WAIT__0-Wedding.name: You were surprised, right? Come on, come on!

84000006_WD__84000006_WD_WAIT__1-Wedding.name: Congratulations on your wedding! I can't believe it's already this big.

84000007_WD__01_MASSIVEMAIN__0-Wedding-.name: Please enjoy the after-party for the rest of the time!\nAfter the time is up, we will move to the wedding hall!

84000007_WD__09_FIREWORKS__0-Wedding-.name: Dance time is over~\nBut the party is not over yet!\nFireworks time~!

84000007_WD__09_FIREWORKS__1-Wedding-.name: Hope you had fun playing~!\nIt's firework time now~!\nCongratulations on your wedding~!

84000011_WD__84000011_MAIN__0-Wedding-.name: You two, it looks like everything is ready.\nThen, shall we start the wedding?

84000011_WD__84000011_MAIN__1-Wedding-.name: Do you two swear to love each other and to get along?\nIf you swear, write each other's name and make a vow of love.

84000011_WD__84000011_MAIN__2-Wedding-.name: You're leaving mid-wedding...\nYou are too much.

84000011_WD__84000011_MAIN__3-Wedding-.name: The wedding can take place only when both people are present.\nI'll stop the ceremony for now and wait until you come back.

84000011_WD__84000011_MAIN__4-Wedding-.name: You have to write the name correctly...\nYou are too much.

84000011_WD__84000011_MAIN__5-Wedding-.name: Please calm down and try again.\nI'll stop the process for now and wait for you.

84000011_WD__84000011_MAIN__6-Wedding-.name: I now declare the two married.

84000012_WD__84000012_MAIN__0-Wedding-.name: You two, it looks like everything is ready.\nThen, shall we start the wedding?

84000012_WD__84000012_MAIN__1-Wedding-.name: Do you two swear to love each other and to get along?\nIf you swear, write each other's name and make a vow of love.

84000012_WD__84000012_MAIN__2-Wedding-.name: Leaving the wedding hall...\nYou're a pretty irresponsible person.

84000012_WD__84000012_MAIN__3-Wedding-.name: The wedding can take place only when both people are present.\nLet's stop the ceremony and wait until they come back.

84000012_WD__84000012_MAIN__4-Wedding-.name: The two of them... I don't think they're in sync yet.\nAre you having second thoughts?

84000012_WD__84000012_MAIN__5-Wedding-.name: If the two of you have made up your mind, shall we start the wedding again?\nIf you swear, write each other's name and make a vow of love.

84000012_WD__84000012_MAIN__6-Wedding-.name: I now declare the two married.

84000013_WD__84000013_MAIN__2-Wedding-.name: Oh my, I can't believe you left the wedding hall.\nWhat an irresponsible person!

84000013_WD__84000013_MAIN__5-Wedding-.name: The two of you, now that you have made up your mind, shall we start over?\nIf you swear, write each other's name and make a vow of love.
